lojbo: jufra
glico: English translation
English_definition: definition of the Lojban word

lojbo: xamgu jufra
glico: Dictionary with Examples

lojbo: la gleki e lo drata
glico: Gleki and others

lojbo: fanva fo le lojbo
glico: Translation from Lojban

lojbo: .ei mi tavla la .alis. a la .kevin.
glico: I need to speak to Alice or Kevin (or to both of them).
English_definition: logical connective: sumti afterthought or.

lojbo: a'a ko ca'o skicu
glico: I'm listening, go on talking!
English_definition:
attitudinal: attentive - inattentive - avoiding. See also {jundi},
            {rivbi}.

lojbo: a'a cu'i ko denpa le nu mi jai gau mulno fai ti
glico: Eh, just a second, let me finish this.
English_definition:
attitudinal: attentive - inattentive - avoiding. See also {jundi},
            {rivbi}.

lojbo: do tavla da a'a nai
glico: La, la, la, I'm not listening what you are talking about.
English_definition:
attitudinal: attentive - inattentive - avoiding. See also {jundi},
            {rivbi}.

lojbo: a'e ba vlile tcima
glico: It's going to be a storm.
English_definition:
attitudinal: alertness - exhaustion. See also {sanji}, {cikna},
            {tatpi}.

lojbo: a'e nai mi ba klama le ckana
glico: Yaaaawn, I'm going to bed.
English_definition:
attitudinal: alertness - exhaustion. See also {sanji}, {cikna},
            {tatpi}.

lojbo: a'i cu'i mi klama le zarci
glico: I'm indecisive to whether I should go to a shop.
English_definition:
attitudinal: effort - no special effort - repose. See also {gunka},
            {slunandu}, {guksurla}, {troci}, {selprogunka}.

lojbo: a'i mi ca'o ralte
glico: I'm trying to hold it!
English_definition:
attitudinal: effort - no special effort - repose. See also {gunka},
            {slunandu}, {guksurla}, {troci}, {selprogunka}.

lojbo: a'i cu'i la'e ti frili
glico: Ah, this is easy.
English_definition:
attitudinal: effort - no special effort - repose. See also {gunka},
            {slunandu}, {guksurla}, {troci}, {selprogunka}.

lojbo: a'i nai cikre tu
glico: Nah, why bother fixing it.
English_definition:
attitudinal: effort - no special effort - repose. See also {gunka},
            {slunandu}, {guksurla}, {troci}, {selprogunka}.

lojbo: a'o pluka be do nicte
glico: Good night to you!
English_definition: attitudinal: hope - despair. See also {pacna}.

lojbo: a'o vamji fa le nu zukte
glico: I hope, it's worth doing it.
English_definition: attitudinal: hope - despair. See also {pacna}.

lojbo: a'o nai mi co'u ponse da
glico: Gah, I lost all my property.
English_definition: attitudinal: hope - despair. See also {pacna}.

lojbo: a'oi la kevin ma nuzba
glico: Ahoy, Kevin! What's up?

lojbo: a'u ro jbopre cu stati prenu
glico: Interesting, all Lojbanists are smart people.
English_definition:
attitudinal: interest - disinterest - repulsion. See also {cinri},
            {selcni}.

lojbo: a'u ma krinu
glico: Hm, what is the reason?
English_definition:
attitudinal: interest - disinterest - repulsion. See also {cinri},
            {selcni}.

lojbo: a'u cu'i do ne ka'ai pa nanla cu se zdani
glico: It's none of my business that you live with a boy.
English_definition:
attitudinal: interest - disinterest - repulsion. See also {cinri},
            {selcni}.

lojbo: a'u nai do co'i speni le fange
glico:
You married a stranger, it's none of my business, I'd
            avoid this topic.
English_definition:
attitudinal: interest - disinterest - repulsion. See also {cinri},
            {selcni}.

lojbo: a'u nai iu nai panci fa le kalci i ai nai mi citka ti
glico: Yuck, that smells like shit! I'm not going to eat this.
English_definition:
attitudinal: interest - disinterest - repulsion. See also {cinri},
            {selcni}.

lojbo: ma se stuzi le tcana pe le aftobuso pe li mu
glico: Where is the stop of bus number 5?

lojbo: le aftobuso pe li xo cu muvdu le muzga
glico: What's the number of the bus that goes to the museum?

lojbo: le aftobuso be lei litru cu clani
glico: The tourists' bus is long.

lojbo: ai mi vitke do
glico: I'm going to visit you.
English_definition:
attitudinal: intent - indecision - rejection / refusal. See also
            {termu'i}, {terzu'e}, {seljdi}, {selcu'a}.

lojbo: ai nai mi pu darxi do
glico: I didn't mean to hit you.
English_definition:
attitudinal: intent - indecision - rejection / refusal. See also
            {termu'i}, {terzu'e}, {seljdi}, {selcu'a}.

lojbo: mi aidji le ka klama la nipon
glico: I am going to go to Japan.

lojbo: gau ko ta to'e akti
glico: Turn that off.

lojbo: gau ko ta akti
glico: Turn it on.

lojbo: mi ba jai gau akti fai le minji
glico: I will get the machine running.

lojbo: le pa zarci ca akti
glico: The shop is open.

lojbo: le minji ca akti le ka cupra le purmo
glico: The machine is now in operation producing flour.

lojbo: le mi'u verba pu jai gau spofu le anka be le no'a
glico: The child broke his thigh.

lojbo: xu do terpa tu'a le ankabuta
glico: Are you afraid of the spider?

lojbo: ti noi arte cu pu jai rinka so'i nu darlu
glico: There've been a lot of debates caused by this artwork.

lojbo: pa arxokuna cu zvati le mi kumfa pe le'e nu jukpa
glico: There's a raccoon in my kitchen.

lojbo: ra co'a se asna pa jai ckape vi le barda fenra
glico: He took a dangerous pose near the abyss.

lojbo: .au .e'o tcati
glico: I'd like some tea, please.
English_definition: attitudinal: desire - indifference - reluctance. See also {djica}.

lojbo: au cu'i do jai gau bredi fai le cidja
glico: You prepare the food or not ... I don't have any preferences.
English_definition: attitudinal: desire - indifference - reluctance. See also {djica}.

lojbo: au nai do cliva
glico: I don't want you to leave.
English_definition: attitudinal: desire - indifference - reluctance. See also {djica}.

lojbo:
au mi stali bu'u le zdani gi'e nai kansa le mi'u
            nakni
glico: I'd rather stay at home than come with him.
English_definition: attitudinal: desire - indifference - reluctance. See also {djica}.

lojbo: .i .au mi sipna
glico: I want to sleep.
English_definition: attitudinal: desire - indifference - reluctance. See also {djica}.

lojbo: mi ba bevri
glico: I will bring it.
English_definition:
time tense relation / direction: will [selbri]; after [sumti];
            default future tense.

lojbo: le'e snuti ba fasnu
glico: Accidents will happen.
English_definition:
time tense relation / direction: will [selbri]; after [sumti];
            default future tense.

lojbo: mi pu na ku kufra ba le nu ra cinba mi
glico: I felt uncomfortable after she kissed me.
English_definition:
time tense relation / direction: will [selbri]; after [sumti];
            default future tense.

lojbo: ba'a ra ba zi mo'u zukte
glico: He ought to finish soon.
English_definition:
evidential: I expect - I experience - I remember. See also
            {bavykri}, {lifri}, {morji}.

lojbo: ba'a le mamta be mi ca zvati le mi'u zdani
glico: I expect my mother to be at home now.
English_definition:
evidential: I expect - I experience - I remember. See also
            {bavykri}, {lifri}, {morji}.

lojbo: ba'a le mi'u pendo be mi pu jinga
glico: I expect my friend to have won.
English_definition:
evidential: I expect - I experience - I remember. See also
            {bavykri}, {lifri}, {morji}.

lojbo:
ba'a cu'i le se klani be le sovda cu lacri le tcika be le
            nu le jipci co'a co'e
glico: In my experience, the number of eggs depends on when a hen starts.
English_definition:
evidential: I expect - I experience - I remember. See also
            {bavykri}, {lifri}, {morji}.

lojbo: ba'a nai do na nelci le laldo prenu
glico: As I remember, you don't like old people.
English_definition:
evidential: I expect - I experience - I remember. See also
            {bavykri}, {lifri}, {morji}.

lojbo: .i mi djuno le du'u ma kau darxi ba'e la .alis.
glico: I know who hit Alice specifically.
English_definition:
forethought emphasis indicator; indicates next word is especially
            emphasized.

lojbo: .i vajni ba'e mi
glico: It's important to me (!)
English_definition:
forethought emphasis indicator; indicates next word is especially
            emphasized.

lojbo: mi ba'o citka pa plise
glico: I have eaten an apple.
English_definition:
interval event contour: in the aftermath of ...; since ...;
            retrospective / perfect | |----.

lojbo: mi'o ba'o tavla
glico: We are done talking.
English_definition:
interval event contour: in the aftermath of ...; since ...;
            retrospective / perfect | |----.

lojbo: mi ba'o xagji
glico: I'm no longer hungry.
English_definition:
interval event contour: in the aftermath of ...; since ...;
            retrospective / perfect | |----.

lojbo:
.i ca ku nu'i ge ba'o ku su'o da gi ca'o nai ku
            su'o de prami do
glico: No one loves you anymore.
English_definition:
interval event contour: in the aftermath of ...; since ...;
            retrospective / perfect | |----.

lojbo: do no ba'u roi jimpe fi mi
glico: You never understand me.
English_definition:
discursive: exaggeration - accuracy - understatement. See also
            {satci}, {dukse}.

lojbo:
le mi'u pa tadni pu no ba'u cu'i roi jimpe zo'e
            noi mi ciksi fo ke'a
glico: The student literally never understood my explanations.
English_definition:
discursive: exaggeration - accuracy - understatement. See also
            {satci}, {dukse}.

lojbo: le mi'u terdi cu barda ba'u nai
glico: The Earth is big, to put it mildly.
English_definition:
discursive: exaggeration - accuracy - understatement. See also
            {satci}, {dukse}.

lojbo: ko na bacru su'o cladu
glico: Don't talk loud.
English_definition:
x1 utters verbally / says / phonates / speaks [vocally makes sound]
            x2. Also voices; does not necessarily imply communication or
            audience; ('says' is usually {cusku}). See also {krixa},
            {cusku}, {casnu}, {tavla}, {voksa}, {pinka}.

lojbo: ma jdima lei badna ku poi ki'ogra
glico: How much is the kilo of bananas?
English_definition:
x1 is a banana / plantain [fruit / plant] of species / breed x2. See
            also {grute}.

lojbo: mi pu badri le nu mi pu e'ande ra le ka zukte
glico: I was sad that I had allowed her to do it.
English_definition:
x1 is sad / depressed / dejected / [unhappy / feels sorrow / grief]
            about x2 (abstraction). See also {klaku}, {gleki}, {betri}, {cinmo},
            {junri}.

lojbo: mi pu stali bu'u le zdani bai le ka bilma
glico: I stayed at home forced by my illness.
English_definition: bapli modal, 1st place (forced by) forcedly; compelled by force ...

lojbo: mi bajra vi'i le mitre be li ci ki'o
glico: I ran three thousands meters.
English_definition:
x1 runs on surface x2 using limbs x3 with gait x4. See also {cadzu},
            {klama}, {litru}, {stapa}, {plipe}, {cpare}.

lojbo:
xu do su'o roi senva le nu do bajra lo jarki grana lei xance be
            do
glico: Have you ever dreamt of running on your hands on a narrow rod?
English_definition:
x1 runs on surface x2 using limbs x3 with gait x4. See also {cadzu},
            {klama}, {litru}, {stapa}, {plipe}, {cpare}.

lojbo: ti bakfu le se posydu'a le dasri
glico: This is a gift packed with a ribbon into a bundle.
English_definition:
x1 is a bundle / package / cluster / clump / pack [shape / form]
            containing x2, held together by x3. See also {daski}, {dakli},
            {tanxe}.

lojbo: mu bakni cu zvati le purdi
glico: There are five cows in the garden.
English_definition:
x1 is a cow / cattle / kine / ox / [bull / steer / calf]
            [beef-producer / bovine] of species / breed x2. See also {danlu}.

lojbo:
mi xebni le'e bakri i ki'u bo ri'a tu'a ri
            le'e purmo cu snipa le xance
glico: I hate chalk. It leaves powder on hands.
English_definition:
x1 is a quantity of / contains / is made of chalk from source x2 in
            form x3. See also {pinsi}, {blabi}, {jilka}.

lojbo: ko bevri le baktu be lo festi fo le dinju
glico: Take the pail of bucket out of the house.
English_definition:
x1 is a bucket / pail / can / deep, solid, wide-topped container of
            contents x2, made of material x3. See also {botpi}, {patxu},
            {tansi}, {lante}, {lanka}.

lojbo: ra pu sombo pa balji be pa xrula le purdi
glico: She planted a flower bulb in the garden.
English_definition:
x1 is a bulb [body-part] of plant / species x2; [metaphor: rounded,
            bulgy]. See also {punli}, {batke}.

lojbo: lei litru ca'o zgana le melbi nu muvdu fa le balnema
glico: The tourists are watching the graceful movement of a baleen whale.

lojbo: mi cpana le balni be le zdani be mi
glico: I am on the balcony of my home.
English_definition:
x1 is a balcony / overhang / ledge / shelf of building / structure
            x2. See also {kajna}.

lojbo: le jvinu be fi le balni cu melbi
glico: The view from the balcony is beautiful.
English_definition:
x1 is a balcony / overhang / ledge / shelf of building / structure
            x2. See also {kajna}.

lojbo: le balre be le dakfu cu kinli
glico: The blade of the knife is sharp.
English_definition:
x1 is a blade of tool / weapon x2. See also {dakfu}, {tunta},
            {tutci}, {guska}, {kinli}, {katna}.

lojbo:
la kevin co'u zvati .i je le nu go'i cu pu balvi le nu
            ju'a mi mo'u klama le xotli
glico: Kevin left, and that happened after my arrival to the hotel.
English_definition:
x1 is in the future of / later than / after x2 in time sequence; x1
            is latter; x2 is former. Also sequel, succeed, successor, follow,
            come(s) after; time ordering only (use {lidne} otherwise); aorist in
            that x1 may overlap in time with x2 as long as it extends
            afterwards; non-aorist future (= {cfabalvi}); (default x2 is the
            space time reference, whereupon:) x1 will occur. See also {lidne},
            {cabna}, {purci}, {farna}.

lojbo: le nixli cu nelci tu noi bambola
glico: The girl likes that doll.

lojbo: le bambu cu torni le nu brife
glico: The bamboo bends before the wind.
English_definition:
x1 is a bamboo (Bambuseae) of genus / species x2. Cf. {spati},
            {tricu}.

lojbo: pa le lalxu cu bancu le tcadu
glico: There is a lake beyond the city.
English_definition:
x1 exceeds / is beyond limit / boundary x2 from x3 in property /
            amount x4 (ka / ni). On the other side of a bound, but not
            necessarily directly 'across' nor at the shortest
            plausible distance (per {ragve}); also not limited to position in
            space. See also {dukse}, {ragve}, {zmadu}, {kuspe}.

lojbo: le tai fasnu cu bancu le se kakne be mi
glico: Such things are beyond my powers.
English_definition:
x1 exceeds / is beyond limit / boundary x2 from x3 in property /
            amount x4 (ka / ni). On the other side of a bound, but not
            necessarily directly 'across' nor at the shortest
            plausible distance (per {ragve}); also not limited to position in
            space. See also {dukse}, {ragve}, {zmadu}, {kuspe}.

lojbo: le zdani cu bancu le vu tricu ti le ka darno ti
glico:
The house is beyond those trees from here in how far it is from
            here.
English_definition:
x1 exceeds / is beyond limit / boundary x2 from x3 in property /
            amount x4 (ka / ni). On the other side of a bound, but not
            necessarily directly 'across' nor at the shortest
            plausible distance (per {ragve}); also not limited to position in
            space. See also {dukse}, {ragve}, {zmadu}, {kuspe}.

lojbo: le nu brife e le nu carvi cu bandu le dinju le nu ri jelca
glico: Wind and rain protect the house from burning.
English_definition:
x1 (event) defends / protects x2 (object / state) from threat /
            peril / potential x3 (event). Also secures (verb); x1 wards /
            resists x3; protective cover / shield (= {badgai}). See also
            {ckape}, {fanta}, {fapro}, {marbi}, {rivbi}, {zunti}, {snura},
            {binra}, {lunbe}, {pulji}.

lojbo: lo'e remna cu simsa lo'e banfi le ka se tarmi
glico: Humans look like amphibians.
English_definition: x1 is an amphibian of species / breed x2. See also {danlu}, {respa}.

lojbo: .i xu do se bangu la .lojban.
glico: Do you speak Lojban?
English_definition:
x1 is a / the language / dialect used by x2 to express / communicate
            x3 (si'o / du'u, not quote). Also tongue. See also
            {tance}, {cusku}, {ve} {tavla}, {valsi}, {gerna}, {jufra}, {natmi},
            {slaka}.

lojbo: ra tavla fo le bangu be fi lo mabla
glico: He used foul language.
English_definition:
x1 is a / the language / dialect used by x2 to express / communicate
            x3 (si'o / du'u, not quote). Also tongue. See also
            {tance}, {cusku}, {ve} {tavla}, {valsi}, {gerna}, {jufra}, {natmi},
            {slaka}.

lojbo:
le jvinu be le xamsi bei le kumfa be le xotli cu banli le ka se
            tarmi
glico: The view of the sea from the hotel room is magnificent i its form.
English_definition:
x1 is great / grand in property x2 (ka) by standard x3. Indicates a
            subjective greatness, as compared to the objective standard implied
            for {barda}; (synonyms, possibly requiring tanru:) extraordinary,
            illustrious, magnificent, impressive, awesome, grandiose, august,
            inspiring, special, majestic, distinguished, eminent, splendor,
            stately, imposing (all generally {zabna}); terrible ({mabla}). See
            also {barda}, {nobli}, {se} {sinma}, {pluja}, {misno}, {vajni},
            {fasnu}, {cizra}, {traji}, {mutce}, {se} {manci}.

lojbo: le spati ca'o banro le tricu le se katna jimca
glico: The plant is growing into a tree from a cut off branch.
English_definition:
x1 grows / expands [an increasing development] to size / into form
            x2 from x3. Also rising, developing; x1 gets bigger / enlarges /
            increases. See also {farvi}, {zenba}, {jmina}, {barda}, {makcu},
            {ferti}.

lojbo:
ti banxa le gugde le ka canja fo lo kagni i je to'u ti banxa fi
            tu'a lo kagni
glico:
This bank owned by state works with companies, in short, this is a
            commercial bank.
English_definition:
x1 is a bank owned by / in banking system x2 for banking function(s)
            x3 (event). See also {sorcu}, {zarci}, {canja}, {kagni}.

lojbo: le tcima pu bapli le nu ra stali le zdani
glico: The violent weather forced him to stay at home.
English_definition:
x1 [force] (ka) forces / compels event x2 to occur; x1 determines
            property x2 to manifest. Also constrains; requires success, unlike
            the physics term (better expressed by {danre}). See also {fanta},
            {rinju}, {jimte}, {jitro}, {rinka}, {krinu}, {zukte}, {randa},
            {danre}, cmavo list {bai}, {marxa}, {tinsa}, {xarnu}.

lojbo: le snuti pu bapli le nu ra zenba le ka jundi
glico: The accident convinced him to be more careful.
English_definition:
x1 [force] (ka) forces / compels event x2 to occur; x1 determines
            property x2 to manifest. Also constrains; requires success, unlike
            the physics term (better expressed by {danre}). See also {fanta},
            {rinju}, {jimte}, {jitro}, {rinka}, {krinu}, {zukte}, {randa},
            {danre}, cmavo list {bai}, {marxa}, {tinsa}, {xarnu}.

lojbo: le tanxe pu barda le ka se canlu xo kau da
glico: The box occupied large space.
English_definition:
x1 is big / large in property / dimension(s) x2 (ka) as compared
            with standard / norm x3. See also {banli}, {clani}, {ganra},
            {condi}, {plana}, {cmalu}, {rotsu}, {banro}, {xanto}.

lojbo: le nu penmi cu pu barda le ka se ditcu
glico: The meeting lasted for a large amount of time.
English_definition:
x1 is big / large in property / dimension(s) x2 (ka) as compared
            with standard / norm x3. See also {banli}, {clani}, {ganra},
            {condi}, {plana}, {cmalu}, {rotsu}, {banro}, {xanto}.

lojbo: lei tricu cu bargu le dargu
glico: The trees form an arch over the road.
English_definition:
x1 arches / curves over / around x2 and is made of x3; x1 is an arch
            over / around x2 of material x3. Also arc; x2 need not be an object,
            but may be a point or volume. See also {cripu}, {kruvi}, {korcu},
            {condi}.

lojbo: ti barja lo'e ckafi lo'e litru
glico: This is a bar serving coffee to tourists.
English_definition:
x1 is a tavern / bar / pub serving x2 to audience / patrons x3. See
            also {gusta}, {birje}, {jikru}, {sanmi}, {vanju}, {xotli}, {ckafi},
            {se} {pinxe}.

lojbo: le barna be le kamju cu tcita le dargu tu'a lo flalu
glico: The mark on the pillar is a road sign.
English_definition:
x1(s) is a / are mark(s) / spot(s) on x2 of material x3.
            {ba'armo'a} for a pattern of marks. See also {sinxa},
            {pixra}, {se} {ciska}, {se} {prina}.

lojbo: ei mi klama lo bartu be le zdani
glico: I should go out.
English_definition:
x1 is on the outside of x2; x1 is exterior to x2. See also {jibni},
            {nenri}, {sruri}, {lamji}, {korbi}, {calku}, {vasru}.

lojbo:
mi pu basna le nu le nu ca'o gunka cu vajni vau le ka cladu
            cusku
glico:
I emphasized the importance of continuing to work by saying it
            aloud.
English_definition:
x1 emphasizes / accentuates / gives emphasis / stress / accent to x2
            by (action) x3. Also: say forcefully. See also {pandi}.

lojbo: ma ba basti do le ka gunka
glico: Who will replace you?
English_definition:
x1 replaces / substitutes for / instead of x2 in circumstance x3; x1
            is a replacement / substitute. Also: x1 trades places with x2. See
            also cmavo list {ba'i}, {binra}.

lojbo: pu ku pa gerku cu batci le tuple be mi
glico: A dog bit my leg.
English_definition:
x1 bites / pinches x2 on / at specific locus x3 with x4. Bite
            through (= {ka'arbatci}, {batygre}); pinch (= {cinzybatci}).
            See also {denci}, {jgalu}, {guska}, {citka}.

lojbo: ra pu ru'i jgari pa batke be le kosta pe le nei
glico: He was holding a button of his coat.
English_definition:
x1 is a button / knob / [handle] on / for item x2, with purpose x3,
            made of material x4. See also {jadni}, {balji}, {punji}, {jgari},
            {lasna}.

lojbo: mi tavla bau la lojban
glico: I talk in Lojban language.
English_definition: bangu modal, 1st place in language ...

lojbo: ko klama ca le bavlamdei
glico: Come tomorrow!

lojbo:
pu ku ca le bavlamdei be le nu mi mo'u klama vau mi co'a
            ganse lo cizra
glico: On the day following my arrival I started feeling something strange.

lojbo: lo'e bavmi cu ralju le'i se cupra be bu'u
glico: Barley is the main product here.
English_definition:
x1 is a quantity of barley [grain] of species / strain x2. See also
            {gurni}.

lojbo: .i le tixnu be mi cu melbi
glico: My daughter is pretty.
English_definition:

            subunits [e.g. ounces] x4. (additional subunit places may be added
            as x5, x6, ...); See also {grake}, {junta}, {tilju}, {rupnu},
            {fepni}, {dekpu}, {gutci}, {minli}, {merli}, {kramu}.

lojbo: le bunre gerku pu zvafa'i le pa blabi ractu
glico: The brown dog found a white rabbit.
English_definition:
x1 is brown / tan [color adjective]. See also {skari}, {blabi},
            {xekri}, {kandi}, {carmi}.

lojbo: ti burcu lo'e nu punji lo cinta vau lei cmalu
glico: This is a brush for painting with small bristles.
English_definition:
x1 is a brush for purpose x2 (event) with bristles x3. See also
            {komcu}, {pinsi}.

lojbo: xu do burna le nu do pilno la lojban
glico: Are you disconcerted of using Lojban?
English_definition:
x1 is embarrassed / disconcerted / flustered / ill-at-ease about /
            under conditions x2 (abstraction). See also {cinmo}.

lojbo:
.i lei rirni pu zvati le barja .i ca bo lei verba cu kansa no da
            bu'u le zdani
glico:
The parents were in the bar; meanwhile the children were alone at
            home.
English_definition:
time tense relation / direction: is [selbri]; during / simultaneous
            with [sumti]; present tense.

lojbo: .i ko smaji ca le nu mi tavla
glico: Be quite while I'm talking.
English_definition:
time tense relation / direction: is [selbri]; during / simultaneous
            with [sumti]; present tense.

lojbo:
ca le nu do steba le nu do kansa no da zo'u ko morji le se
            gleki be mi'o mokca
glico:
When you feel frustrated about being lonely, remember the happy
            moments we had together.
English_definition:
time tense relation / direction: is [selbri]; during / simultaneous
            with [sumti]; present tense.

lojbo: mi pu prami do i mi ca prami do i mi ba prami do
glico: I loved you. I love you. I will love you.
English_definition:
time tense relation / direction: is [selbri]; during / simultaneous
            with [sumti]; present tense.

lojbo:
le pendo be mi be'o joi mi pu mo'u klama le pa cizra stuzi
            ca le nu no lu'a vo'a sanji le du'u le stuzi
            ka'e jai ckape
glico:
My friend and I arrived at a strange place lacking the awareness
            that it can be dangerous.
English_definition:
time tense relation / direction: is [selbri]; during / simultaneous
            with [sumti]; present tense.

lojbo: mi ca'a limna
glico: I'm actually swimming.
English_definition: modal aspect: actuality / ongoing event.

lojbo: la kevin ca ca'a jatna
glico: Kevin is now acting as a captain.
English_definition: modal aspect: actuality / ongoing event.

lojbo: ca'e do zutse va
glico: You sit there!
English_definition: evidential: I define. See also {mitcu'a}, {mitsmu}.

lojbo: ca'e do klama ka'ai mi
glico: You go with me!
English_definition: evidential: I define. See also {mitcu'a}, {mitsmu}.

lojbo: ca'e le se gunka cu mulno
glico: The work is hereby done.
English_definition: evidential: I define. See also {mitcu'a}, {mitsmu}.

lojbo: ca'e gusni
glico: Let there be light!
English_definition: evidential: I define. See also {mitcu'a}, {mitsmu}.

lojbo: le verba ca'o citka
glico: The child is eating.
English_definition: interval event contour: during ...; continuative |-----|.

lojbo: le snime cu mitre li pa ca'u le vorme pe do
glico: There is snow one meter thick in front of your door.
English_definition: location tense relation / direction; forwards / to the front of ...

lojbo: le cabdei cu detri li jy dy ze
glico: Today is Sunday.

lojbo: so'i roi ku lo xamgu fasnu cu cabna lo xlali fasnu
glico: Good events often happen at the same time as bad events.
English_definition:
x1 is current at / in the present of / during / concurrent /
            simultaneous with x2 in time. (default x2 is the present resulting
            in:) x1 is now; time relationship only, 'aorist' claiming
            simultaneity does not mean one event does not extend into the past
            or future of the other. See also {zvati}, {balvi}, {purci}, cmavo
            list {ca}, cmavo list {ca'a}.

lojbo: ti cabra le ka zalvi le gurni vau le xance
glico: This is a hand-controlled machine for grinding grain.
English_definition:
x1 is apparatus / mechanism / device / equipment for function x2
            controlled / [triggered] by x3 (agent). Form determined by / from
            function; does not imply automated / automatic action - requires an
            external agent / trigger (a minji may be a zmiku cabra if it
            requires an external agent to trigger or control the functions that
            it performs automatically). (cf. {tutci}, {minji}, {finti}; {girzu},
            {ganzu} for organizational apparatus, pilno)

lojbo: lo'e nicte be le cabna bei ti cu cacra li mu
glico: At this time and this place, night is 5 hours long.
English_definition:
x1 is x2 hours in duration (default is 1 hour) by standard x3. See
            also {junla}, {mentu}, {snidu}, {tcika}, {temci}.

lojbo:
pu ku ca le nu do mo'u klama vau mi ru'i cadzu le srasu le
            jamfu
glico: When you arrived I was walking on the grass on foot.
English_definition:
x1 walks / strides / paces on surface x2 using limbs x3. See also
            {stapa}, {bajra}, {klama}, {litru}.

lojbo: .i mutce cafne fa le nu mi vitke le patfu be mi
glico: It's quite often that I visit my father.
English_definition:
x1 (event) often / frequently / commonly / customarily occurs /
            recurs by standard x2. See also {rirci}, {fadni}, {kampu}, {rapli},
            {krefu}, {lakne}, cmavo list piso'iroi and similar {compounds}.

lojbo:
ti cagna le pu se zvati be le pa denci le moklu be ra le nu le mikce
            mo'u vimcu denci bu
glico:
This is a wound in his mouth at the place where there was a tooth
            and caused by removal of the tooth by a doctor.
English_definition:
$x_1$ is a wound on body $x_2$ at locus $x_3$ caused by $x_4$ Unlike
            {ve} {xrani} specific to physical injuries pertaining to the surface
            of an organic body such as skin. Open wounds include
            {ka'arcagna} for "incision / incised wound",
            {fercagna} for "laceration", {gukcagna} for
            "abrasion", {tuncagna} for "puncture wound",
            {grecagna} for "penetration wound", {batcagna} for
            "bite wound", {dancagna} for "gunshot wound",
            {jelcagna} for "burn", {da'ercagna} for
            "bedsore", {furcagna} for "necrosis"; closed
            wounds include {daxcagna} for "contusion / bruise",
            {camdaxcagna} for "hematoma", {ra'ircagna} for
            "chronic wound".

lojbo: oi cai
glico: Ah, pain, I'm going to lose consciousness now!!!
English_definition: attitudinal: strong intensity attitude modifier.

lojbo: mi nelci lo'e blabi cakla ne se mau lo'e manku cakla
glico: I prefer white chocolate to dark chocolate.
English_definition:
x1 is made of / contains / is a quantity of chocolate / cocoa. See
            also {ckafi}.

lojbo: mi nitcu tu'a su'o calku be lo stedu
glico: I need a head helmet.
English_definition:
x1 is a shell / husk [hard, protective covering] around x2 composed
            of x3. See also {pilka}, {skapi}, {gacri}, {bartu}.

lojbo: do canci le jvinu be fi mi
glico: You disappeared from my view.
English_definition:
x1 vanishes / disappears from location x2; x1 ceases to be observed
            at x2 using senses / sensor x3. Also leaves, goes away (one sense).
            See also {cliva}, {ganse}, {zgana}, {lebna}, {vimcu}.

lojbo: ti cange le barda tumla le mensi be mi le'e vanjba
glico:
This is a farm covering a large parcel of land; it's kept by my
            sister and produces grapes.
English_definition:
x1 is a farm / ranch at x2, farmed by x3, raising / producing x4;
            (adjective:) x1 is agrarian. Also grange; farming is any organized
            agrarian activity, not limited to plant crops. See also {purdi},
            {nurma}, {ferti}, {foldi}, {xarju}.

lojbo:
e'u mi canja fo do fe tu'a le bidju le ka gasnu lo nu mi
            zgana le tatru be do
glico:
Let me give you these beads in exchange that you show me your
            breast.
English_definition:
x1 exchanges / trades / barters commodity x2 for x3 with x4; x1, x4
            is a trader / merchant / businessman. Also (adjective:) x1, x2, x4
            is / are commercial (better expressed as ka canja, {kamcanja}). x2 /
            x3 may be a specific object, a commodity (mass), an event (possibly
            service), or a property; pedantically, for objects / commodities,
            this is sumti-raising from ownership of the object / commodity (=
            {posycanja} for unambiguous semantics); (cf. {dunda}, {friti},
            {vecnu}, {zarci}, {jdini}, {pleji}, {jdima}, {jerna}, {kargu}; see
            note at {jdima} on cost / price / value distinction, {banxa},
            {cirko}, {dunda}, {janta}, {kargu}, {prali}, {sfasa}, {zivle})

lojbo: le canko be le karce cu kalri
glico: The window in the car is open.
English_definition:
x1 is a window / portal / opening [portal] in wall / building /
            structure x2. See also {vorme}, {bitmu}, {ganlo}, {murta}, {pagre},
            {kevna}, {jvinu}, {kalri}, {kuspe}.

lojbo: le canlu be le purdi cu barda
glico: The garden occupies a large space.
English_definition:
x1 is space / volume / region / room [at-least-3-dimensional area]
            occupied by x2. Also occupy (= selca'u). See also {kensa},
            {bliku}, {kumfa}, {kevna}, {kunti}, {tubnu}, {dekpu}.

lojbo: ti canpa lo'e dertu ji lo'e snime
glico: Is this spade for digging ground or snow?
English_definition:
x1 is a shovel / spade [bladed digging implement] for digging x2.
            See also {kakpa}, {guska}, {tutci}.

lojbo: mi pu penmi le i'u nai prina be le canre bei su'o jamfu
glico: I found some footprints in the sand.
English_definition:
x1 is a quantity of / contains / is made of sand / grit from source
            x2 of composition including x3. Also abrasive (= {gukcanre}). See
            also {bidju}, {rokci}, {zalvi}, {boxna}.

lojbo: mi pu se nandu le ka cadzu lei canre poi gunma lo cmalu rokci
glico: It was hard for me to walk on the sand made of small stones.
English_definition:
x1 is a quantity of / contains / is made of sand / grit from source
            x2 of composition including x3. Also abrasive (= {gukcanre}). See
            also {bidju}, {rokci}, {zalvi}, {boxna}.

lojbo:
ro da poi remna zo'u kanpe le nu ba zi le nu da co'a cifnu
            vau loi jurme co'a xabju lo canti be da
glico:
For every human it is expected that soon after he is born bacteria
            colonize his intestines.
English_definition:
x1 is a / the gut(s) / entrails / intestines / viscera / innards /
            digestive system [body-part] of x2. Metaphor: process hub. See also
            {betfu}.

lojbo: mi sazri le pa carce be lo'e karce
glico: I am driving a car transporter.
English_definition:
x1 is a cart / carriage / wagon [wheeled vehicle] for carrying x2,
            propelled by x3. See also {karce}, {xislu}, {marce}, {matra}.

lojbo: ti voi bombila cu carmi le ka te gusni vau mi
glico: This light bulb gives a light bright to me.
English_definition:
x1 is intense / bright / saturated / brilliant in property (ka) x2
            as received / measured by observer x3. Also lustrous, gleaming,
            sparkling, shining (all probably better metaphorically combined with
            gusni: gusycai or camgu'i); in colors, refers principally to
            increased saturation (with opposite kandi). See also {denmi},
            {gusni}, {kandi}, {ruble}, {skari}, {tilju}, {tsali}, {mutce},
            {blabi}, {blanu}, {bunre}, {cicna}, {crino}, {grusi}, {narju},
            {nukni}, {pelxu}, {xekri}, {xunre}, {zirpu}.

lojbo: ko carna fi le pritu
glico: Turn to the right.
English_definition:
x1 turns about vector x2 towards direction x3, turning angular
            distance / to face point x4 Also revolve (= {jincarna}). See also
            {gunro}, {jendu}. New definition of {carna} originally proposed by
            Robin Lee Powell and backward-compatible with the old one. Official
            definition: x1 turns / rotates / revolves around axis x2 in
            direction x3.

lojbo: ko carna fi le pritu
glico: Turn right.
English_definition:
x1 turns about vector x2 towards direction x3, turning angular
            distance / to face point x4 Also revolve (= {jincarna}). See also
            {gunro}, {jendu}. New definition of {carna} originally proposed by
            Robin Lee Powell and backward-compatible with the old one. Official
            definition: x1 turns / rotates / revolves around axis x2 in
            direction x3.

lojbo: i ko carna le kojna le pritu
glico: Turn right around the corner.
English_definition:
x1 turns about vector x2 towards direction x3, turning angular
            distance / to face point x4 Also revolve (= {jincarna}). See also
            {gunro}, {jendu}. New definition of {carna} originally proposed by
            Robin Lee Powell and backward-compatible with the old one. Official
            definition: x1 turns / rotates / revolves around axis x2 in
            direction x3.

lojbo:
ro da poi mokca le xislu zo'u da go nai carna le jendu le pritu
            be ri bei mi gi'e galtu be mi bei le jendu gi carna le jendu le
            zunle be ri bei mi gi'e dizlo be mi bei le jendu
glico:
The wheel was rotating around the rod counterclockwise when viewed
            by me.
English_definition:
x1 turns about vector x2 towards direction x3, turning angular
            distance / to face point x4 Also revolve (= {jincarna}). See also
            {gunro}, {jendu}. New definition of {carna} originally proposed by
            Robin Lee Powell and backward-compatible with the old one. Official
            definition: x1 turns / rotates / revolves around axis x2 in
            direction x3.

lojbo: le xislu pu ca'o ca'a carna le grana
glico: The wheel was rotating around the rod.
English_definition:
x1 turns about vector x2 towards direction x3, turning angular
            distance / to face point x4 Also revolve (= {jincarna}). See also
            {gunro}, {jendu}. New definition of {carna} originally proposed by
            Robin Lee Powell and backward-compatible with the old one. Official
            definition: x1 turns / rotates / revolves around axis x2 in
            direction x3.

lojbo: ti cartu le fange tcadu le dargu
glico: This is a map showing roads of an alien city.
English_definition:
x1 is a chart / diagram / map of / about x2 showing formation /
            data-points x3. See also {platu}.

lojbo: gau ko mi zgana le cartu be le nu'o se zvati be mi'o
glico: Show me a map of places where you and I haven't been.
English_definition:
x1 is a chart / diagram / map of / about x2 showing formation /
            data-points x3. See also {platu}.

lojbo: ca ca'o carvi
glico: It's raining.
English_definition:
x1 rains / showers / [precipitates] to x2 from x3; x1 is
            precipitation [not limited to 'rain']. See also {bratu},
            {dilnu}, {santa}, {snime}, {tcima}, {bisli}, {bumru}.

lojbo: le snime pu carmi carvi le lalxu pa barda dilnu
glico: It was snowing hard onto the lake from a large cloud.
English_definition:
x1 rains / showers / [precipitates] to x2 from x3; x1 is
            precipitation [not limited to 'rain']. See also {bratu},
            {dilnu}, {santa}, {snime}, {tcima}, {bisli}, {bumru}.

lojbo: ra joi mi pu casnu le pa arte
glico: She and I discussed a piece of art.
English_definition:
x1(s) (mass normally, but 1 individual / jo'u possible)
            discuss(es) / talk(s) about topic / subject x2. Also chat, converse.
            See also {bacru}, {cusku}, {darlu}, {tavla}.

lojbo: le nixli pu catke le nanla le stedu be ri
glico: The girl pushed the boy on his head.
English_definition:
x1 [agent] shoves / pushes x2 at locus x3. Move by pushing / shoving
            (= {ca'ermuvgau}). (cf. danre for non-agentive force, lacpu)

lojbo: ko catlu mi
glico: Look at me.
English_definition:
x1 looks at / examines / views / inspects / regards / watches /
            gazes at x2. Also look through (= {grecta}, {ravycta}, {bacycta});
            note that English 'look' often means a more generic
            'observe'. See also {jvinu}, {minra}, {simlu}, {viska},
            {lanli}, {zgana}, {setca}, {viska}.

lojbo:
mi co'a catni le ka cange ti ce'u vau le du'u le
            patfu be mi cu curmi le nu nei
glico:
The authority to be a farmer on this land has been given to me by my
            father.
English_definition:
x1 has authority / is an official in / on / over matter / sphere /
            persons x2 derived on basis x3. See also {turni}, {tutra}, {krati},
            cmavo list {ca'i}, {jaspu}, {pulji}.

lojbo: ra kakne le ka catra re cipni le ka pilno pa rokci
glico: He can kill two birds with one stone.
English_definition:
x1 (agent) kills / slaughters / murders x2 by action / method x3.
            See also {morsi}, {xarci}.

lojbo: mi caucni do
glico: I miss you.

lojbo: ti voi lalxu cu caxno le ka sraji vau le sefta be vo'a
glico: This lake is shallow in separating its bottom from its surface.
English_definition:
x1 is shallow in extent in direction / property x2 away from
            reference point x3 by standard x4. See also {condi}, {tordu},
            {jarki}, {cinla}, {cmalu}, {jarki}, {jmifa}.

lojbo: le ninmu cu ji'i mu no ce'i si'ei le remna
glico: Approximately 50% of humans are women.
English_definition: digit / number: % percentage symbol, hundredths.

lojbo: li pa ce'o li re ce'o li ci cu porsi
glico: 1,2,3 is a sequence.
English_definition:
non-logical connective: ordered sequence link; and then, forming a
            sequence.

lojbo: la alis la an cu zmadu le ka mi nelci ce'u
glico: I like Alice more than Ann.
English_definition:
pseudo-quantifier binding a variable within an abstraction that
            represents an open place.

lojbo: ti cecla lo'e fagri
glico: This is a fire gun.
English_definition:
x1 launches / fires / shoots projectile / missile x2, propelled by
            x3 [propellant / propulsion]. Also: x1 is a gun / launcher / cannon;
            x1 hurls / throws / casts (more general than renro in that
            propulsion need not be internal to x1). See also {renro}, {danti},
            {jakne}, {jbama}, {spoja}.

lojbo: le pa cecmu be lo cipni mo'u muvdu le bu'u tcadu
glico: A colony of birds moved to this city.
English_definition:
x1 is a community / colony of organisms x2. See also {bende},
            {kulnu}, {natmi}, {tcadu}, {jecta}, {girzu}.

lojbo: le cabna cu cedra le nu pilno le skami
glico: These days are the era of using computers.
English_definition:
x1 is an era / epoch / age characterized by x2 (event / property /
            interval / idea). (x2 interval should be the defining boundaries; if
            merely a characterizing period, the nature of the interval should be
            expressed in an abstract bridi, or the interval should be marked
            with tu'a; x2 may also be characteristic object(s) or practices
            of the era, if marked with tu'a); See also {ranji}, {temci},
            {citsi}.

lojbo: mi ba klama cei broda le zarci i au do broda
glico: I will go to the store. I'd like you go there too.
English_definition:
selbri variable assignment; assigns broda series pro-bridi to a
            selbri.

lojbo:
le'e verba mlatu cei broda zo'u mi nelci le'e broda
            poi blabi gi'e ku'i na nelci le'e broda poi xekri
glico: As for kittens I like white ones but don't like black ones.
English_definition:
selbri variable assignment; assigns broda series pro-bridi to a
            selbri.

lojbo: do cenba le ka cpedu ma kau vau le barda
glico: Your demands vary to much degree.
English_definition:
x1 varies / changes in property / quantity x2 (ka / ni) in amount /
            degree x3 under conditions x4. Non-resultative, not-necessarily
            causal change. (cf. cenba which is non-resultative, galfi which is
            resultative and causal, stika which is non-resultative and causal;
            stodi, zasni, binxo)

lojbo: ro linji ka'e cenba le ka clani ma kau vau ro da
glico: Any line segment can be changed in its length to any degree.
English_definition:
x1 varies / changes in property / quantity x2 (ka / ni) in amount /
            degree x3 under conditions x4. Non-resultative, not-necessarily
            causal change. (cf. cenba which is non-resultative, galfi which is
            resultative and causal, stika which is non-resultative and causal;
            stodi, zasni, binxo)

lojbo: le bu'u tcadu cu censa ro prenu pe vi
glico: This city is holy to all people here.
English_definition:
x1 is holy / sacred to person / people / culture / religion / cult /
            group x2. See also {cevni}, {krici}, {latna}, {pruxi}, {lijda},
            {sinma}.

lojbo: ti noi tcadu cu centero le te gugde
glico: This city is in the center of the country.

lojbo:
le insekto cu centi le ka ce'u mitre li xo kau vau le ka
            ce'u clani
glico: The insect is 1 centimeter long.
English_definition:
x1 is a hundredth [1 / 100; $1*10^{-2}$] of x2 in dimension / aspect
            x3 (default is units). See also {grake}, {mitre}, {snidu}, {stero},
            {delno}, {molro}, {kelvo}, {xampo}, {gradu}, {litce}, {merli},
            {decti}, {dekto}, {femti}, {gigdo}, {gocti}, {gotro}, {kilto},
            {megdo}, {mikri}, {milti}, {nanvi}, {petso}, {picti}, {terto},
            {xatsi}, {xecto}, {xexso}, {zepti}, {zetro}.

lojbo:
mi cerda le ka ponse le dinju vau le patfu be mi su'o se djica
            be ri
glico: I inherited the house from my father according to his will.
English_definition:
x1 is an heir to / is to inherit x2 (object / quality) from x3
            according to rule x4. Pedantically, inheriting an object should be a
            sumti-raising (tu'a if non-abstract in x2) of inheriting loka
            ponse the object - the ownership of the object (= {posycerda},
            posyselcerda for unambiguous {semantics}). See also {jgina}.

lojbo: mi ba klama le boske ca le cermurse be le bavlamdei bei ti
glico: I will go to forest tomorrow at dawn at this place.

lojbo: cerni coi
glico: Good morning!
English_definition:
x1 is a morning [dawn until after typical start-of-work for locale]
            of day x2 at location x3. This morning (= {cabdeicerni}); tomorrow
            morning (= {bavlamcerni}); yesterday morning (= {prulamcerni},
            {prulamdeicerni}) See also {vanci}, {murse}, {tcika}.

lojbo: ca cerni pa cnino la .nipon.
glico: It is now the morning of a new day in Japan.
English_definition:
x1 is a morning [dawn until after typical start-of-work for locale]
            of day x2 at location x3. This morning (= {cabdeicerni}); tomorrow
            morning (= {bavlamcerni}); yesterday morning (= {prulamcerni},
            {prulamdeicerni}) See also {vanci}, {murse}, {tcika}.

lojbo:
fau ei ro da mi se zu'e se marvele le nu le mi'u prenu se
            la'u li xo kau certu le ka limna
glico: I cannot but wonder at his skill in swimming.

lojbo: do cevni mi le nu carvi
glico: You are a god of rain for me.
English_definition:
x1 is a / the god / deity of people(s) / religion x2 with dominion
            over x3 [sphere]; x1 is divine. Also divinity; x2 religion refers to
            the religious community as a mass. See also {censa}, {krici},
            {lijda}, {malsi}.

lojbo: de'i li cy xo le se tigni cu cfari
glico: At what time does the performance begin?
English_definition:
x1 [state / event / process] commences / initiates / starts / begins
            to occur; (intransitive verb). See also {sisti}, {krasi}, {fanmo},
            {co'acfa}.

lojbo: la'e lu la lunra cu kusru turni li'u cfika le logji bangu
glico:
'The Moon is a harsh mistress' is a fiction about logical
            languages.
English_definition:
x1 is a work of fiction about plot / theme / subject x2 / under
            convention x2 by author x3. Also story, lie, untrue. See also
            {cukta}, {lisri}, {prosa}, {fatci}, {jitfa}, {jetnu}, {xanri}.

lojbo: mi se cfila le nu le drata cu xanka

            existence of an explainer with a point of view makes this word not a
            simple expression of cause. See also {cipra}, {danfu}, {jalge},
            {jinvi}, {krinu}, {mukti}, {nabmi}, {preti}, {rinka}, {sidbo},
            {zukte}, {tavla}.

            having relevant properties x3. Also x2 fastener, mechanism; code key
            (= {termifckiku}, {kiktermifra}); x3 is dependent on the type of
            key, but are those form properties of the key that enable it to
            serve the function of opening the lock - in the case of a metal key
            to a padlock, for example, this would be the shaft and teeth. See
            also {stela}.

lojbo: mi mo'u cirko le pe mi ckiku
glico: I lost my keys.
English_definition:
x1 is a key fitting / releasing / opening / unlocking lock x2, and
            having relevant properties x3. Also x2 fastener, mechanism; code key
            (= {termifckiku}, {kiktermifra}); x3 is dependent on the type of
            key, but are those form properties of the key that enable it to
            serve the function of opening the lock - in the case of a metal key
            to a padlock, for example, this would be the shaft and teeth. See
            also {stela}.

lojbo: le ka mitre ma kau cu ckilu le ka te sepli ma kau ma kau
glico: Metric scale measures the distance between two points.
English_definition:
x1 (si'o) is a scale of units for measuring / observing /
            determining x2 (state). See also cmavo list {ci'u}, {gradu},
            {merli}, {cimde}, {manri}.

lojbo: .i le ka skari cu ckilu le nu le stizu cu xunre
glico: Having a color is the scale of the chair being red.
English_definition:
x1 (si'o) is a scale of units for measuring / observing /
            determining x2 (state). See also cmavo list {ci'u}, {gradu},
            {merli}, {cimde}, {manri}.

lojbo:
mi na jimpe le du'u makau te ckini le panci le jai se vecnu be

ti'e le sance cu ckini le barda mabru le ka ce'u cupra

They say the sound is related to a large mammal that produces it

lojbo: le nu da'i mi pu zvati la nipon cu ckini fi no da

lojbo: mi ckire do le mi'u ka sidju mi

English_definition:

lojbo: ti ckule le bu'u gugde le ve mikce le citno tadni

lojbo: xu le tsiju be ti noi ckunu cu kukte

            See also {tricu}.

lojbo: le zgike cu cladu le bu'u kumfa ku ji'a
glico: The music is loud even when you are in this room.
English_definition:

            {savru}.

lojbo: la tom cu clani le ka sraji
glico: Tom is tall.
English_definition:
x1 is long in dimension / direction x2 (default longest dimension)
            by measurement standard x3. See also {slabu}, {condi}, {ganra},
            {rotsu}, {tordu}, {barda}, {ganra}, {gutci}, {minli}, {rotsu}.

lojbo: le cmana cu clani
glico: The mountain is high.
English_definition:
x1 is long in dimension / direction x2 (default longest dimension)
            by measurement standard x3. See also {slabu}, {condi}, {ganra},
            {rotsu}, {tordu}, {barda}, {ganra}, {gutci}, {minli}, {rotsu}.

lojbo: le nu penmi pu clani le ka se ditcu

English_definition:
x1 is long in dimension / direction x2 (default longest dimension)
            by measurement standard x3. See also {slabu}, {condi}, {ganra},
            {rotsu}, {tordu}, {barda}, {ganra}, {gutci}, {minli}, {rotsu}.

lojbo: clani le ka mitre li re
glico: The length is two meters.
English_definition:
x1 is long in dimension / direction x2 (default longest dimension)
            by measurement standard x3. See also {slabu}, {condi}, {ganra},
            {rotsu}, {tordu}, {barda}, {ganra}, {gutci}, {minli}, {rotsu}.

lojbo: mi claxu le ka djica le ka citka
glico: I lack the desire to eat.
English_definition:
x1 is without / lacking / free of / lacks x2; x1 is x2-less. See

lojbo: si'au do claxu le ka cinmo da
glico: Looks like you lack any emotions.
English_definition:
x1 is without / lacking / free of / lacks x2; x1 is x2-less. See
            also cmavo list {cau}, {cirko}, {kunti}, {nitcu}, {pindi}, {banzu}.

lojbo: mi claxu su'o penbi
glico: I don't have a pen.
English_definition:
x1 is without / lacking / free of / lacks x2; x1 is x2-less. See
            also cmavo list {cau}, {cirko}, {kunti}, {nitcu}, {pindi}, {banzu}.

lojbo: ti clika fi le rokci
glico: This is moss growing on rocks.
English_definition:
x1 is a moss / lichen of species / strain x2 growing on x3;
            (adjective:) x1 is mossy. See also {mledi}.

lojbo: le nu la alis cu cliva le mi'u briju pu clira le se sruma be mi
glico: Alice leaving the office was early according to my assumption.
English_definition: x1 (event) is early by standard x2. See also {lerci}.

lojbo:
do pu na clite le ka cusku le se du'u le mi'u ctuca na
            drani
glico: You wasn't polite in saying that the teacher isn't right.
English_definition:
x1 is polite / courteous / civil in matter x2 according to standard
            / custom x3. Also formal, ritual. See also {ritli}.

lojbo: ra pu cliva le mi'u kumfa pa canko
glico: He left the room via a window.
English_definition:
x1 leaves / goes away / departs / parts / separates from x2 via
            route x3. Also: x1 leaves behind / takes leave of x2. See also
            {litru}, {canci}, {vimcu}, {lebna}, {muvdu}.

lojbo: ko jai se torni le mi'u skori ja'e le nu ri clupa
glico: Twist the rope into a loop.
English_definition:
x1 is a loop / circuit of x2 [material]. Also noose (= skoclupa,
            saljgeclupa; there is no indication of shape, but merely that the
            ends join / meet); closed curve defined by set of points (=
            {cuptai}). See also {djine}.

lojbo: mi tadni le cmaci be le klani
glico: I study arithmetic (mathematics of quantity).
English_definition: x1 is a mathematics of type / describing x2. See also {mekso}.

lojbo: le nu penmi ba cmalu le ka ditcu
glico: The meeting will be short in duration.
English_definition:
x1 is small in property / dimension(s) x2 (ka) as compared with
            standard / norm x3. See also {caxno}, {cinla}, {jarki}, {tordu},
            {barda}.

lojbo: le mi'u cukta cu cmalu le ka jai vajni
glico: The book is of little importance.
English_definition:
x1 is small in property / dimension(s) x2 (ka) as compared with
            standard / norm x3. See also {caxno}, {cinla}, {jarki}, {tordu},
            {barda}.

lojbo: so'i da cmana le bu'u tumla
glico: This land has a lot of mountains.
English_definition:
x1 is a mountain / hill / mound / [rise] / [peak] / [summit] /
            [highlands] projecting from land mass x2. See also {punli}, {derxi}.

lojbo: zo ka cmavo ma'oi nu
glico:
{ka} is a grammatical particle of class "NU" (clause
            prefix)
English_definition:
x1 is a structure word of grammatical class x2, with meaning /
            function x3 in usage (language) x4. x4 may be a specific usage (with
            an embedded language place) or a massified language description; x3
            and x4 may be merely an example of cmavo usage or refer to an actual
            expression; cmavo list, if physical object (= (loi) ma'oste);
            referring to the mental construct (e.g. propose adding a new cmavo
            to the cmavo list = ma'orpoi, ma'orselcmi,
            ma'orselste). See also {gismu}, {lujvo}, {gerna}, {smuni},
            {valsi}.

lojbo: .i ma cmene do
glico: What is your name?
English_definition:
x1 (quoted word(s)) is a / the name / title / tag of x2 to / used-by
            namer / name-user x3 (person). Also: x2 is called x1 by x3 (= selcme
            for reordered places). See also cmavo list {me'e}, {gismu},
            {tcita}, {valsi}, {judri}.

lojbo: .i mi se cmene zo .bab.
glico: My name is Bob.
English_definition:
x1 (quoted word(s)) is a / the name / title / tag of x2 to / used-by
            namer / name-user x3 (person). Also: x2 is called x1 by x3 (= selcme
            for reordered places). See also cmavo list {me'e}, {gismu},
            {tcita}, {valsi}, {judri}.

lojbo: .i le bruna be mi mi te cmene zo ractu
glico: My brother calls me "Rabbit"
English_definition:
x1 (quoted word(s)) is a / the name / title / tag of x2 to / used-by
            namer / name-user x3 (person). Also: x2 is called x1 by x3 (= selcme
            for reordered places). See also cmavo list {me'e}, {gismu},
            {tcita}, {valsi}, {judri}.

lojbo:
le kamni pu xusra le du'u le prenu pu zukte no le se cmene be
            lu na'e drani li'u bei le kamni
glico:
The committee asserted that the person had done nothing
            "incorrect" (quoting the committee's words).
English_definition:
x1 (quoted word(s)) is a / the name / title / tag of x2 to / used-by
            namer / name-user x3 (person). Also: x2 is called x1 by x3 (= selcme
            for reordered places). See also cmavo list {me'e}, {gismu},
            {tcita}, {valsi}, {judri}.

lojbo: zo lojban cmevla
glico: "Lojban" is cmevla.

lojbo: ra pu co'a cmila
glico: She started laughing.
English_definition:
x1 laughs (emotional expression). x1 laughs at x2 (=
            {mi'afra}). See also {ckasu}, {frumu}, {xajmi}, {cisma}.

lojbo: mi cmima pa kamni pe le mi'u gugde
glico: I am a member of a state committee.
English_definition:
x1 is a member / element of set x2; x1 belongs to group x2; x1 is
            amid / among / amongst group x2. x1 may be a complete or incomplete
            list of members; x2 is normally marked by la'i / le'i /
            lo'i, defining the set in terms of its common property(ies),
            though it may be a complete enumeration of the membership. See also
            {ciste}, {porsi}, {jbini}, {girzu}, {gunma}, {klesi}, cmavo list
            {mei}, {kampu}, {lanzu}, {liste}.

lojbo: le mi'u prenu pu cmoni zo a le ka gleki
glico: The person uttered "A!" expressing his happiness.
English_definition:
x1 utters moan / groan / howl / scream [non-linguistic utterance] x2
            expressing x3 (property). Also shriek, most animal sounds, e.g.
            bark, cackle, meow, neigh, moo, honk, baa, crow. See also {krixa},
            {bacru}, {cusku}, {cortu}.

lojbo: le ki'ogra be li ci cu cnano le ka se junta vau le ca zi jbena
glico: 3 kilograms is a normal weight of newborns.
English_definition:
x1 [value] is a norm / average in property / amount x2 (ka / ni)
            among x3(s) (set) by standard x4. Also mean, normal, usual; (x3
            specifies the complete set). See also {tcaci}, {fadni}, {kampu},
            {lakne}, {tarti}, {rirci}.

lojbo: le cnebo be le za'u vi ninmu cu clani
glico: These women have long necks.
English_definition:
x1 is a / the neck [body-part] of x2; [metaphor: a relatively narrow
            point]. See also {galxe}, {cutne}.

lojbo:
mi pu cnemu le mi'u gerku le ka bevri le grana vau le ka te
            cpacu le sakta le mi'u gerku
glico: I rewarded the dog for bringing the stick by giving it sugar.
English_definition:
x1 (agent) rewards x2 [recipient] for atypical x3 (event / property)
            with reward / desserts x4. Differs from earned payment because of
            atypical nature; rewards need not be positive but are in some sense
            deserved from the point of view of the rewarder: positive reward (=
            {zanyne'u}), punishment, penalty, demerit (= {malne'u},
            {sfane'u}); x4 may be a specific object, a commodity (mass), an
            event, or a property; pedantically, for objects / commodities, this
            is sumti-raising from ownership of the object / commodity (=
            {posne'u}, posyvelne'u for unambiguous {semantics}). See
            also {dunda}, {friti}, {jerna}, {jinga}, {jivna}, {pleji}, {sfasa},
            {venfu}, {prali}, {dapma}.

lojbo: le mi'u kerfa cu cnici le ka se ganzu fi le carmi
glico: The hair is neat in being organized into a shining part.
English_definition:
x1 is orderly / neat / ordered in property / quantity x2 (ka / ni).
            See also {cunso}, {kalsa}.

lojbo: .i do cnino mi le ka kakne le ka limna
glico: This is news to me that you can swim.
English_definition:
x1 is new / unfamiliar / novel to observer x2 in feature x3 (ka) by
            standard x4; x1 is a novelty. See also {nuzba}, {slabu}, {citno}, se
            {djuno}.

lojbo: .i cnino fa no cnita be le solri
glico: Nothing is new under the Sun.
English_definition:
x1 is new / unfamiliar / novel to observer x2 in feature x3 (ka) by
            standard x4; x1 is a novelty. See also {nuzba}, {slabu}, {citno}, se
            {djuno}.

lojbo: ra pu troci le ka zbasu le solji le cnisa

English_definition:

            heavy, malleable, soft metal]. See also {jinme}, {tinci}.

lojbo: le mi'u pelji cu cnita le mi'u cukta
glico: The paper is below the book.
English_definition:

            down from x2 in frame of reference x3. Also underside, nether. See
            also {dizlo}, {gapru}, {galtu}, {farna}, {loldi}.

lojbo: lu le ractu co melbi li'u dunli lu le melbi ractu li'u
glico:
"Pretty bunnies" is the same as "bunnies, the
            pretty".
English_definition:
tanru inversion operator; ... of type ...; allows modifier trailing
            sumti without sumti links.

lojbo: pu co'a ru'i carvi
glico: It started raining.
English_definition:
interval event contour: at the starting point of ...; initiative
            >|< |.

lojbo: le plise co'a fusra
glico: The apple has begun to decay.
English_definition:
interval event contour: at the starting point of ...; initiative
            >|< |.

lojbo: co'a pelxu
glico: It's turning yellow.
English_definition:
interval event contour: at the starting point of ...; initiative
            >|< |.

lojbo: do pu co'a lazni
glico: You became lazy.
English_definition:
interval event contour: at the starting point of ...; initiative
            >|< |.

lojbo: mu'i ma do co'e mi
glico: Why are you doing this to me?
English_definition: elliptical / unspecified bridi relationship.

lojbo: za'o co'e
glico: It's going on for too long.
English_definition: elliptical / unspecified bridi relationship.

lojbo: .ei do troci le ka co'e bu'u lo drata
glico: You should try it somewhere else.
English_definition: elliptical / unspecified bridi relationship.

lojbo:
mi pu co'i nai citka pa mango ca le nu ra co'i klama le
            nenri
glico: I was eating a mango when she entered.
English_definition:
interval event contour: at the instantaneous point of ...;
            achievative / perfective; point event >|<.

lojbo: mi co'i cirko
glico: I've lost it.
English_definition:
interval event contour: at the instantaneous point of ...;
            achievative / perfective; point event >|<.

lojbo: co'o le tumla pe mi
glico: Goodbye, my land!
English_definition: vocative: partings / good-bye.

lojbo: co'o ro do
glico: Goodbye to all of you!
English_definition: vocative: partings / good-bye.

lojbo: co'oi le pendo be mi
glico: Ciao, my friend!
English_definition:
Combination of {coi} and {co'o}, indicating either greetings or
            partings according to context. The scalar negated forms of this COI
            are apparently identical to its positive form. cf. {coi},
            {co'o}, {rinsa}, {tolrinsa}.

lojbo: mi pu co'u pinxe le stasu
glico: I sopped eating a soup.
English_definition:
interval event contour: at the ending point of ... even if not done;
            cessative | >< |.

lojbo: coi le munje
glico: Hello, world!
English_definition: vocative: greetings / hello.

lojbo: coi ro do
glico: Hello, everyone!
English_definition: vocative: greetings / hello.

lojbo: le mi'u verba cu cokcu le ladru le tatru le moklu
glico: Children suck up milk from breast into the mouth.
English_definition:
x1 soaks up / absorbs / sucks up x2 from x3 into x4; x1 is an
            absorbant. See also {panje}, {sakci}, {lacpu}.

lojbo: ti voi xamsi cu condi le ka sraji vau le sefta be vo'a
