lojbo: mi pu citka le stasu poi vasru le nudle
glico: I ate a soup with noodles.

lojbo: mi pu citka le nudle ca le cabdei pa re'u
glico: Today was the first time I ate noodles.

lojbo: le mi'u pa xrula cu nukni
glico: The flower has a magenta color.
English_definition:
x1 is magenta / fuchsia / purplish-red [color adjective]. See also
            {skari}, {blabi}, {xekri}, {kandi}, {carmi}, {xunre}, {zirpu}.

lojbo: mi pu nupre fi la alis le ka sidju ri va'o le nu ri smaji
glico:
I made Alice a promise to help her on condition that she keeps
            silence.
English_definition:
x1 (agent) promises / commits / assures / threatens x2 (event /
            state) to x3 [beneficiary / victim]. See also {kajde}, {xusra}.

lojbo: le mi'u nurma cu jai pluka
glico: The countryside is pleasant.
English_definition:
x1 is a rural / rustic / pastoral area of x2; x1 is in the country.
            See also {jarbu}, {rarna}, {tcadu}, {cange}.

lojbo:
la lojban cu nutli le ka ma kau mapti ce'u le ka traji fi le
            kulnu
glico: Lojban is neutral in terms of what culture matches it best.
English_definition:
x1 is neutral / not taking sides / medial / not towards any extreme
            on scale / in dissension x2. Also x2 dispute / struggle (though x2
            is not limited to disagreements, which is merely one manifestation
            of scalar or distributed values in which there is a medial
            position). See also {midju}, {lanxe}, {milxe}, {mutce}, cmavo list
            {no'e}.

lojbo: ma nuzba
glico: What's up? What are the news?
English_definition:
x1 (du'u) is news / tidings / new information about subject x2
            from source x3, to observer x4. See also {cnino}, {notci}.

lojbo: no da nuzba fi mi fo do
glico: No news from me for you.
English_definition:
x1 (du'u) is news / tidings / new information about subject x2
            from source x3, to observer x4. See also {cnino}, {notci}.

lojbo: le nuzba be le mi'u tcini pu se terpa
glico: News about the situation were frightening.
English_definition:
x1 (du'u) is news / tidings / new information about subject x2
            from source x3, to observer x4. See also {cnino}, {notci}.

lojbo: nuzba fa le nu mi pu te vecnu pa fonxa
glico: The news are that I bought a phone.
English_definition:
x1 (du'u) is news / tidings / new information about subject x2

lojbo: le du'u no da nuzba cu xamgu nuzba
glico: No news are good news.
English_definition:
x1 (du'u) is news / tidings / new information about subject x2

glico: Oops, I mailed to a wrong address.
English_definition:

glico: I am embarrassed.

glico: I feel ashamed.
English_definition:
attitudinal: pride - modesty / humility - shame. See also {jgira},

lojbo: o'a nai

lojbo: o'a nai

glico: Leave me alone, I'm thinking.

lojbo: o'o ko za'u re'u troci

glico: Ok, what was your motive to do it?

glico: Where is the mother after all?
English_definition:

lojbo: o'u ba'o vlile tcima
glico: Phew, the storm is over.
English_definition:

lojbo: o'u cu'i mi pu tinbe le se flalu
glico: I followed the law.
English_definition:
attitudinal: relaxation - composure - stress. See also {surla},

lojbo: o'u nai le bersa be mi za'o na volta
glico: My son is still not back.
English_definition:
attitudinal: relaxation - composure - stress. See also {surla},

glico: Ouch, my leg!

lojbo: oi nai vifne djacu
glico: Fresh water, how nice.
English_definition:
attitudinal: complaint - pleasure. See also {pante}, {pluka},

lojbo: mi ba citka le omle be le sovda jo'u le tamca
glico: I will eat an omelette made with eggs and tomatoes.

lojbo: do o nai mi lumci le mi'u kumfa
glico: Either you clean the room or I do.

lojbo: pa planeta cu xamgu lei remna
glico: There is one planet for humanity.
English_definition: digit / number: 1 (digit) [one].

lojbo: pa smoka cu cpana le jubme
glico: There is exactly one sock on the table.
English_definition: digit / number: 1 (digit) [one].

lojbo: le ninmu ne pa'a la alis cu se kanla le crino
glico: The woman is like Alice except that the woman has green eyes.
English_definition:
panra modal, 1st place (parallel; shared property) similarly; in

lojbo: pa'e le mi'u stasu cu xlali
glico: In my unbiased opinion, the soup is terrible.
English_definition:

lojbo: pa'e nai le za'u pixra poi mi finti cu traji le ka zabna
glico: Of course, I'm biased, but my paintings are the best.
English_definition:
discursive: justice - prejudice. See also {tcinydracu'a},
            {tcinydrapai}, {vudypai}.

lojbo: ta'i da do pu pu'i limna pa'o le mi'u rirxe
glico: Somehow, you were able to swim across the river.
English_definition:
location tense relation / direction; transfixing / passing through
            ...

lojbo: mi pacna fi li so'a fe le nu solri ba zi
glico: I hope it will be sunny soon.
English_definition:
x1 hopes / wishes for / desires x2 (event), expected likelihood x3
            (0-1); x1 hopes that x2 happens. Also: x1 is hopeful of x2; x2 will
            hopefully occur, as hoped for by x1; the value of x3 is a subjective
            estimate of likeliness according to x1, and is the basic determinant
            of whether pacna means 'hope' or 'wish' or
            'expect': hoping for objects / states with negligible
            expectation is 'wishing'; if the state is plausibly
            likely, it is 'hoping'; when the probability is
            subjectively near 1, the attitude is described as
            'expecting'; the value will usually be expressed using
            inexact numbers ('{li} {piso'u}' to '{li}
            {piro}'); wish (= {sotpa'a}), hope (= {sorpa'a}),
            expect (= {sojypa'a}). See also {djica}.

lojbo: mi pacna fi li so'u fe le nu do klama
glico: I wish you came.
English_definition:
x1 hopes / wishes for / desires x2 (event), expected likelihood x3
            (0-1); x1 hopes that x2 happens. Also: x1 is hopeful of x2; x2 will
            hopefully occur, as hoped for by x1; the value of x3 is a subjective
            estimate of likeliness according to x1, and is the basic determinant
            of whether pacna means 'hope' or 'wish' or
            'expect': hoping for objects / states with negligible
            expectation is 'wishing'; if the state is plausibly
            likely, it is 'hoping'; when the probability is
            subjectively near 1, the attitude is described as
            'expecting'; the value will usually be expressed using
            inexact numbers ('{li} {piso'u}' to '{li}
            {piro}'); wish (= {sotpa'a}), hope (= {sorpa'a}),
            expect (= {sojypa'a}). See also {djica}.

lojbo: le risna cu pagbu le xadni
glico: Heart is a part of body.
English_definition:
x1 is a part / component / piece / portion / segment of x2 [where x2
            is a whole / mass]; x2 is partly x1. Partly (= {selpau}). See also
            cmavo list {pa'u}, {mulno}, {xadba}, {spisa}, {gunma}, {rafsi}.

lojbo:
le mi'u trene mo'u pagre le mi'u manku kevna pa nurma
            le jarbu
glico:
The train passed the dark hole to reach a rural area from the
            suburbs of the city.
English_definition:
x1 passes through / penetrates barrier / medium / portal x2 to
            destination side x3 from origin side x4. Passing through in both
            directions (= rolfargre, pagre ... .i so'ivo'ivo'u
            (and vice versa)). See also {bitmu}, {denci}, {ganlo}, {kalri},
            {vorme}, {pluta}, {canko}, {ragve}.

lojbo: li pai du li ji'i ci pi pa vo pa mu so
glico: The number  (pi) is approximately 3.14159.
English_definition: digit / number: pi (approximately 3.1416...).

lojbo:
le nenri be le cirkulo be li re pi'i ry cu klani li pai
            pi'i ry te'o re
glico:
The area of a circle of diameter "2  r" is equal to  
            r<sup>2</sup>.
English_definition: digit / number: pi (approximately 3.1416...).

lojbo: le mi'u te cange pu pajni le du'u xu kau le grute cu makcu
glico: The farmer was deciding whether fruits were ripe.
English_definition:
x1 judges / referees / arbitrates / is a judge determining /
            deciding matter x2 (abstract). x2 includes jei = rule (jetpai), ni =
            estimate (lairpai), ka = evaluate (kairpai or vampai), or nu =
            referee / arbitrate (faurpai); single events of judging including
            specific decisions / judgements (= {paijdi}, {jetpaijdi},
            {lairpaijdi}, {kairpaijdi}, {vampaijdi}, {faurpaijdi}); jury (=
            {pairkamni}), serve on a jury (= kamnypai, as part of mass x1). See
            also {cuxna}, {jdice}, {vajni}, {cipra}, {zekri}, {manri}, {mansa}.

lojbo: pu se palci do fa le ka lebna le jdini
glico: It was wicked of you to take money.
English_definition:
x1 is evil / depraved / wicked [morally bad] by standard x2. See
            also {zekri}, {vrude}, {xlali}, {marde}, {mabla}.

lojbo: xu do ca dasni le palku
glico: Are you wearing trousers?
English_definition:
x1 are pants / trousers / slacks / leggings [legged garment] of
            material x2. See also {taxfu}, {pastu}, {skaci}.

lojbo: mi pu cpare le palma tricu
glico: I climbed a palm tree.
English_definition:
x1 is a palm tree (Palmae / Arecaceae) of species x2 Cf.
            {tricnrarekake}, {tricu}, {kokso}, {grasu}, {narge}

lojbo: ti palne le palta jo'u le kabri
glico: This is a tray with plates and cups on it.
English_definition:
x1 is a tray / platter / flat container [pan / sheet / griddle] of
            contents x2, and made of material x3. Also pallet, when used for
            carrying rather than support on the ground; a tray is flat-bottomed
            and shallow or without a rim, and is generally portable. See also
            {tansi}, {patxu}, {palta}, {ckana}.

lojbo: mi palpi le sefta be le najnimre i ri se sefta le xutla
glico: I can touch-feel the surface of an orange. It is soft.
English_definition:
x1 palpates / palps / touch-feels x2 (surface structure) See
            {pencu}, {sefta}, {ganse}

lojbo: mi pu jai gau porpi fai le palta
glico: I broke a plate.
English_definition:
x1 is a plate / dish / platter / saucer [flat / mildly concave food
            service bed] made of material x2. See also {ckana}, {palne},
            {kabri}, {tansi}, {ckana}.

lojbo: le mi'u palta co'a porpi
glico: The plate got broken.
English_definition:
x1 is a plate / dish / platter / saucer [flat / mildly concave food
            service bed] made of material x2. See also {ckana}, {palne},
            {kabri}, {tansi}, {ckana}.

lojbo: ti pambe le vacri le xislu le bartu
glico: This is a pump for filling up the air into wheels from the outside.
English_definition:
x1 is a pump / injector [tool / apparatus] pumping / inserting fluid
            x2 to x3 from x4 by means x5. x2 fluid may be liquid or gas; x5 may
            be a force; a pump generally causes a pressure gradient, such that
            x3 is a place of lower pressure, x4 a place of higher pressure. (cf.
            {gapci}, {litki}, {rinci}; metaphorical use of {fepri} for gas,
            {risna} for liquid, {rinci}, {tutci})

lojbo: mi sumne le panci be le najnimre i ri se panci le xrula
glico: I can smell a scent of an orange. It has a scent of flowers.
English_definition:
x1 is an odor / fragrance / scent / smell emitted by x2 and detected
            by observer / sensor x3. An undetected emitter is odorless to the
            observer. See also {nazbi}, {sumne}, {cpina}, {vrusi}.

lojbo: mi te panci le najnimre le xrula
glico: I can smell an orange smelling of flowers.
English_definition:
x1 is an odor / fragrance / scent / smell emitted by x2 and detected
            by observer / sensor x3. An undetected emitter is odorless to the
            observer. See also {nazbi}, {sumne}, {cpina}, {vrusi}.

lojbo: le mi'u kumfa cu je'a se panci le mabla
glico: The room really stinks.
English_definition:
x1 is an odor / fragrance / scent / smell emitted by x2 and detected
            by observer / sensor x3. An undetected emitter is odorless to the
            observer. See also {nazbi}, {sumne}, {cpina}, {vrusi}.

lojbo: iu nai panci fa le kalci
glico: Yuck, it smells like shit.
English_definition:
x1 is an odor / fragrance / scent / smell emitted by x2 and detected
            by observer / sensor x3. An undetected emitter is odorless to the
            observer. See also {nazbi}, {sumne}, {cpina}, {vrusi}.

lojbo: le mi'u panje cu cokcu le so'i djacu
glico: The sponge absorbs a lot of water.
English_definition:
x1 is a quantity of / contains / is made of sponge / porous
            material. Also metaphorically used for coral, Swiss cheese. See also
            cokcu for a generalized {absorbant}.

lojbo:
mi se pluka le ka cadzu bu'u le panka fau le ka kansa lei pendo
            be mi
glico: I like to walk in the parks with my friends.
English_definition:
x1 is a park / land reserve managed by community / polity / company
            x2 for purpose x3. See also {sorcu}, {zdile}, {klaji}, {purdi}.

lojbo: ti panlo le nanba
glico: This is a slice of bread.
English_definition:
x1 is a slice [thin flat portion] of x2 (mass). See also {spisa},
            {pagbu}, {nanba}.

lojbo: le mi'u mensi ca panpi le bruna be vo'a
glico: The sister is now at piece with her brother.
English_definition:
x1 is at peace with x2. (cf. jamna; use sarxe, smaji, tugni for most
            metaphorical extensions, cilce, jamna)

lojbo: zo pacna zo kanpe panra le ka valsi le ka djica
glico:
The word {pacna} is parallel to {kanpe} differing in that {pacna}
            describes desire and {kanpe} doesn't.
English_definition:
x1 parallels x2 differing only in property x3 (ka; jo'u /
            fa'u term) by standard / geometry x4. Also: x1 is parallel to
            x2, x3 is the only difference between x1 and x2 (= {terpanra} for
            reordered places); x1 and x2 are alike / similar / congruent. A
            parallel involves extreme close similarity / correspondence across
            the entirety of the things being compared, generally involving
            multiple properties, with focus placed on one or a small number of
            differences. See also {pa'a}, {mintu}, {simsa}, {girzu},
            {vrici}.

lojbo:
le za'u gunka pu pante le ka te pleji ma kau vau lei turni
            ta'i le nu de'a gunka
glico:
Workers complained about their salary to the management by halting
            their work.
English_definition:
x1 protests / objects to / complains about x2 (event / state) to
            audience x3 with action x4. (x4 is an event or tu'a quotation)
            See also {xarnu}.

lojbo: le mi'u nixli cu panzi la alis
glico: The girl is Alice's child.
English_definition:
x1 is a [biological] offspring / child / kid / hybrid of parent(s)
            x2; (adjective:) x1 is filial. See also {grute}, {verba}, {bersa},
            {tixnu}, se {rorci}, {patfu}.

lojbo: ko catlu ti noi papri le cukta
glico: Look at this page of the book.
English_definition:
x1 is a [physical] page / leaf of book / document / bound mass of
            pages x2. Numbered pages (as in a book) are the sides of a page (=
            {paprysfe}, {paprysfelai}); a pageful of text (= {papryseltcidu},
            {paprytcidylai}). See also {karni}, {pelji}, {prina}, {xatra},
            {vreji}, {pezli}, {cukta}, {ciska}.

lojbo: li re parbi li vo li re
glico: 2 is the ratio of 4 with respect to 2.
English_definition:
x1 (me'o, fraction) is a ratio / rate of x2 (quantity) with
            respect to x3 (quantity), [x2:x3]. Also x1 fraction / proportion /
            quotient; x2 dividend / numerator; x3 divisor / denominator. See
            also {frinu}, {dilcu}, {mekso}.

lojbo:
le cmalu cu parbi le temci be le cabna bei le nu cliva vau le temci
            be le nu cliva bei le nu volta
glico:
It's a small fraction of the time from now until leaving with
            respect to the time from leaving until returning.
English_definition:
x1 (me'o, fraction) is a ratio / rate of x2 (quantity) with
            respect to x3 (quantity), [x2:x3]. Also x1 fraction / proportion /
            quotient; x2 dividend / numerator; x3 divisor / denominator. See
            also {frinu}, {dilcu}, {mekso}.

lojbo: le vi curnu cu parji le xarju
glico: This worm is a parasite in pigs.
English_definition: x1 is a parasite of x2. see also {civla}, {cipnrkuku}, {xidnora}

lojbo: ma ba participe le ka casnu
glico: Who will participate in the discussion?

lojbo: do poi dasni ti noi pastu cu simlu le ka citno nixli
glico: In this dress, you look like a young girl.
English_definition:
x1 is a robe / tunic / gown / cloak / dress / [coveralls] [a long /
            full body garment] of material x2. Also coveralls (= {paspalku}).
            See also {kosta}, {taxfu}, {palku}.

lojbo: le patfu be mi cu gunka bu'u la tokiios
glico: My father works in Tokio.

lojbo: au pei stasu le patlu
glico: Would you like potato soup?
English_definition:
x1 is a potato [an edible tuber] of variety / cultivar x2. (use
            samcu for starchy / tuberous roots that do not reproduce from eyes
            of tuber); See also {genja}, {jalna}, {samcu}.

lojbo: mi pu bevri pa patxu be le djacu
glico: I brought a pot of water.
English_definition:
x1 is a pot / kettle / urn / tub / sink, a deep container for
            contents x2, of material / properties x3. (cf. tansi, palne for
            depth; baktu, botpi for open / lidded)

lojbo:
pau do retsku le se du'u ma krinu su'o nu balvi vau ji
            su'o nu pilno
glico:
You are asking of what is the reason for something happening in the
            future, and/or in usage. What is that reason, and is it for
            something happening in the future, a usage, or both?
English_definition: discursive: optional question premarker. See also {preti}.

lojbo: le prenu cu bebna ki'u ma pau nai
glico: Why people are so stupid?
English_definition: discursive: optional question premarker. See also {preti}.

lojbo: ti du le pa karce pe la alis
glico: This is a car of my friend.
English_definition:
restrictive relative phrase marker: which is associated with ...;
            loosest associative / possessive.

lojbo: le pendo be mi cu jai fenki i le pendo pe mi cu jai fenki
glico: My friend is crazy.
English_definition:
restrictive relative phrase marker: which is associated with ...;
            loosest associative / possessive.

lojbo: ti me le karce pe mi
glico: This is my car.
English_definition:
restrictive relative phrase marker: which is associated with ...;
            loosest associative / possessive.

lojbo: le ditcu cu jdini pe'a
glico: Time is money.
English_definition:
marks a construct as figurative (non-literal / metaphorical) speech
            / text.

lojbo: le mi'u nanmu cu lanbi pe'a
glico: He is a "sheep" (figuratively).
English_definition:
marks a construct as figurative (non-literal / metaphorical) speech
            / text.

lojbo: mi xagji pe'a le ka tavla
glico: I'm hungry for talking.
English_definition:
marks a construct as figurative (non-literal / metaphorical) speech
            / text.

lojbo: mi xagji pe'a nai
glico: I'm literally hungry.
English_definition:
marks a construct as figurative (non-literal / metaphorical) speech
            / text.

lojbo: pe'i do drani
glico: I think you are right.
English_definition: evidential: I opine (subjective claim). See also {jinvi}.

lojbo: pe'i vamji fa le nu retsku
glico: I think it's worth asking.
English_definition: evidential: I opine (subjective claim). See also {jinvi}.

lojbo: ko zgana ti pe'u la alis
glico: Look at this, please, Alice!
English_definition: vocative: please.

lojbo: .i .au pei mi kansa do
glico: Do you want me to accompany you?
English_definition:
attitudinal: attitudinal question; how do you feel about it? with
            what intensity?.

lojbo: .i pei mi'o zvati le nu salci
glico: What about going to the party?
English_definition:
attitudinal: attitudinal question; how do you feel about it? with
            what intensity?.

lojbo: mi pu ciska pa xatra le blabi pelji
glico: I wrote a letter on a white paper.
English_definition:
x1 is paper from source x2. Sheet of paper (= {plekarda} if shape is
            important, {plebo'o}). See also {karni}, {papri}, {prina}.

lojbo: xu do su'o roi smaka le rusko pelmeni
glico: Have you at least once tasted Russian pelmeni?

lojbo: le'e badna cu pelxu
glico: A typical banana is yellow.
English_definition:
x1 is yellow / golden [color adjective]. See also {skari}, {blabi},
            {xekri}, {kandi}, {carmi}, {narju}, {solji}.

lojbo: mi finti le pemci be le vrici prenu
glico: I create poems about different people.
English_definition:
x1 is a poem / verse about plot / theme / subject / pattern x2 by
            author x3 for intended audience x4. x2 may be a convention rather
            than a subject. See also {prosa}, {rimni}, {rilti}, {finti},
            {lisri}, {sanga}.

lojbo: tu penbi le blanu e nai le xekri
glico: That is a blue, not black pen.
English_definition:
x1 is a pen using ink x2 applied by process x3. See also {ciska},
            {pinsi}, {xinmo}, {pimlu}.

lojbo: mi pu pencu le vorme ta'i le nu mi pilno le canpa
glico: I touched a worm with a spade.
English_definition:
x1 (agent) touches x2 with x3 [a locus on x1 or an instrument] at x4
            [a locus on x2]. See also {ganse}, {darxi}, {jgari}, {penmi},
            {jorne}, {satre}, {mosra}, {zgana}.

lojbo: xu la alis cu pendo do
glico: Is Alice your friend?
English_definition:
x1 is / acts as a friend of / to x2 (experiencer); x2 befriends x1.
            See also {bradi}, {xendo}, {nelci}, {prami}, {bradi}.

lojbo: mi mutce se pluka le ka penmi do
glico: I am pleased to meet you.
English_definition:
x1 meets / encounters x2 at / in location x3. See also {jorne},
            {jikca}, {pencu}.

lojbo: mi pu penmi pa cizra prenu le jipno be le mi'u cmana
glico: I encountered a strange person at the tip of the mountain.
English_definition:
x1 meets / encounters x2 at / in location x3. See also {jorne},
            {jikca}, {pencu}.

lojbo: mi pensi le nu mi pu zvati ma kau
glico: I'm thinking of where I was.
English_definition:
x1 thinks / considers / cogitates / reasons / is pensive about /
            reflects upon subject / concept x2. Also: x1 is thoughtful (one
            sense); x2 is mental (one sense) / intellectual (one sense) (=
            {selpei}). See also cmavo list {pe'i}, {jijnu}, {menli},
            {morji}, {sidbo}, {jinvi}, se {nabmi}, {minra}, {lanli}, {besna},
            {saske}, {skami}.

lojbo: mi pu pensi le nu mi volta le mi'u zdani
glico: I was thinking of returning back home.
English_definition:
x1 thinks / considers / cogitates / reasons / is pensive about /
            reflects upon subject / concept x2. Also: x1 is thoughtful (one
            sense); x2 is mental (one sense) / intellectual (one sense) (=
            {selpei}). See also cmavo list {pe'i}, {jijnu}, {menli},
            {morji}, {sidbo}, {jinvi}, se {nabmi}, {minra}, {lanli}, {besna},
            {saske}, {skami}.

lojbo: mi binxo le perli se ja'e le nu mi citka le perli
glico: I become a pear because I eat pears.
English_definition: x1 is a pear [fruit] of species / strain x2. See also {grute}.

lojbo: au flaume pesxu
glico: I'd like some plum jam.
English_definition:
x1 is paste / pulp / dough / mash / mud / slurry [soft,
            smooth-textured, moist solid] of composition x2. x2: composition
            including x2, which need not be complete specification. See also
            {marxa}, {kliti}, {tarla}.

lojbo:
lo ka kantu lo ka gusni cu ka muvdu ca ro snidu fo lu'i lo
            petso be le ka mitre be li ji'i so pi mu vau bei le ka clani
glico: 1 light-year is approximately 9.5 Petameters (Pm).
English_definition:
x1 is $10^{15}$ of x2 in dimension / aspect x3 (default is units).
            See also {grake}, {mitre}, {snidu}, {stero}, {delno}, {molro},
            {kelvo}, {xampo}, {gradu}, {litce}, {merli}, {centi}, {decti},
            {dekto}, {femti}, {gigdo}, {gocti}, {gotro}, {kilto}, {megdo},
            {mikri}, {milti}, {nanvi}, {picti}, {terto}, {xatsi}, {xecto},
            {xexso}, {zepti}, {zetro}

lojbo: le pezli be le tricu co'a pelxu ca le critu
glico: Leaves of tress become yellow in the autumn.
English_definition:
x1 is a leaf of plant x2; x1 is foliage of x2. See also {tricu},
            {papri}, {spati}.

lojbo: le vacri ca kelvo li ji'i re so ci pi mu
glico: It's around 293.5 degrees Kelvin (20.5 degrees Celsius).
English_definition: digit / number: radix (number base) point; default decimal.

lojbo: ko tcidu le te fendi poi pa pi'e ci mu moi
glico: Read the section 1.35.
English_definition:
digit / number:separates digits for base >16, not current
            standard, or variable (e.g. time, date).

lojbo: li re pi'i mu du li pa no
English_definition:
n-ary mathematical operator: times; multiplication operator; [(((a *
            b) * c) * ...)].

lojbo:
le mango o nai bo le plise o nai bo le perli pi'u le xunre a bo
            le pelxu cu vo mei
glico:
The Cartesian product of mangoes, apples and pears that are either
            red or yellow has 6 members.
English_definition: non-logical connective: cross product; Cartesian product of sets.

lojbo:
lo ka ratni loi cidro cu ka picti le ka mitre li re mu vau le ka
            clani
glico: The atom of hydrogen is 25 picometers in size.
English_definition:
x1 is a trillionth [$10^{-12}$] of x2 in dimension / aspect x3
            (default is units). Cf. {grake}, {mitre}, {snidu}, {stero}, {delno},
            {molro}, {kelvo}, {xampo}, {gradu}, {litce}, {merli}, {centi},
            {decti}, {dekto}, {femti}, {gigdo}, {gocti}, {gotro}, {kilto},
            {megdo}, {mikri}, {milti}, {nanvi}, {petso}, {terto}, {xatsi},
            {xecto}, {xexso}, {zepti}, {zetro}.

lojbo: ko dunda fi mi fe pa pijne be le pelji
glico: Give me a pin for fastening paper.
English_definition:
x1 is a pin / peg (needle-shaped tool) for fastening to / piercing
            x2, of material / properties x3. See also {jesni}, {nivji}, {fenso},
            {dinko}, {tutci}.

lojbo: la kevin pu pikci la alis le ka stali
glico: Kevin begged Alice to stay.
English_definition:
x1 begs / pleads / supplicates / entreats / implores / beseeches /
            prays [asks with humility] x2 for x3. Also importune, petition,
            plea, solicit; x2 benefactor, patron; x3 boon, favor, gift, alms.
            See also {cpedu} which is more general as to manner, {pindi}.

lojbo: mi pu te vecnu re pikta be le verba bei le ka klama la boston
glico: I bought two child tickets to Boston.
English_definition:
x1 is a ticket entitling x2 to entitlement / privilege x3 (event /
            state) under conditions x4. See also {jaspu}.

lojbo: le flira be do cu pilda i ma krinu
glico: Your face is pale. What happened?
English_definition: x1 is pale See {kandi}, {blabi}, {grusi}

lojbo: li bi pilji li re li vo
English_definition:
x1 is the product / total / result of factors / multiplicands (x2
            and x3) x2 multiplied by x3. See also {mekso}, {sumji}, {rapli},
            {jalge}.

lojbo: le mi'u najnimre co'u se pilka
glico: The orange has been peeled off.
English_definition:
x1 is a crust / rind / peel / skin / hide / outer cover of x2. (cf.
            {grute}, {calku}, {skapi} (pilka as a general term includes skapi),
            {gacri})

lojbo: mi pu vimcu le pilka be le mi'u plise
glico: I peeled the apple off.
English_definition:
x1 is a crust / rind / peel / skin / hide / outer cover of x2. (cf.
            {grute}, {calku}, {skapi} (pilka as a general term includes skapi),
            {gacri})

lojbo: le pilka be le mi'u plise cu cinla
glico: The peel of the apple is thin.
English_definition:
x1 is a crust / rind / peel / skin / hide / outer cover of x2. (cf.
            {grute}, {calku}, {skapi} (pilka as a general term includes skapi),
            {gacri})

lojbo: .i ra pu pilno le skami le nu facki le se nitcu
glico: He used a computer to get the necessary information.
English_definition:
x1 uses / employs x2 [tool, apparatus, machine, agent, acting
            entity, material] for purpose x3. Also utilize; x2 is useful / used
            productively by x1 to do x3 (= selpli for reordered places); hire /
            employ (= {le'ipli}, {lejyplicu'a}). (cf. {tutci},
            {cabra}, {minji}, {gasnu}, {zukte} for x2, cmavo list {pi'o},
            {sazri}, {jibri})

lojbo: ti pimlu le cipni pe mi
glico: This is a feather of my bird.
English_definition:
x1 is a / the feather / plume(s) / plumage [body-part] of animal /
            species x2. See also {cipni}, {nalci}, {rebla}, {kerfa}, {penbi}.

lojbo: le pinca be ko cu zvati le patxu
glico: Pee to the pot.
English_definition:
x1 is a / the urine / piss / pee of x2. See also {vikmi}, {xasne},
            {kalci}, {mabla}, {festi}.

lojbo: le se pincivi be ko cu zvati le patxu
glico: Pee to the pot.

lojbo: gau le betka ra pincivi le xunre
glico: Due to beetroots, he pissed red.

lojbo: le mi'u nakni cu pindi le ka ponse no xirma
glico: He is poor in that he doesn't own a horse.
English_definition:
x1 is poor / indigent / impoverished / lacking in goods /
            possessions / property x2. x2 is scanty / meager / lacking for x1.
            See also {ricfu}, {claxu}, {nitcu}, {pikci}.

lojbo: mi'a pu pinfu le zdani be mi'a le nu snime carvi
glico: We became prisoners of our home due to the snowfall.
English_definition:
x1 is a prisoner / captive of x2, restrained / held / confined by
            means / force x3. See also {zifre}, {kavbu}, {rinju}, {ralte},
            {fanta}, {cilce}.

lojbo:
mi pu cusku fi lei rirni fe pa pinka be le nu pu se srera fa le nu
            klama le bartu ca le nu carvi
glico:
I commented to the parents that going outside while it had been
            raining had been a mistake.
English_definition:
x1 (text) is a comment / remark / observation about subject x2
            expressed by x3 to audience x4. Also: x3 comments / remarks / says
            x1 about x2 (= terselpinka for reordered places). See also {jinvi},
            {cusku}, {zgana}, {lanli}, {bacru}, {ciska}.

lojbo: au nai mi cusku le pinka
glico: I have no comment.
English_definition:
x1 (text) is a comment / remark / observation about subject x2
            expressed by x3 to audience x4. Also: x3 comments / remarks / says
            x1 about x2 (= terselpinka for reordered places). See also {jinvi},
            {cusku}, {zgana}, {lanli}, {bacru}, {ciska}.

lojbo: le mi'u nakni pu cusku le zabna pinka be le mi'u cukta
glico: He made a nice comment about the book.
English_definition:
x1 (text) is a comment / remark / observation about subject x2
            expressed by x3 to audience x4. Also: x3 comments / remarks / says
            x1 about x2 (= terselpinka for reordered places). See also {jinvi},
            {cusku}, {zgana}, {lanli}, {bacru}, {ciska}.

lojbo: ti pinsi le xunre
glico: This is a red pencil.
English_definition:
x1 is a pencil / crayon / stylus applying lead / marking material
            x2, frame / support [of material] x3. Also writing brush; x1
            stimulates substrate medium x2 to display marks; explicitly denoting
            a standard lead pencil (= {tabypinsi}). (cf. ciska, penbi (unlike
            the English equivalents, pinsi is the more general term over penbi),
            burcu, bakri)

lojbo: le nanmu pu ku pinta gi'e la'a sipna
glico: The man was in horizontal position and was probably sleeping.
English_definition:
x1 is flat / level / horizontal in gravity / frame of reference x2.
            See also {sraji}, {plita}, {xutla}.

lojbo: mi pinxe le tcati le mi'u kabri
glico: I drink tea from the cup.

lojbo: mi pu pinxe le glare ckafi pa kabri
glico: I drank a cup of hot coffee from a cup.

lojbo: xu do zgipli le pipno
glico: Do you play the piano?
English_definition:
x1 is a piano / harpsichord / synthesizer / organ; a keyboard
            musical instrument. See also {zgike}.

lojbo: ti pixra pa zbani mi poi pu zvati la nipon
glico: This is a picture of the coast that I made when I was in Japan.
English_definition:
x1 is a picture / illustration representing / showing x2, made by
            artist x3 in medium x4. Also (adjective:) x1 is pictorial /
            illustrative; drawing (= {xraselci'a}), x1 draws x2 (=
            xraci'a / xraci'a), image (= {xratai}), photo (=
            {kacmyxra}), take a photo (= {kacmyterxra}, {kacmyxragau},
            {kacmyxrazu'e}); sculpture, relief (= {blixra}). See also
            {ciska}, {cinta}, {prina}, {mupli}, {barna}, {skina}.

lojbo: le mi'u nanla cu plana le ka se betfu
glico: The boy is fat with his belly.
English_definition:
x1 is plump / fat / obese [excessively thick / bulbous / swollen] by
            standard x2. See also {cinla}, {rotsu}, {barda}, {punli}, {grasu}.

lojbo: le mi'u terdi cu melbi planeta
glico: The Earth is a beautiful planet.

lojbo: mi platu le ka klama la nipon vau le ka surla
glico: I'm planning to go to Japan to take rest.
English_definition:
x1 (agent) plans / designs / plots plan / arrangement / plot /
            [schematic] x2 for state / process x3. Also invents / organizes; x2
            design, scheme; the structure or layout of an object would be
            represented as a state in x3. See also {cartu}.

lojbo: mi pu pleji le se jerna le bersa be mi le ka sidju mi
glico: I paid my son for what he earned for helping me.
English_definition:
x1 pays / compensates / remunerates / [rewards] payment x2 to
            recipient / payee x3 for goods / services x4. Also x4 commodities;
            x4 may be a specific object, a commodity (mass), an event, or a
            property; pedantically, for objects / commodities, this is
            sumti-raising from ownership of the object / commodity (=
            {posle'i}, posyvelyle'i for unambiguous {semantics}); rent
            (= {jerle'i}, {lejyjbera}). (cf. canja, cnemu, friti, kargu,
            vecnu, jdima, prali, jerna, sfasa, dunda, jinga, dapma; see note at
            jdima on cost / price / value distinction, cirko, dirba)

lojbo: la edvard pu darxi le plibu be mi le jamfu
glico: Eduard hit my pubis with a foot.
English_definition:
x1 is a / the pubic area / external genitalia [body-part] of x2. See
            also {cinse}, {gletu}, {pinji}, {vibna}, {vlagi}, {ganti}, {mabla}.

lojbo: le mlatu pu plipe le bartu le dertu le galtu be le mi'u bitmu
glico: The cat jumped to the outside from the ground over the fence.
English_definition:
x1 (agent / object) leaps / jumps / springs / bounds to x2 from x3
            reaching height x4 propelled by x5. Place structure parallels klama;
            hence x4 may be a route-like expression. See also {bajra}, {stapa},
            {cpare}, {lafti}.

lojbo: le mi'u za'u plise cu makcu
glico: The apples are ripe.
English_definition: x1 is an apple [fruit] of species / strain x2. See also {grute}.

lojbo:
le toldi poi cpare le za'u xrula pe le mi'u loldi
            co'a se plita le melbi
glico:
Butterflies creeping along the flowers formed a beautiful flat
            shape.
English_definition:
x1 is a plane [2-dimensional shape / form] defined by points x2
            (set); x1 is flat / [smooth]. Also: x1 is even / planar / level. (x2
            is a set of points at least sufficient to define the plane); See
            also {xutla}, {sefta}, {tapla}, {karda}, {boxfo}, {pinta}.

lojbo: le mi'u te cange pu plixa le dertu pa barda
glico: The farmer ploughed the ground using a large plow.
English_definition:
x1 (agent) plows / furrows / tills [cuts into and turns up] x2 with
            tool x3 propelled by x4. See also {kakpa}, {sraku}, {katna},
            {skuro}.

lojbo: le ka tavla cu plixau do le rinka be le nu do certu la lojban
glico: Talking would be useful for you in becoming an expert in Lojban.

lojbo: le mi'u tcini cu pluja le ka se ciksi
glico: The situation is hard to explain.
English_definition:
x1 is complex / complicated / involved in aspect / property x2 (ka)
            by standard x3. Also tangled, confused. See also {cfipu}, {banli},
            {sampu}, {jgena}.

lojbo: mi se pluka le ka ci'erkei la tenis
glico: I like playing tennis.
English_definition:
x1 (event / state) seems pleasant to / pleases x2 under conditions
            x3. See also {rigni}, cmavo list {pu'a}, {melbi}, {nelci},
            {prami}.

lojbo: mi se pluka le ka limna le xamsi
glico: I enjoy swimming in the sea.
English_definition:
x1 (event / state) seems pleasant to / pleases x2 under conditions
            x3. See also {rigni}, cmavo list {pu'a}, {melbi}, {nelci},
            {prami}.

lojbo:
pluta le aftobuso tcana ti fa le nu klama le zunle gi'e ba bo
            ze'a klama le crane gi'e ba bo klama le pritu
glico:
The route to the bus station from here is the following: you turn
            left, then go straight for a while, and then turn right.
English_definition:
x1 is a route / path / way / course / track to x2 from x3 via /
            defined by points including x4 (set). A route merely connects origin
            / destination, but need not be improved in any way; (x4 is a set of
            points at least sufficient to constrain the route relevantly). (cf.
            {litru}, {naxle}, {tcana}, {dargu}, {klaji}, ve {klama}; {tadji},
            {zukte} for means to a goal, {klama}, {pagre})

lojbo:
mi pu cirko le ckiku po mi i ku'i mi ca'o ralte le ckiku
            po do
glico: I lost my keys. But I'm keeping your keys.
English_definition:
restrictive relative phrase marker: which is specific to ...; normal
            possessive physical / legal.

lojbo: le cidni po'e mi cu cortu
glico: My knee aches.
English_definition:
restrictive relative phrase marker: which belongs to ... ;
            inalienable possession.

lojbo:
le troci ku po'o snada i je ku'i le troci po'o cu
            fliba
glico: Only the one who tries, succeeds, and the one who only tries, fails.
English_definition:
discursive: uniquely, only, solely: the only relevant case. See also
            {pamei}, {mulno}, {frica}.

lojbo: po'o mi na kansa le mi'u fetsi
glico: The only thing is, I'm not with her.
English_definition:
discursive: uniquely, only, solely: the only relevant case. See also
            {pamei}, {mulno}, {frica}.

lojbo: mi pu te vecnu le jisra ku po'o
glico: I bought only some juice.
English_definition:
discursive: uniquely, only, solely: the only relevant case. See also
            {pamei}, {mulno}, {frica}.

lojbo: mi na zanru le ve sfasa noi po'o cu'i zekri
glico: I don't approve of punishments which, for one, are a crime.
English_definition:
discursive: uniquely, only, solely: the only relevant case. See also
            {pamei}, {mulno}, {frica}.

lojbo: mi pu te vecnu le titla ku po'o nai
glico: I bought candies among other things.
English_definition:
discursive: uniquely, only, solely: the only relevant case. See also
            {pamei}, {mulno}, {frica}.

lojbo: ra pu co'a speni pa ninmu poi pu se penmi bu'u le zarci
glico: He married a woman met in the store.
English_definition:
restrictive relative clause; attaches subordinate bridi with
            identifying information to a sumti.

lojbo: ra pu co'a speni pa ninmu
glico: He married a woman.
English_definition:
restrictive relative clause; attaches subordinate bridi with
            identifying information to a sumti.

lojbo: mi pu polje pa boxfo so'i da
glico: I wrinkled the sheet of paper in several places.
English_definition:
x1 (force) folds / creases x2 at locus / loci / forming crease(s) /
            bend(s) x3. For agentive folding (= {plogau}, {plozu'e}); use
            cardinal-value sumti in x3, or rapli, to indicate multiple folds.
            See also {korcu}, {cinje}, {boxfo}, {boxna}.

lojbo: xu ti me le misno ke ponjo finpe
glico: Is this a famous Japanese fish?
English_definition:
x1 reflects Japanese culture / nationality / language in aspect x2.
            See also {xazdo}, {daplu}.

lojbo: le mi'u prenu cu ponse pa karce le zekri
glico: The person owns the car illegally (not under official law).
English_definition:
x1 possesses / owns / has x2 under law / custom x3; x1 is owner /
            proprietor of x2 under x3. (x3 is generally more important to the
            concept than commonly accepted for the English equivalent, since the
            concept is broader when unconstrained, and the nature /
            interpretation of possession / ownership is very culturally
            dependent); See also {ckini}, {ralte}, {jitro}, {steci}, {srana},
            {tutra}, {turni}, {zivle}.

lojbo: le mi'u palta mo'u porpi so'i cmalu
glico: The plate broke into many small pieces.
English_definition:
x1 breaks / fractures / shatters / [splits / splinters / cracks]
            into pieces x2. See also {xrani}, {spofu}, se {katna}.

lojbo:
li pa ce'o li re ce'o li ci cu porsi le ka ce'u se
            dubmau ce'u vau le'i namcu
glico:
1, 2, 3 is a sequence of numbers where a number to the left is less
            than the number to the right.
English_definition:
x1 [ordered set] is sequenced / ordered / listed by comparison /
            rules x2 on unordered set x3. Also (adjective:) x1 is serial. (sets
            are completely specified); See also cmavo list {po'i}, {lidne},
            {liste}, {cmima}.

lojbo:
mi pu ganse le po'o porsi be fi le'i valsi i je mi na pu
            jimpe fi le smuni be le porsi
glico:
I could only see a sequence of words, the sequence the meaning of
            which I couldn't understand.
English_definition:
x1 [ordered set] is sequenced / ordered / listed by comparison /
            rules x2 on unordered set x3. Also (adjective:) x1 is serial. (sets
            are completely specified); See also cmavo list {po'i}, {lidne},
            {liste}, {cmima}.

lojbo: ra tavla fo le porto
glico: She speaks Portuguese.
English_definition:
x1 reflects Portuguese culture / nationality / language in aspect
            x2. See also {brazo}.

lojbo: ma prali do le ka tcidu le se cukta poi vasru no pixra
glico: What the use to you of reading a book that has no pictures?
English_definition:
x1 is a profit / gain / benefit / advantage to x2 accruing /
            resulting from activity / process x3. Also (fe) x2 profits from x3
            (= selterprali for reordered places); x1 may be a specific object, a
            commodity (mass), an event, or a property; pedantically, for objects
            / commodities, this is sumti-raising from ownership of the object /
            commodity (= selposprali for unambiguous {semantics}). See also
            {vecnu}, {cnemu}, {pleji}, {jinga}, {canja}, {sfasa}, {jerna},
            {jdima}, {dunda}, {zivle}.

lojbo: mi prami do
glico: I love you.
English_definition:
x1 loves / feels strong affectionate devotion towards x2 (object /
            state). Also: x1 is loving towards x2, x1 is a lover of x2 (one
            sense), x2 is beloved by x1 (= selpa'i for reordered places).
            See also {cinmo}, {xebni}, {nelci}, {djica}, {sinma}, {pluka},
            {kurji}, {pendo}, {speni}.

lojbo: xu mi na prane le ka melbi
glico: Am I not perfect in my beauty?
English_definition:
x1 is perfect / ideal / archetypical / faultless / flawless /
            un-improvable in property / aspect x2 (ka). Also without defect /
            error. See also {manfo}, {curve}, {traji}, {cfila}, {mulno}.

lojbo: mi prane le ka vitke le rirni de'i ro li jy dy ze
glico: I visit my parents every Sunday without fail.
English_definition:
x1 is perfect / ideal / archetypical / faultless / flawless /
            un-improvable in property / aspect x2 (ka). Also without defect /
            error. See also {manfo}, {curve}, {traji}, {cfila}, {mulno}.

lojbo:
le carvi pu fanta le nu le fagri cu preja le boske le mi'u
            foldi
glico: The rain kept the fire from spreading to the forest from the field.
English_definition:
x1 spreads / expands over / into x2 from initial state x3. See also
            {tcena}, {kuspe}, {ranji}, {fatri}, {muvdu}, {benji}.

lojbo: .i le xo prenu ca zvati ti voi kumfa
glico: How many people are in this room now?
English_definition:
x1 is a person / people (noun) [not necessarily human]; x1 displays
            personality / a persona. See also {nanmu}, {ninmu}, {remna},
            {zukte}, {sevzi}.

lojbo: mi pu cusku le preti poi du lu ma nuzba li'u
glico: I asked a question, "What are the news?"
English_definition:
x1 (quoted text) is a question / query about subject x2 by
            questioner x3 to audience x4. See also {nabmi}, {danfu}, {ciksi},
            {frati}, {spuda}, {cpedu}.

lojbo: do pu ja'a sai prije le ka skicu la'e di'u mi
glico: It was really wise of you to tell me about it.
English_definition:
x1 is wise / sage about matter x2 (abstraction) to observer x3. See
            also {bebna}.

lojbo: mi pu prije le ka vecnu le mi'u karce
glico: You were wise to sell the car.
English_definition:
x1 is wise / sage about matter x2 (abstraction) to observer x3. See
            also {bebna}.

lojbo: le mi'u minji na te prina le pelji le papri
glico: The machine isn't printing the document on the paper.

lojbo: le mi'u nanmu cu pritu le mi'u dinju mi
glico: The man is to the right of the house from my position.
English_definition:
x1 is to the right / right-hand side of x2 which faces /
            in-frame-of-reference x3. Also: x3 is the standard of orientation
            for x2. See also cmavo list {ri'u}, {mlana}, {crane}, {trixe},
            {farna}, {zunle}.

lojbo: mi co'i finti pa proga be le nu zmiku satre le mlatu
glico:
I have written a computer program for giving cats strokes
            automatically.

lojbo: ti cukta le prosa be le za'u kulnu
glico: This book contains prose about cultures.
English_definition:
x1 is prose about plot / theme / subject x2 by author x3 for
            intended audience x4. Non-poetic written text, without intentional
            rhyme or meter; x2 may be a convention rather than a subject. See
            also {cfika}, {lisri}, {cukta}, {pemci}, {finti}.

lojbo: le protoni cu kantu
glico: Proton is an elementary particle.

Making bread is a process with ingredients flour, water and eggs
            where {one mixes them} and then {cooks}.
English_definition:
x1 is a process with inputs x2, outputs / results x3, passing
            through steps / stages x4. x2 resource (= selru'e, but also
            ru'etci, (ru'er- / ruc- or selru'e- / selruc-
            modifying:) selxaksu, selsabji, livla). See also cmavo list
            {pu'e}, {farvi}, {tadji}, {grute}, {tcini}.

lojbo: pu carvi ca le prulamdei
glico: It rained yesterday.

lojbo:
mi pu penmi le mi'u nakni ca le prulamdei be le nu le mi'u
            nakni cu cliva
glico: I met him the day before he left.

lojbo: le mi'u bolci cu plipe ki'u le ka pruni
glico: The ball bounces because it is elastic.
English_definition: (adjective:) x1 is elastic / springy. See also {ckabu}, {tcena}.

lojbo: xu do terpa tu'a le pruxi
glico: Are you afraid of ghosts?
English_definition:
x1 is spiritual / pertains to the soul in nature [either energy or
            being]; x1 is ghostly / ethereal. Also soul (= {ruxse'i}). See
            also {censa}, {lijda}, {mucti}, {xadni}.

lojbo: .i mi pu na ku viska le mlatu
glico: I didn't see the cat.
English_definition:
time tense relation / direction: did [selbri]; before / prior to
            [sumti]; default past tense.

lojbo: mi pu prami le pa nanmu
glico: I loved one man.
English_definition:
time tense relation / direction: did [selbri]; before / prior to
            [sumti]; default past tense.

lojbo: mi ba tavla do pu le nu do cliva
glico: I will talk to you before you leave.
English_definition:
time tense relation / direction: did [selbri]; before / prior to
            [sumti]; default past tense.

lojbo: xu do pu'i viska le fange ke vofli dacti
glico: Have you ever seen an unidentified flying object?
English_definition: modal aspect: can and has; demonstrated potential.

lojbo: mi djuno i ki'u bo mi pu'i tavla la alis
glico: I know, since I've already talked to Alice.
English_definition: modal aspect: can and has; demonstrated potential.

lojbo: mi pu'o citka le rectu
glico: I'm about to eat meat.
English_definition:
interval event contour: in anticipation of ...; until ... ;
            inchoative ----| |.

lojbo: le pulce pu gacri le mi'u loldi
glico: Dust covered the floor.
English_definition:
x1 is dust / precipitate [suspensible solid] from x2 in medium / on
            surface x3. See also te {zalvi}, {danmo}, {purmo}, {sligu}.

lojbo: le pulce brife cu muvdu ti
glico: A dust storm is coming.
English_definition:
x1 is dust / precipitate [suspensible solid] from x2 in medium / on
            surface x3. See also te {zalvi}, {danmo}, {purmo}, {sligu}.

lojbo: le mi'u dargu cu culno le pulce
glico: The road is dusty.
English_definition:
x1 is dust / precipitate [suspensible solid] from x2 in medium / on
            surface x3. See also te {zalvi}, {danmo}, {purmo}, {sligu}.

lojbo: le mi'u prenu cu pulji le nu le klaji cu smaji
glico: The person is a police officer enforcing silence in the street.
English_definition:
x1 is a police officer / [enforcer / vigilante] enforcing law(s) /
            rule(s) / order x2. Police officer, as an agent of authority (=
            {ca'irpulji}, {ka'irpulji}), as part of a police force (=
            {puljysoi}, as part of {puljyselsoi}); military police (=
            {jempulji}, {bilpulji}). See also {catni}, {sonci}, {bilni},
            {flalu}, {bandu}, {jemna}, {zekri}, {krati}.

lojbo: ti pulni le nu cpacu le djacu le mi'u jinto vau le mudri
glico: This is a wooden pulley to lift water from the well.
English_definition:
x1 is a pulley [tool] for performing action / function x2 rotating
            on axle x3. See also {tutci}, {xislu}, {vraga}.

lojbo: e'o do punji le mi'u kabri le mi'u jubme
glico: Please, put the cup onto the table!
English_definition:
x1 (agent) puts / places / sets x2 on / at surface / locus x3. See
            also {cpacu}, {lebna}, {cpana}, {batke}, {setca}.

lojbo: doi le nobli do e'o punji le ka virnu vau mi
glico: Lord, put courage into my heart!
English_definition:
x1 (agent) puts / places / sets x2 on / at surface / locus x3. See
            also {cpacu}, {lebna}, {cpana}, {batke}, {setca}.

lojbo: le mi'u skina pu punji mi le ka gleki cinmo
glico: The movie put me in a happy mood.
English_definition:
x1 (agent) puts / places / sets x2 on / at surface / locus x3. See
            also {cpacu}, {lebna}, {cpana}, {batke}, {setca}.

lojbo: pu snime punli le mi'u dargu
glico: It was a clump of snow on the road.
English_definition:
x1 is a swelling / protrusion / convexity [shape / form] at / in /
            on x2, of material x3. (adjective:) x1 is swollen. See also {balji},
            {cmana}, {plana}.

lojbo: da punli le stedu be mi
glico: I have a swelling on my head.
English_definition:
x1 is a swelling / protrusion / convexity [shape / form] at / in /
            on x2, of material x3. (adjective:) x1 is swollen. See also {balji},
            {cmana}, {plana}.

lojbo: le nu la kevin cu cliva pu purci le nu mi mo'u klama le xotli
glico: Kevin left earlier than I arrived at the hotel.
English_definition:
x1 is in the past of / earlier than / before x2 in time sequence; x1
            is former; x2 is latter. Time ordering only (use lidne otherwise);
            aorist in that x1 may overlap in time with x2 as long as it starts
            before, x1 starts before x2 but is continuing during x2 (=
            {cfaprucabna}); non-aorist before, i.e. x1 is over / ended before x2
            starts (= {fampru}), x1 is completed before x2 starts (= {mulpru}).
            See also {lidne}, {balvi}, {cabna}, {farna}.

lojbo: ti purdi lei rirni be mi le vrici
glico: This is my parents' garden where different crops are grown.
English_definition:
x1 is a garden / tended / cultivated field of family / community /
            farmer x2 growing plants / crop x3. Orchard (= {ricpurdi}). See also
            {foldi}, {cange}, {panka}.

lojbo: ti purmo le gurni
glico: This is flour.
English_definition:
x1 is a powder of material x2. Flour (= {grupu'o},
            {xripu'o}). See also {pulce}, {zalvi}.

lojbo:
la alis pu ku mo'u klama pa zarci gi'e ba bo te vecnu le
            plise i ba bo ra klama le zdani
glico: Alice entered a store and bought apples. Then she went home.
English_definition:
pro-sumti: a recent sumti before the last one, as determined by
            back-counting rules.

lojbo: li pa fe'i ci du li pi ra'e ci
English_definition: digit / number: repeating digits (of a decimal) follow.

lojbo: mi pu ganse le pluka panci pe ra'i le purdi
glico: I felt a pleasant smell from the garden.
English_definition: krasi modal, 1st place from source / origin / starting point ...

lojbo:
lu mi se pluka le ka penmi do li'u lu go'i ra'o
            li'u
glico: "I am pleased to meet you." "Me too."
English_definition:
flag GOhA to indicate pro-assignment context updating for all
            pro-assigns in referenced bridi.

lojbo: ra'oi kla rafsi zo klama
glico: {kla} is an affix from the full verb {klama}.
English_definition:
single-word rafsi quote; quotes a single word delimited by pauses
            (in speech) or whitespace (in writing) and treats it as a rafsi
            Useful for quoting rafsi that aren't legal words on their own.
            See http: / / www.lojban.org / tiki / Unspeakable+rafsi+gotcha for
            details.

lojbo: ra'u ko tolxanka denpa
glico: Above all, be patient.
English_definition:
discursive: chiefly - equally - incidentally. See also {ralju},
            {vajni}.

lojbo: ei mi gunka i je ra'u cu'i ei mi surla
glico: I need to work. But with equal importance I need to relax.
English_definition:
discursive: chiefly - equally - incidentally. See also {ralju},
            {vajni}.

lojbo: ra'u nai mi na se spaji
glico: Incidentally, I'm not surprised.
English_definition:
discursive: chiefly - equally - incidentally. See also {ralju},
            {vajni}.

lojbo: racli fau da'i
glico: That would make sense.
English_definition:
x1 (action / activity / behavior) is sane / rational by standard x2.
            See also {fenki}.

lojbo: racli fa le nu do pu cuxna le ka tavla bau la lojban
glico: It's rational that you chose to talk in Lojban.
English_definition:
x1 (action / activity / behavior) is sane / rational by standard x2.
            See also {fenki}.

lojbo: le ractu zi co'a se panzi
glico: Rabbits breed quickly.
English_definition:
x1 is a rabbit / hare / [doe] of species / breed x2. See also

lojbo: ti voi jganu cu radno li pa
glico: This angle subtends one radian.
English_definition:
x1 is x2 radian(s) [metric unit] in angular measure (default is 1)

            {gocti}, {gotro}, {gutci}, {litce}, {megdo}, {mikri}, {milti},
            {minli}, {nanvi}, {petso}, {picti}, {terto}, {xatsi}, {xecto},
            {xexso}, {zepti}, {zetro}.

lojbo: ra'oi gau rafsi zo gasnu
glico: 'gau' is a rafsi of the verb {gasnu}.
English_definition:
x1 is an affix / suffix / prefix / combining-form for word / concept
            x2, form / properties x3, language x4. See also {valsi}, {lujvo},
            {pagbu}.

lojbo: pa cribe cu ragve le mi'u rirxe mi
glico: A bear is across the river from me.
English_definition:
x1 is located across / on the other side of gap / boundary x2 from
            x3; x1 is opposite (fi) x3. Also: x1 is over there (across / beyond
            zo'e); directly across / beyond a boundary / gap, generally at
            the shortest plausible distance on the other side of the boundary.
            See also {dukti}, {kuspe}, {bancu}, {kruca}, {cripu}, {pagre}.

lojbo: .i le berti cu ragve le plise mi
glico: The apple is to the north of me.
English_definition:
x1 is located across / on the other side of gap / boundary x2 from
            x3; x1 is opposite (fi) x3. Also: x1 is over there (across / beyond
            zo'e); directly across / beyond a boundary / gap, generally at
            the shortest plausible distance on the other side of the boundary.
            See also {dukti}, {kuspe}, {bancu}, {kruca}, {cripu}, {pagre}.

lojbo: mi nelci le'e jbari ne rai lo'e fragari
glico: I like berries with strawberries being my favorite ones.
English_definition: traji modal, 1st place with superlative ...

lojbo: ko ko na raktu ta'i le nu cusku lo simsa
glico: Don't trouble yourself saying such things.
English_definition:
x1 (object / person / event / situation) troubles / disturbs x2
            (person) causing problem(s) x3. Also afflicts, is disruptive to,
            troublesome; x1 / x3 are a care to x2, x2 is troubled by / cares
            about x1 / x3 (= selra'u for reordered places). See also
            {dicra}, {fanza}, {zunti}, {kurji}, {xanka}, {nabmi}.

lojbo: do raktu mi ja'e le nu mi de'a tadni la lojban
glico: You disturb me making me not learning Lojban.
English_definition:
x1 (object / person / event / situation) troubles / disturbs x2
            (person) causing problem(s) x3. Also afflicts, is disruptive to,
            troublesome; x1 / x3 are a care to x2, x2 is troubled by / cares
            about x1 / x3 (= selra'u for reordered places). See also
            {dicra}, {fanza}, {zunti}, {kurji}, {xanka}, {nabmi}.

lojbo: ti noi xrula cu ralci le ka se tarmi
glico: This flower has a delicate form.
English_definition:
x1 is delicate / fragile / subtle / refined in property x2 (ka).
            Easily damaged or rendered less pleasing / pure / effective. See

lojbo: la alis cu ralju le nixli le ka cuxna

English_definition:
x1 is principal / chief / leader / main / [staple], most significant

            ralterbe'e; use additional terms to distinguish among these);
            also primary, prime, (adverb:) chiefly, principally, mainly; (x2 is
            complete specification of set). See also {vajni}, te {bende},
            {minde}, {lidne}, {jatna}, {jitro}, {gidva}, {midju}.

lojbo: mi ralte le cidja ca ro nu mi litru
glico: I carry food whenever I travel.
English_definition:
x1 retains / keeps / holds x2 in its possession. See also {cirko},
            {rinju}, {ponse}, {jgari}, {pinfu}, {stali}, {curmi}.

lojbo: ra ralte le ka catke le karce
glico: He keeps pushing the car.
English_definition:
x1 retains / keeps / holds x2 in its possession. See also {cirko},
            {rinju}, {ponse}, {jgari}, {pinfu}, {stali}, {curmi}.

lojbo: mi ralte le re mlatu

English_definition:
x1 retains / keeps / holds x2 in its possession. See also {cirko},
            {rinju}, {ponse}, {jgari}, {pinfu}, {stali}, {curmi}.

lojbo: le risna cu sluji rango fi le ka pambe le ciblu vi'u le xadni
glico:
The heart is the muscular organ that pumps blood throughout the

English_definition:

lojbo: ti rango le insekto le ka tirna

English_definition:
x1 is a / the body organ [body-part] of body / species x2 performing

lojbo: le gusni be fi le mi'u bombila cu ranji le mi'u nicte

English_definition:
x1 (event / state) continues / persists over interval x2; x1

            {renvi}, {cedra}, {citsi}, {manfo}, {vitci}, {cukla}, {fliba},
            {preja}, {tcena}.

lojbo: le djacu pu ranji le barda canlu
glico: The water continuously covered a large space.
English_definition:
x1 (event / state) continues / persists over interval x2; x1

            {preja}, {tcena}.

lojbo: mi pu tirna le simsa ranmi be pa cevni

English_definition:
x1 is a myth / legend, a culturally significant story about x2 in

            adjectivally for non-humanoid creatures (= {ramda'u}) of story
            / myth / legend / religion, e.g. dragon; fairy tale (= {veryranmi}).
            See also {lijda}, {lisri}, {crida}.

lojbo: le ransu cu gunma le tunka joi tinci
glico: Bronze is composed of copper and tin.
English_definition:
x1 is a quantity of / contains / is made of bronze of composition

lojbo: ti noi vi'u pixra cu ransu
glico: The statue is made of bronze.
English_definition:
x1 is a quantity of / contains / is made of bronze of composition
            including x2. See also {jinme}, {tunka}, {lastu}.

lojbo: le mi'u pesxu cu ranti le danre
glico: The dough is soft when being pressurized.
English_definition:
x1 is soft / malleable / moldable / yielding to force x2 in
            conditions x3. See also {ralci}, {jdari}, {lakse}, {randa}, {gradu}.

lojbo:
zo co'oi poi do pu cusku cu ranxi le ka se smuni zo coi vau le
            ka se smuni zo co'o
glico:
"Chao" that you said was ironic in that instead of meaning
            "Hi!" it actually meant "Bye!"
English_definition:
x1 is ironic(al) / contrary to expectation x2 in state / property /

lojbo: le mi'u te ranxi cu du le nu mi na merko
glico: The irony is that I'm not an American.
English_definition:
x1 is ironic(al) / contrary to expectation x2 in state / property /

lojbo:
le nu mi pu cusku zo coi le mi'u fetsi cu se rapli li ci i mi

glico: I said "Hello!" to her three times.
English_definition:

lojbo: le mi'u pruce cu rapli li mu

x1 [action] repeats / is repeated for a total of x2 (quantity)

lojbo: ti noi cripu cu rarna
glico: This bridge is a natural formation.
English_definition:
x1 is natural / spontaneous / instinctive, not [consciously] caused

lojbo: le mi'u ratcu co'i canci
glico: The rat disappeared.
English_definition: x1 is a rat of species / breed x2. See also {smacu}.

lojbo: le'e tabno cu ratni li xa li pa re
glico:
Carbon is a chemical element number 6 and usually has the isotope
            number 12.
English_definition:
x1 is an atom of element / atomic number x2 of isotope number /
            atomic weight x3. (cf. kantu for a basic unit of a property or
            activity; selci for a basic physical subunit, generally of a mass)

lojbo: rau stizu cu zvati
glico: There are enough chairs.
English_definition: digit / number: enough; subjective.

lojbo: le mi'u sakta cu me'i rau mei
glico: The sugar is not enough.
English_definition: digit / number: enough; subjective.

lojbo: re cribe ca cpana le bisli
glico: There are two bears on the ice.
English_definition: digit / number: 2 (digit) [two].

lojbo: ko na cliva mi doi le crida iu re'e

emotion category / modifier: religious / spiritual / worship -

lojbo: do io nai re'e nai se lijda le mabla

emotion category / modifier: religious / spiritual / worship -

lojbo: ui re'e cu'i do'o pu zbasu le malsi
glico: Yay, you built a temple (well, no religious feelings here)!

emotion category / modifier: religious / spiritual / worship -

lojbo: lu ju'i li'u lu re'i do li'u

lojbo: lu ju'i li'u lu re'i nai li'u
glico: "Hey!" - "Wait a bit"
English_definition: vocative: ready to receive - not ready to receive.

lojbo: le mi'u nobli pu zutse re'o le jubme

location tense relation / direction; adjacent to / touching /

lojbo: mi pu ci re'u penmi la alis

converts number to an objectively quantified ordinal tense interval
            modifier; defaults to time.

lojbo: mi zvati ti za'u re'u

English_definition:
converts number to an objectively quantified ordinal tense interval
            modifier; defaults to time.

lojbo: tu noi gerku cu se rebla le tordu

English_definition:
x1 is a / the tail / appendix [body-part] of x2; [metaphor:

lojbo: ti rectu le bakni

lojbo: xu le remna ku po'o ka'e cmila

English_definition:
