lojbo: pa nanla pu renro pa rokci le mi'u canko
glico: A boy threw a stone at the window.
English_definition:
x1 throws / launches / casts / hurls x2 to / at / in direction x3
            (propulsion derives internally to x1). (cf. cecla (more general
            term), danti)

lojbo: mi mo'u renvi le mi'u xlali tcini
glico: I survived that terrible situation.
English_definition:
x1 survives / endures / undergoes / abides / lasts / persists
            through x2 for interval / duration x3. Also lasts out, withstands;
            x1 persists / lasts for duration x3; (adjective:) x1 is tough /
            durable. See also {ranji}, {kuspe}, {randa}, {lifri}, {stali},
            {temci}.

lojbo: le respa cu xabju le mi'u korbi be le mi'u rirxe
glico: Reptiles inhabit the coast of the river.
English_definition:
x1 is a reptile of species / breed x2. See also {danlu}, {banfi},
            {since}.

lojbo:
le nixli pu retsku fi le pulji fe lu ta'i ma klama la palma noi
            xotli li'u
glico:
The girl asked a police officer "How does one get to Palm
            hotel?"

lojbo: ta me le cinri cukta i au mi te vecnu ri
glico: That is an interesting book. I'd like to buy it.
English_definition: pro-sumti: the last sumti, as determined by back-counting rules.

lojbo: ri'a le ka kucli vau le mlatu co'a morsi
glico: Cat died because of being curious (curiosity killed the cat).
English_definition: rinka modal, 1st place (phys. / mental) causal because ...

lojbo: oi ri'e mi cirko le ckiku pe mi
glico: Ah, I lost my keys.
English_definition:
attitudinal modifier: release of emotion - emotion restraint. See
            also {cniri'u}, {cnicru}.

lojbo: tugni na ku o'o ri'e nai fa le mi'u jatna
glico:
he doesn't agree! Ehm, well, the boss doesn't agree, you
            see.
English_definition:
attitudinal modifier: release of emotion - emotion restraint. See
            also {cniri'u}, {cnicru}.

lojbo: oi ri'e nai cortu
glico: Mmm, it hurts.
English_definition:
attitudinal modifier: release of emotion - emotion restraint. See
            also {cniri'u}, {cnicru}.

lojbo: ri'i mi pu farlu
glico: I experienced falling down.
English_definition:
lifri modal, 1st place patient / passive case tag; happens
            to...,experienced by...,with passive...

lojbo: pa nanmu cu sanli ri'u do
glico: There is a man standing to the right of you.
English_definition:
location tense relation / direction; rightwards / to the right of
            ...

lojbo: xu do ricfu le ka ponse le tumla
glico: Are you rich in how much land you own?
English_definition:
x1 is rich / wealthy in goods / possessions / property / aspect x2.
            See also {solji}, {banzu}, {dukse}, {pindi}.

lojbo: le mi'u cidja cu rigni mi
glico: The food is disgusting to me.
English_definition:
x1 is repugnant to / causes disgust to x2 under conditions x3. See
            also {djica}, {nelci}, {trina}, {vamtu}, {xebni}, {pluka}.

lojbo: le mi'u sicni cu rijno
glico: The coin is silver.
English_definition:
x1 is made of / contains / is a quantity of silver / argentum (Ag);
            [metaphor: valuable, tarnishing]. See also {solji}.

lojbo:
le rilti be le mi'u pu se sanga be le mi'u nakni cu simsa
            le'u la la cu cu la la le mi'u'u
glico:
The rhythm of the phrase said by him was similar to {la la tcu tcu
            la la}.
English_definition:
x1 (sequence / non-text quote) is a rhythm / beat of music /
            expressive form x2. Not necessarily oscillatory / regular pattern.
            See also {damri}, {pemci}, {tonga}, {zgike}, {slilu}, {dikni},
            {sanga}, {morna}.

lojbo:
zo kansa rimni zo dansu la lojban le ka le ci lamji lerfu je pagbu
            be ce'u cu simxu le ka mintu
glico:
{kansa} rhymes with {dansu} in Lojban in that three adjacent letters
            in each of those words are the same.
English_definition:
x1 rhymes / alliterates with x2 in language / phonetics x3, matching
            sound correspondence x4 (ka). Broad meaning of rhyme - any matching
            sound correspondence. See also {pemci}, {sanga}.

lojbo: le djacu cu rinci pa tubnu za'u pa kevna le danre
glico: Water drains from a tube through holes being under pressure.
English_definition:
x1 liquid / fluid drains / strains / flushes from source x2 through
            drain / strainer x3 by force x4. x4 is usually gravity. See also
            {pambe}, {tisna}, {setca}, {flecu}, {muvdu}, {ganxo}, {rirxe}.

lojbo:
le carmi flu'ente be le le tcadu pu se rinju mi le nu mi
            mo'u klama le briju
glico: Intense traffic prevented me from getting to the office.
English_definition:
x1 is restrained / held [back] / constrained / kept by restraint x2
            against x3 (event). Also: x2 is a restraint / binding for x1, x2
            keeps / restrains / holds [back] / constrains x1 from x3 (=
            selri'u for reordered places); agentive restraint (=
            {ri'urgau}, {ri'urzu'e}). See also {zifre}, {ralte},
            {pinfu}, {kavbu}, {fanta}, {jgari}, {jimte}, {bapli}, {curmi},
            {kluza}, {tagji}.

lojbo: le nu ctuca cu rinka le nu farvi
glico: Education is the agent of progress.
English_definition:
x1 (event / state) effects / physically causes effect x2 (event /
            state) under conditions x3. x1 is a material condition for x2; x1
            gives rise to x2. See also {gasnu}, {krinu}, {nibli}, te {zukte}, se
            {jalge}, {bapli}, {jitro}, cmavo list {ri'a}, {mukti}, {ciksi},
            {xruti}.

lojbo: mi pu rinsa la alis le ka jai gau slilu fai le xance be mi
glico: I greeted Alice by waving my hand.
English_definition:
x1 (agent) greets / hails / [welcomes / says hello to] / responds to
            arrival of x2 in manner x3 (action). (cf. friti for welcome /
            hospitality, cmavo list coi, cmavo list co'o)

lojbo:
le mi'u fetsi cu rirci le ka carmi gunka vau le tadni poi dunli
            vo'a le ka jai nanca
glico: She works hard which is unusual among students of her age.
English_definition:
x1 [member] is rare / unusual / uncommon / atypical in property x2
            (ka) among members of x3 (set). (x3 is complete specification of
            set); (cf. cizra, fadni, cafne, kampu, cnano - the generalized
            opposite to any / all of these concepts)

lojbo:
mi pu rirci fi le pendo be mi fe le ka se cinri le fasnu e nai le
            farna
glico:
I was unusual among my friends in being interested in events and not
            trends.
English_definition:
x1 [member] is rare / unusual / uncommon / atypical in property x2
            (ka) among members of x3 (set). (x3 is complete specification of
            set); (cf. cizra, fadni, cafne, kampu, cnano - the generalized
            opposite to any / all of these concepts)

lojbo: la edvard cu rirni la alis
glico: Edward is a parent of Alice.
English_definition:
x1 is a parent of / raises / rears x2; x1 mentors / acts parental
            toward child / protege x2. See also {rorci}, {mamta}, {patfu},
            {sidju}, {dzena}, {famti}, {verba}, {bersa}.

lojbo:
ti rirxe pa sudga tumla le vifne poi flu'ente le xamsi le krasi
            pe le cmana le condi
glico:
This is a river in a dry land running its fresh waters in a deep
            river bed towards the sea from springheads in the mountains.

lojbo: mi citka le rismi su'o roi ro djedi
glico: I eat rice every day.
English_definition:
x1 is a quantity of rice [a type of grain] of strain / cultivar x2.
            See also {gurni}.

lojbo: mi pu ganse le nu le rinsa be mi cu sutra slilu
glico: I felt my heart beating fast.
English_definition:
x1 is a / the heart [body-part] of x2; [emotional / shape metaphors
            are NOT culturally neutral]. (adjective:) x1 is cardiac; emotional
            'heart' (= {cnise'i}). See also {pambe}, {ciblu}.

lojbo:
le ka pinxe le tcati su'o roi ro djedi vau fi mi'a ritli
            le ka tavla zu'ai
glico:
To drink tea is our ritual that we perform every day in order to
            talk to each other.
English_definition:
x1 is a rite / ceremony / ritual for purpose / goal x2, by custom /
            in community x3, with form / rules x4. [also: x1 is formal, Legal.
            x1 is 'going through the motions']; x4 constraints /
            customs; See also {lijda}, {malsi}, {flalu}, {javni}, {tcaci},
            {clite}, {junri}.

lojbo:
mi pu rivbi le ka bilma vau le ka zmadu citka e le ka jinru le glare
            djacu
glico: I avoided becoming ill by eating more and plunging into hot water.
English_definition:
x1 avoids / evades / shuns / escapes / skirts [fate] x2 (event)
            through action / state x3 (event). Also detours around, stays away
            from; (x1 is normally an object, but may be an event). See also
            bandu which is not necessarily successful, {fanta}, which is
            agentive, se jersi which implies an opposing agent, {sisku},
            {kalte}, {fapro}.

lojbo: le mi'u prenu pu rivbi lei pulji
glico: The person evaded the police.
English_definition:
x1 avoids / evades / shuns / escapes / skirts [fate] x2 (event)
            through action / state x3 (event). Also detours around, stays away
            from; (x1 is normally an object, but may be an event). See also
            bandu which is not necessarily successful, {fanta}, which is
            agentive, se jersi which implies an opposing agent, {sisku},
            {kalte}, {fapro}.

lojbo: le ro pendo be mi cu cusku le se du'u mi simlu le ka tatpi
glico: All of my friends say that I look tired.
English_definition: digit / number: each, all.

lojbo: oi ro'a ca ti mi se cfipu
glico: Awkward. I'm confused.
English_definition: emotion category / modifier: social - antisocial. See also {jikca}.

lojbo: ui ro'a cu'i mi cikre le skami pe mi
glico: I'm just puttering here by myself, fixing my computer.
English_definition: emotion category / modifier: social - antisocial. See also {jikca}.

lojbo: ui nai ro'a no da zvati ti
glico: I feel so lonely, nobody is here.
English_definition: emotion category / modifier: social - antisocial. See also {jikca}.

lojbo: ui ro'e mi morji
glico: Yay, I remember!
English_definition: emotion category / modifier: mental - mindless. See also {menli}.

lojbo: a'i ro'e cu'i mi ba zukte
glico: I will do it not putting much intellectual effort.
English_definition: emotion category / modifier: mental - mindless. See also {menli}.

lojbo: do marvele iu ro'e nai
glico: There is no logic in it, you are just wonderful.
English_definition: emotion category / modifier: mental - mindless. See also {menli}.

lojbo: ui ro'i sai mi'a jinga
glico: I'm just overwhelmed with emotions, we won!!
English_definition:
emotion category / modifier: emotional - denying emotion. See also
            {cinmo}.

lojbo: do mo ro'i
glico: How do you feel?
English_definition:
emotion category / modifier: emotional - denying emotion. See also
            {cinmo}.

lojbo: ui ro'i cu'i mi kanro
glico: Feelings apart, I'm healthy.
English_definition:
emotion category / modifier: emotional - denying emotion. See also
            {cinmo}.

lojbo: ui ro'i nai do snada
glico: No rejoicing from me, you succeded.
English_definition:
emotion category / modifier: emotional - denying emotion. See also
            {cinmo}.

lojbo: oi nai ro'o kukte
glico: Yum, yum, it's tasty.
English_definition:
emotion category / modifier: physical - denying physical. See also
            {xadni}.

lojbo: ii ro'o cu'i ka'e kargu
glico: I'm afraid it can be expensive.
English_definition:
emotion category / modifier: physical - denying physical. See also
            {xadni}.

lojbo: ii ro'o nai mi na drani punji le mi'u tanxe
glico:
No, not that it requires physical work, but I'm afraid I might
            not put the box correctly.
English_definition:
emotion category / modifier: physical - denying physical. See also
            {xadni}.

lojbo: iu ro'u doi le nanla
glico: Boy, you are hot, I love you.
English_definition:
emotion category / modifier: sexual - sexual abstinence. See also
            {cinse}.

lojbo: do melbi iu ro'o cu'i
glico: You are pretty, not that I love you in sexual sense.
English_definition:
emotion category / modifier: sexual - sexual abstinence. See also
            {cinse}.

lojbo: do mi kansa ui ro'u nai doi le pendo
glico: Yay, you are with me, my buddy.
English_definition:
emotion category / modifier: sexual - sexual abstinence. See also
            {cinse}.

lojbo: mi pu'i pa roi zvati la .paris.
glico: I was in Paris once in my life.
English_definition:
converts number to an objectively quantified tense interval
            modifier; defaults to time tense.

lojbo: mi pu'i re roi penmi la .alis.
glico: I met Alice twice, two times.
English_definition:
converts number to an objectively quantified tense interval
            modifier; defaults to time tense.

lojbo: mi pu'i so'i roi zvati la paris
glico: I have been to Paris may times.
English_definition:
converts number to an objectively quantified tense interval
            modifier; defaults to time tense.

lojbo: mi limna pa roi ro jeftu
glico: I swim once a week.
English_definition:
converts number to an objectively quantified tense interval
            modifier; defaults to time tense.

lojbo: le mi'u nanla ca'o renro le za'u rokci
glico: The boy is throwing stones.
English_definition:
x1 is a quantity of / is made of / contains rock / stone of type /
            composition x2 from location x3. x2: composition including x2, which
            need not be complete specification. See also {kunra}, {jemna},
            {canre}.

lojbo:
pa verba ne se pi'o le degji pu pencu le romge be le mi'u
            karce
glico: A child touched the reflecting surface of the car with his finger.
English_definition:
x1 is a highly reflective / polished non-tarnishing metallic
            surface, of metal x2 [often chromium]. See also {jinme}.

lojbo: ti noi nanla cu ropno le ka tavla tai ma kau
glico: This boy is European in how he speaks.
English_definition:
x1 reflects European culture / nationality / geography /
            Indo-European languages in aspect x2. See also {brito}.

lojbo: le mi'u ranmi danlu cu se rorci pa remna pa bakni
glico: The mythical animal was procreated by a human and a bull.
English_definition:
x1 engenders / procreates / begets x2 with coparent x3. See also
            {grute}, {gutra}, {rirni}, se {panzi}, {mamta}, {patfu}, {tarbi},
            {bersa}, {ferti}, {jbena}, {sovda}.

lojbo: le dargu cu rotsu le ka se pagbu ti
glico: The road is thick here.
English_definition:
x1 is thick in dimension / direction x2 by standard x3; [relatively
            long in smallest dimension]. Also stout. See also {barda}, {cinla},
            {ganra}, {clani}, {condi}, {plana}, {gutci}, {minli}.

lojbo: pluka panci le rozgu pe le mi'u purdi
glico: Roses in the garden have a pleasant scent.
English_definition:
x1 is a rose [flower - characterized by prickly stem / fragrance] of
            species / strain x2. Roses are not all pink; avoid using for color
            rose, which might be labyxu'e. See also {spati}, {xunre}.

lojbo: ru'a mi milxe le ka bilma
glico: I presume, I am a bit ill.
English_definition: evidential: I postulate. See also {sruma}.

lojbo: .i mi na ru'e se slabu do
glico: I hardly know you.
English_definition: attitudinal: weak intensity attitude modifier.

lojbo: .i .ui ru'e do snada
glico: Yay, you won.
English_definition: attitudinal: weak intensity attitude modifier.

lojbo: mi pu ru'i citka le mango
glico: I ate apples on and on.
English_definition:
tense interval modifier: continuously; subjective tense / modal;
            defaults as time tense.

lojbo: pu ru'i gusni
glico: The light was glowing.
English_definition:
tense interval modifier: continuously; subjective tense / modal;
            defaults as time tense.

lojbo: pu ru'i nai gusni
glico: The light was flashing.
English_definition:
tense interval modifier: continuously; subjective tense / modal;
            defaults as time tense.

lojbo: pa megdo be le toldi ca'o dansu ru'u mi
glico: A million of butterflies are dancing around me.
English_definition: location tense relation / direction; surrounding / annular ...

lojbo: le mi'u laldo prenu cu ruble le ka pinxe si'u nai
glico: The old man is weak in being able to drink himself.
English_definition:
x1 is weak / feeble / frail in property / quality / aspect x2 (ka)
            by standard x3. See also {carmi}, {vlipa}, {tsali}, {kandi},
            {kandi}, {milxe}.

lojbo: le mi'u skapi cu rufsu
glico: The skin is rough.
English_definition:
x1 is rough / coarse / uneven / [grainy / scabrous / rugged] in
            texture / regularity. Fine-textured (= {tolrufsu}). See also
            {xutla}, {tengu}, {vitci}.

lojbo: e'o te runta fi le kunra
glico: Mineral water, please.
English_definition:
x1 dissolves in solvent x2 forming solution / [suspension] x3 under
            conditions x4. Suspension (= {pucyteryrunta}, {pu'exre}). See
            also {litki}, {mixre}, {sligu}, {sudga}.

lojbo: le mi'u jisra cu te runta le sakta jo'u le jbari le djacu
glico: The juice is made of sugar and berries dissolved in water.
English_definition:
x1 dissolves in solvent x2 forming solution / [suspension] x3 under
            conditions x4. Suspension (= {pucyteryrunta}, {pu'exre}). See
            also {litki}, {mixre}, {sligu}, {sudga}.

lojbo: ti noi jisra cu rupnu li ci la e'uropas
glico: This juice costs three euros (European major money units).
English_definition:
x1 is measured in major-money-units (dollar / yuan / ruble) as x2
            (quantity), monetary system x3. Also pound, rupee, franc, mark, yen;
            x1 is generally a price / cost / value. See also {jdini}, {sicni},
            {jdima}, {vecnu}, {fepni}, {dekpu}, {gutci}, {minli}, {merli},
            {bunda}, {kramu}.

lojbo: xu do tavla fo le rusko
glico: Do you speak Russian?
English_definition:
x1 reflects Russian culture / nationality / language in aspect x2.
            See also {softo}, {slovo}.

lojbo: ti noi jemna cu rutni le patfu be mi
glico: This gem is artificial and made by my father.
English_definition:
x1 is an artifact; x1 is artificial; x1 is made / caused by people /
            se kulnu x2; x1 is man-made. See also {rarna}, se {zbasu}, {gundi},
            {slasi}.

lojbo: le makcu rutpapaia cu se panci le rigni
glico: Ripe papaya smells disgusting.

lojbo: doi la alis ko klama ti sa i doi la kevin ko klama ti
glico: Alice, come here! No, ... Kevin, come here!
English_definition:
erase complete or partial utterance; next word shows how much
            erasing to do.

lojbo: mi ca zvati le centero be le mi'u tcadu
glico: To be precise, I'm in the center of the city.
English_definition:
discursive: precisely speaking - loosely speaking. See also {satci},
            {jibni}.

lojbo: le arxokuna cu mabru sa'e nai
glico: Raccoons are mammals, roughly speaking.
English_definition:
discursive: precisely speaking - loosely speaking. See also {satci},
            {jibni}.

lojbo: mi le zabna pu se funca sa'u
glico: I was just lucky.
English_definition: discursive: simply - elaborating. See also {sampu}, {pluja}.

lojbo: mi ca tcidu sa'u
glico: I'm just reading.
English_definition: discursive: simply - elaborating. See also {sampu}, {pluja}.

lojbo: do tcidu ma sa'u nai dai
glico: What are you reading, please, elaborate.
English_definition: discursive: simply - elaborating. See also {sampu}, {pluja}.

lojbo:
sa'u nai mi pu penmi pa ninmu noi mi pu tadni ka'ai
            ke'a
glico: To add details, I met a woman who I had studied with.
English_definition: discursive: simply - elaborating. See also {sampu}, {pluja}.

lojbo: le bakni cu sabji le ladru mi'a
glico: Cows provide us with milk.
English_definition:
x1 [source] provides / supplies / furnishes x2 [supply / commodity]
            to x3 [recipient]. Agentive supply (= {sabgau}, {sabzu'e}). See
            also {krasi}, {sorcu}.

lojbo: mi ba sabji fi do fe ro se nitcu be do
glico: I will provide you with everything you need.
English_definition:
x1 [source] provides / supplies / furnishes x2 [supply / commodity]
            to x3 [recipient]. Agentive supply (= {sabgau}, {sabzu'e}). See
            also {krasi}, {sorcu}.

lojbo: ko sabji le ciblu mi
glico: Be my blood donor!
English_definition:
x1 [source] provides / supplies / furnishes x2 [supply / commodity]
            to x3 [recipient]. Agentive supply (= {sabgau}, {sabzu'e}). See
            also {krasi}, {sorcu}.

lojbo: ra pu zutse le sabnu be le mi'u blanu karce
glico: He was sitting in the cabin of the blue car.
English_definition:
x1 is a cabin of vehicle x2. See also {bloti}, {marce}, {vinji},
            {karce}.

lojbo: ko jai gau jelca fai pa sacki
glico: Light up a match.
English_definition:
x1 is a match [incendiary device] made of x2. See also {fagri},
            {jelca}.

lojbo: me'o re pi mu saclu li mu fe'i re li pa no
glico: 2.5 is the decimal equivalent of the fraction 5/2 in base 10.
English_definition:
x1 (me'o) is the [decimal / binary] equivalent of fractional x2
            (me'o) in base x3 (quantity). Conversion from fractions to
            decimal-point based notation. See also {namcu}, {frinu}.

lojbo: le saclu be li pai bei li pa no cu cimni le ka clani
glico: The decimal expansion of the number  (pi) is infinitely long.
English_definition:
x1 (me'o) is the [decimal / binary] equivalent of fractional x2
            (me'o) in base x3 (quantity). Conversion from fractions to
            decimal-point based notation. See also {namcu}, {frinu}.

lojbo: .i .ui sai do snada
glico: Yay, you won!
English_definition: attitudinal: moderate intensity attitude modifier.

lojbo:
le mi'u prenu pu sakci le danmo pe ra'i le mi'u fagri
            le fepni
glico: He inhaled some smoke from the fire into his lungs.
English_definition:
x1 sucks / is suction / vacuum / relatively low pressure of fluid /
            gas x2 relative to high pressure x3. Also suck object / fluid (=
            sakcpu or {sakmuvgau}). See also {cokcu}, {lacpu}, {flecu}.

lojbo: pa sportivo pu sakli le bisli
glico: A sportsperson was gliding on the ice.
English_definition:
x1 slides / slips / glides on x2. x2 is slick / slippery to / for x1
            (= selsakli for reordered places). See also {mosra}, {fulta},
            {skiji}, {xutla}.

lojbo: o'i le mi'u loldi cu se sakli
glico: Warning! The floor is slippery.
English_definition:
x1 slides / slips / glides on x2. x2 is slick / slippery to / for x1
            (= selsakli for reordered places). See also {mosra}, {fulta},
            {skiji}, {xutla}.

lojbo: mi djica tu'a le tcati be se cau le sakta
glico: I want some tea without sugar.
English_definition:
x1 is made of / contains / is a quantity of sugar [sweet edible]
            from source x2 of composition x3. Also sucrose, fructose, glucose,
            galactose, lactose, etc.; saccharine / aspartame / sugar substitute
            (basysakta or satybasti, ticysakta); x3: composition including x3,
            which need not be complete specification. See also {silna}, {titla}.

lojbo: mi pu salci le nu mi jai nanca li pa no vau le ka litru la nipon
glico: I celebrated my 10th birthday by travelling to Japan.
English_definition:
x1 celebrates / recognizes / honors x2 (event / abstract) with
            activity / [party] x3. x3 (and nunsla) festival / fiesta /
            celebration / occasion / fair / Holiday (some senses). not limited
            to the ameliorative interpretation of 'celebrate': funeral
            (= {mrobixsla}). See also {sinma}, {jbena}.

lojbo: ti salpo le jganu be fi le pinta
glico: This is a slope towards the horizontal surface.
English_definition:
x1 is sloped / inclined / slanted / aslant with angle x2 to horizon
            / frame x3. Also steep (= {tcesa'o}); normally implies
            non-rectilinear. See also {kurfa}, {tutci}.

lojbo: mi nelci le salta be le grute
glico: I like fruit salads.

            See also {ciksi}, {jijnu}, {mucti}, {jinvi}, {nabmi}, {pensi},
            {xanri}, cmavo list {si'o}.

lojbo: pei e'o do sidju mi le ka tadni le cmaci
glico: Could you help me in studying math?
English_definition:
x1 helps / assists / aids object / person x2 do / achieve / maintain
            event / activity x3. See also cmavo list {si'u}, {rirni},
            {sarji}, {vipsi}, {ferti}, {selfu}.

lojbo: xu le mi'u smani ca'o damva'u le sigja
glico: Is the monkey smoking a cigarette?
English_definition:
x1 is a cigar / cigarette / cigarillo made from tobacco / smokable
            substance x2 by x3. See also {danmo}, {jelca}, {tanko}, {marna}.

lojbo: la alis pu dasni pa silka pastu
glico: Alice was wearing a silk dress.
English_definition:
x1 is a quantity of / contains / is made of silk produced by x2. See
            also {curnu}, {bukpu}, {cilta}.

lojbo: le silka be le ankabuta ka'e tsali
glico: Spider's silk can be durable.
English_definition:
x1 is a quantity of / contains / is made of silk produced by x2. See
            also {curnu}, {bukpu}, {cilta}.

lojbo: e'o ko te cpacu le silna mi
glico: Please, pass me the salt.
English_definition:
x1 is a portion / quantity of salt from source x2, of composition
            including x3. See also {sakta}.

lojbo: le silna be le sodna cu cidja
glico: A salt of Sodium is a food.
English_definition:
x1 is a portion / quantity of salt from source x2, of composition
            including x3. See also {sakta}.

lojbo: mi te simlu fi do fe le ka se la'u li du'e tadni
glico: It seems to me that you are studying too hard.
English_definition:
x1 seems / appears to have property(ies) x2 to observer x3 under
            conditions x4. Also: x1 seems like it has x2 to x3; suggest belief /
            observation (= {mlugau}, {mluti'i}); looks like / resembles (=
            {smimlu}, {mitmlu}). See also {catlu}, {viska}, {simsa}, {zgana},
            {ganse}, {jarco}.

lojbo: le nu troci pu simlu le ka na sarcu
glico: The attempt seemed to be unnecessary.
English_definition:
x1 seems / appears to have property(ies) x2 to observer x3 under
            conditions x4. Also: x1 seems like it has x2 to x3; suggest belief /
            observation (= {mlugau}, {mluti'i}); looks like / resembles (=
            {smimlu}, {mitmlu}). See also {catlu}, {viska}, {simsa}, {zgana},
            {ganse}, {jarco}.

lojbo: le skapi be ra pu simsa le snime le ka blabi
glico: Her skin was white as snow.
English_definition:
x1 is similar / parallel to x2 in property / quantity x3 (ka / ni);
            x1 looks / appears like x2. Also: x1 is a likeness / image of x2; x1
            and x2 are alike; similarity and parallel differ primarily in
            emphasis. See also {dunli}, {frica}, {mintu}, {panra}, {simlu},
            {vrici}.

lojbo: mi simsa le'e cipni le ka zifre
glico: I am free as a bird.
English_definition:
x1 is similar / parallel to x2 in property / quantity x3 (ka / ni);
            x1 looks / appears like x2. Also: x1 is a likeness / image of x2; x1
            and x2 are alike; similarity and parallel differ primarily in
            emphasis. See also {dunli}, {frica}, {mintu}, {panra}, {simlu},
            {vrici}.

lojbo: do simsa fi so'i da fe le mensi be mi
glico: You are a lot like my sister.
English_definition:
x1 is similar / parallel to x2 in property / quantity x3 (ka / ni);
            x1 looks / appears like x2. Also: x1 is a likeness / image of x2; x1
            and x2 are alike; similarity and parallel differ primarily in
            emphasis. See also {dunli}, {frica}, {mintu}, {panra}, {simlu},
            {vrici}.

lojbo:
le pendo be mi mi simsa le ka xabju ma kau i le pendo be mi mi jibni
            le ka xabju ma kau
glico:
My friend and I live in similar apartments. My friend and I live
            nearby.
English_definition:
x1 is similar / parallel to x2 in property / quantity x3 (ka / ni);
            x1 looks / appears like x2. Also: x1 is a likeness / image of x2; x1
            and x2 are alike; similarity and parallel differ primarily in
            emphasis. See also {dunli}, {frica}, {mintu}, {panra}, {simlu},
            {vrici}.

lojbo: do jo'u mi simxu le ka prami
glico: You and I love each other.
English_definition:
x1 (set) has members who mutually / reciprocally x2 (event [x1
            should be reflexive in 1+ sumti]). Members of x1 do to each other /
            one another x2, and in return do x2; x1 (plural set) do the same
            thing x2 to each other. See also {kampu}, {mintu}.

lojbo: ko na terpa le since
glico: Don't be afraid of snakes.
English_definition:
x1 is a snake / serpent of species / breed x2. See also {curnu},
            {danlu}, {respa}, {vindu}.

lojbo: no prije cu se sinma le se gugde be le gugde be vo'a
glico: No wise man is respected by inhabitants of his own country.
English_definition:
x1 esteems / respects / venerates / highly regards x2 [object of
            respect]. Also: x2 is respected / esteemed / celebrated (=
            selsi'a for reordered places). See also {banli}, {censa},
            {misno}, {nelci}, {prami}, {salci}, {jgira}.

lojbo: li no sinso le radno be li pai
glico: 0 is the sine of "pi" radians.
English_definition:
x1 is the trigonometric sine of angle / arcsine x2. See also
            {tanjo}.

lojbo:
fi le karce e le cadzu fa le xunre gusni cu sinxa le ka bilga le ka
            co'u muvdu
glico: For cars and pedestrians red light is a sign that they must stop.
English_definition:
x1 is a sign / symbol / signal representing / referring / signifying
            / meaning x2 to observer x3. Also: x1 signifies x2; (adjective:) x1
            is significant / meaningful / of import; signal an action (=
            {sniti'i}), connotation (= se {sibyti'isni},
            {sibyti'ismu}). See also {lerfu}, {tcita}, {barna}, {mifra},
            {smuni}.

lojbo: le verba ca'o sipna
glico: The child is sleeping.
English_definition:
x1 is asleep (adjective); x1 sleeps / is sleeping. See also {senva},
            {tatpi}, {cikna}, {sanji}.

lojbo: le dargu cu sirji le snanu le berti
glico: The road goes straight from the south to the north.

lojbo: mi sisku le ka te ciska vau le nenri be le mi'u nilce
glico:
I'm searching in the furniture for something that one can write
            on.
English_definition:
x1 seeks / searches / looks for property x2 among set x3 (complete
            specification of set). If searching for an object or an event, use
            tu'a in x2. See also {cirko}, {kalte}, {kavbu}, {kucli},
            {rivbi}, {manci}, {facki}.

lojbo: ko sisti le ka bebna tavla
glico: Stop babbling!
English_definition:
x1 [agent] ceases / stops / halts / ends activity / process / state
            x2 [not necessarily completing it]. See also {fanmo}, {mulno},
            {cfari}, {denpa}, {fliba}.

lojbo:
mi cusku lo sitna be la alis bei le du'u le mamta nau nu'o
            mo'u klama le zdani
glico:
I quoted Alice referring to the fact that the mother is not yet at
            home .
English_definition:
x1 cites / quotes / refers to / makes reference to source x2 for
            information / statement x3 (du'u). See also {krasi}.

lojbo: le tadji be le nu zbasu le poi tai kukte vau stasu cu sivni mi
glico: How to make such a tasty soup is a secret to me.
English_definition:
x1 is private / personal / privy / [secret / confidential /
            confined] to x2; x1 is not-public / hidden. Also: x1 is secret (one
            sense); x2 is in the know / in touch with / privy to x1 (= selsivni
            for reordered places); exclusion can be expressed by na'e(bo)
            in x2: excluded / in the dark (= {nalselsivni}). See also {gubni},
            {mipri}.

lojbo: mi pu te vecnu pa tordu skaci
glico: I bought a short skirt.
English_definition:
x1 is a skirt / kilt / dress of material x2; x1 is skirted [garment
            open at the bottom; not legged]. A skirted garment may be full
            length (pastu), but must hang below the waist from support above or
            at the waist. See also {taxfu}, {palku}.

lojbo: ti skalera le ci jarki
glico: These are stairs with three narrow steps.

lojbo: le skami pe mi cu spofu
glico: My computer is broken.
English_definition: x1 is a computer for purpose x2. See also {kanji}, {minji}, {pensi}.

lojbo: le skapi be le cnebo be mi cu xunre
glico: The skin on my neck is red.
English_definition:
x1 is a pelt / skin / hide / leather from x2. See also {pilka},
            {calku}, {kerfa}.

lojbo: le mi'u dacti cu skari le xunre
glico: It is colored red.
English_definition:
x1 is / appears to be of color / hue x2 as perceived / seen by x3
            under conditions x4. Conditions may include lighting, background,
            etc.. See also {blanu}, {bunre}, {cicna}, {cinta}, {crino}, {grusi},
            {narju}, {nukni}, {pelxu}, {xunre}, {zirpu}, {carmi}, {kandi},
            {xekri}, {blabi}.

lojbo: le mi'u xrula cu skari le tsani mi
glico: To me the flower has the color of the sky.
English_definition:
x1 is / appears to be of color / hue x2 as perceived / seen by x3
            under conditions x4. Conditions may include lighting, background,
            etc.. See also {blanu}, {bunre}, {cicna}, {cinta}, {crino}, {grusi},
            {narju}, {nukni}, {pelxu}, {xunre}, {zirpu}, {carmi}, {kandi},
            {xekri}, {blabi}.

lojbo: mi pu skicu le pa cinri lisri le panzi be mi
glico: I told an interesting story to my child.
English_definition:
x1 tells about / describes x2 (object / event / state) to audience
            x3 with description x4 (property). See also {lisri}, {tavla}.

lojbo: ai mi se marce le skiji be le djacu
glico: I am going to water ski.
English_definition:
x1 is a ski / skid / skate / runner for surface (of material) x2
            supporting skier / skater / sled / cargo x3. See also {sakli},
            {marce}, {cutci}.

lojbo: ei mi cikre le skiji be le djacu bei ti
glico: I should repair runners of this water sled.
English_definition:
x1 is a ski / skid / skate / runner for surface (of material) x2
            supporting skier / skater / sled / cargo x3. See also {sakli},
            {marce}, {cutci}.

lojbo: mi pu zgana pa skina be le crida
glico: I watched a movie about magical beings.
English_definition:
x1 is a cinema / movie / film about x2 [plot / theme / subject /
            activity], filmmaker x3, for audience x4. Also motion picture; x2
            may be a convention rather than a subject; cartoon / animation (=
            selxraci'a {skina}); television / tv show (= tivyskina,
            regardless of length, factual content, etc.). See also {tivni},
            {vidni}, {pixra}, {finti}.

lojbo: ti skori bi da
glico: This cable consists of 8 filaments.
English_definition:
x1 is cord / cable / rope / line / twine / cordage / woven strands
            of material x2. See also {cilta}, {jgena}, {marna}, {bikla},
            {linsi}.

lojbo: tu skori le jinme
glico: That is a metal cable.
English_definition:
x1 is cord / cable / rope / line / twine / cordage / woven strands
            of material x2. See also {cilta}, {jgena}, {marna}, {bikla},
            {linsi}.

lojbo: le mi'u skuro be le dertu cu ganra
glico: The trench in the ground is wide.
English_definition:
x1 is a groove / trench / furrow [shape / form] in object / surface
            x2. See also {plixa}.

lojbo: mi na se slabu la .kevin.
glico: I'm not familiar with Kevin.
English_definition:
x1 is old / familiar / well-known to observer x2 in feature x3 (ka)
            by standard x4. This can cover both meanings of old. Old in years,
            i.e. age, can be conveyed through x2 = the world, life, existence (=
            loi nu {zasti}); in usage this has been a common default for
            ellipsis. However slabu is not the opposite of 'young' (=
            {nalci'o}, {tolci'o}), but the opposite of 'new'
            (= {tolni'o}); also ancient (= {tcesau}), age (= {nilsau}); x2
            is used to x1 (= selsau for reordered places); historic / historical
            (= {cirsau}, {cirselcedra}; also {vaipru}). (cf. {clani}, {citno},
            {cnino}, se {djuno}; not the opposite of {citno}, {djuno})

lojbo: la alis cu slabu mi le ka jukpa le kukte torta
glico: Alice is familiar to me in cooking tasty cakes.
English_definition:
x1 is old / familiar / well-known to observer x2 in feature x3 (ka)
            by standard x4. This can cover both meanings of old. Old in years,
            i.e. age, can be conveyed through x2 = the world, life, existence (=
            loi nu {zasti}); in usage this has been a common default for
            ellipsis. However slabu is not the opposite of 'young' (=
            {nalci'o}, {tolci'o}), but the opposite of 'new'
            (= {tolni'o}); also ancient (= {tcesau}), age (= {nilsau}); x2
            is used to x1 (= selsau for reordered places); historic / historical
            (= {cirsau}, {cirselcedra}; also {vaipru}). (cf. {clani}, {citno},
            {cnino}, se {djuno}; not the opposite of {citno}, {djuno})

lojbo: zoi zoi.sla.zoi slaka la lojban
glico: "sla" is a syllable in Lojban.
English_definition: x1 is a syllable in language x2. See also {sance}, {valsi}, {bangu}.

lojbo: le slami pu jai rinka le nu le xance be mi cu cortu
glico: The acid made my hand hurt.

lojbo:
mi zgana le nu le karce pe mi zi'e pe le xa mei slanu cu zmadu
            le laldo karce pe mi le ka vlipa vau so'i da
glico:
I notice that my 6-cylinder car is much more powerful than my old
            car.
English_definition:
x1 is a cylinder [shape / form] of material x2. See also {kamju},
            {gunro}.

lojbo: le limxone cu slari so'e remna
glico: Lemon is sour to most people.
English_definition:
x1 is sour / tart to observer x2. See also {slami}, {titla},
            {kurki}, {nimre}.

lojbo: le mi'u ladru cu sutra le ka slari

English_definition:
x1 is sour / tart to observer x2. See also {slami}, {titla},

lojbo: ti noi dakli cu slasi
glico: This bag is plastic.
English_definition:
x1 is a quantity of / is made of / contains plastic / polymer of

lojbo: le mi'u ladru mo'u dunja gi'e ca sligu

English_definition:

lojbo:
le mi'u gerku pu jersi le mi'u jatna fau le ka jai gau

English_definition:
x1 oscillates at rate / frequency x2 through set /

            forth, reciprocal (motion), rotates, revolves. See also {dikni},
            {rilti}, {morna}, {desku}, {janbe}, {boxna}.

lojbo:
pa bombila pu slilu le snidu le ka te gusni le xunre jo'u le
            blanu
glico:
A light bulb was flickering every second changing from red to blue

English_definition:
x1 oscillates at rate / frequency x2 through set /
            sequence-of-states x3 (complete specification). Also (expressible
            either with desku or slilu): side to side, to and fro, back and
            forth, reciprocal (motion), rotates, revolves. See also {dikni},
            {rilti}, {morna}, {desku}, {janbe}, {boxna}.

lojbo:
le mi'u re nanla pu slilu fi le ka bajra se ka'a jo'u
            te ka'a
glico: The two boys were running to and fro.
English_definition:
x1 oscillates at rate / frequency x2 through set /
            sequence-of-states x3 (complete specification). Also (expressible
            either with desku or slilu): side to side, to and fro, back and
            forth, reciprocal (motion), rotates, revolves. See also {dikni},
            {rilti}, {morna}, {desku}, {janbe}, {boxna}.

lojbo: le sliri cu se pilno fi le ka zbasu le sacki
glico: Sulfur is used for making matches.
English_definition:
x1 is a quantity of / contains / is made of sulfur / brimstone (S);

lojbo: ko palpi le sluji be le birka be mi
glico: Touch and feel the muscle of my arm.

lojbo: ai mi co'e le tamca jo'u le sluni
glico: I'm going to have a tomato and an onion.
English_definition:
x1 is a quantity of / contains onions / scallions of type / cultivar
            x2. See also {stagi}.

lojbo: ti noi stasu cu se vrusi le sluni
glico: This soup tastes of onions.
English_definition:
x1 is a quantity of / contains onions / scallions of type / cultivar
            x2. See also {stagi}.

lojbo: pa mlatu mo'u kavbu pa smacu
glico: A cat has caught a mouse.
English_definition: x1 is a mouse of species / breed x2. See also {ratcu}.

lojbo: mi na birti le se smadi be mi bei le tcima
glico: I'm not sure in my guess about the weather.
English_definition:
x1 guesses / conjectures / surmises x2 (du'u) is true about
            subject x3; [epistemology]. Also: x1 has a hunch that x2 is true; x1
            imagines x2 is true; words usable for epistemology typically have a
            du'u place. See also {djuno}, {facki}, {jijnu}, {sruma}.

lojbo: mi smadi le nu mi'o ba bai ze'u cadzu
glico: I guess you and I will have to walk for long time.
English_definition:
x1 guesses / conjectures / surmises x2 (du'u) is true about
            subject x3; [epistemology]. Also: x1 has a hunch that x2 is true; x1
            imagines x2 is true; words usable for epistemology typically have a
            du'u place. See also {djuno}, {facki}, {jijnu}, {sruma}.

lojbo: e'o do smaji
glico: Please, be quiet.
English_definition:
x1 (source) is quiet / silent / [still] at observation point x2 by

lojbo: le mi'u xamsi cu simlu le ka smaji ti
glico: The sea looks quiet in sound from here.
English_definition:
x1 (source) is quiet / silent / [still] at observation point x2 by
            standard x3. See also {kerlo}, {panpi}, {savru}, {tirna}.

lojbo: mi smaka le tasta be le mi'u najnimre
glico: I taste the taste of the orange.
English_definition:
x1 feels the taste x2 See {tasta}, {vrusi}, {ganse}, {palpi},
            {viska}

lojbo: mi smaka pa najnimre
glico: I taste an orange.
English_definition:
x1 feels the taste x2 See {tasta}, {vrusi}, {ganse}, {palpi},
            {viska}

lojbo: mi smaka su'o titla
glico: I feel something sweet.
English_definition:
x1 feels the taste x2 See {tasta}, {vrusi}, {ganse}, {palpi},
            {viska}

lojbo: le mi'u boske cu culno le smani
glico: The forest is full of monkeys.
English_definition:
x1 is a monkey / ape / simian / baboon / chimpanzee of species /
            breed x2. See also {mabru}, {danlu}.

lojbo: mi fliba le ka zvafa'i le smoka pe mi
glico: I can't find my socks.
English_definition:
x1 is a sock / stocking [flexible foot and lower leg garment] of

lojbo: ko citka se pi'o le pa smuci
glico: Eat with a spoon.
English_definition:
x1 is a spoon / scoop (tool) for use x2, made of material x3. See

lojbo: ti smuci le nu kakpa le dertu
glico: This is a scoop for digging ground.
English_definition:
x1 is a spoon / scoop (tool) for use x2, made of material x3. See

lojbo: ma lojbo smuni zoi sy.hola.sy. poi spano
glico: What is the Lojban for Spanish "hola"?
English_definition:
x1 is a meaning / interpretation of x2 recognized / seen / accepted
            by x3. Referential meaning (=selsni, snismu). See also {jimpe},
            {sinxa}, {valsi}, {tanru}, {gismu}, {lujvo}, {cmavo}, {jufra}.

lojbo: .i mi pu te smuni zoi zoi.y.zoi le nu mi na birti
glico: By saying {y} I meant that I wasn't sure.
English_definition:
x1 is a meaning / interpretation of x2 recognized / seen / accepted
            by x3. Referential meaning (=selsni, snismu). See also {jimpe},
            {sinxa}, {valsi}, {tanru}, {gismu}, {lujvo}, {cmavo}, {jufra}.

lojbo: la jasmin pu smusku le jitfa do
glico: Jasmine lied to you.

lojbo: la kevin pu smusku le nu do nitcu le nu mi sidju do
glico: Kevin said that you need my help.

lojbo:
mi pu snada le ka gasnu tu'a le fagri vau le ka jai gau mosra
            pa grana pa grana
glico: I succeeded in producing fire by rubbing one stick against another.
English_definition:
x1 [agent] succeeds in / achieves / completes / accomplishes x2 as a

lojbo:
le pendo be mi cu xabju bu'u le snanu be ti bei le farna be

glico:
My friend live to the south of this place in terms of magnetic

English_definition:

lojbo: le nu mi pu bajra cu snidu li pa mu
glico: I ran in 15 seconds.
English_definition:
x1 is x2 seconds in duration (default is 1 second) by standard x3.

            {dekto}, {femti}, {gigdo}, {gocti}, {gotro}, {kilto}, {megdo},
            {mikri}, {milti}, {nanvi}, {petso}, {picti}, {terto}, {xatsi},
            {xecto}, {xexso}, {zepti}, {zetro}.

lojbo: le mi'u snime cu lenku
glico: The snow is cold.
English_definition:
x1 is made of / contains / is a quantity / expanse of snow. See also
            {bratu}, {carvi}, {bisli}.

lojbo: le cirla pu snipa le moklu be mi
glico: The cheese sticked to my mouth.
English_definition:
x1 adheres / sticks to x2; (adjective:) x1 is sticky / gummy /
            adhesive. Note that x1 is the adhering surface being claimed; x2
            need not be sticky. See also {tarla}, {viknu}.

lojbo: mi pu citka pa snuji be le rectu bei le nanba
glico: I ate a bread sandwich with meat inside.
