glico: Is this a picture of a cow's vagina?
English_definition:
x1 is a / the vagina [body-part] of x2. See also {cinse}, {gletu},
            {pinji}, {plibu}, {vlagi}, {mabla}.

lojbo: ti vidni le ka jai gau zgana le se klani be le livla
glico: This is the screen for showing the amount of fuel.
English_definition:
x1 is a video monitor / CRT / screen [machine] serving function x2.
            See also {skina}, ve {tivni}.

lojbo: ti vidru la rotavirus le remna
glico: This is Rotavirus that infects humans.
English_definition:
x1 is a virus of species / breed / defining property x2 capable of
            infecting [at] x3. See also {jurme}.

lojbo: xu le mi'u finpe cu vifne
glico: Is the fish fresh?
English_definition: (adjective:) x1 is fresh / unspoiled. See also {fusra}.

lojbo: le mi'u verba cu vikmi le pinca le xadni le nakpinji
glico: The child excretes the urine from the body via the penis.
English_definition:
x1 [body] excretes waste x2 from source x3 via means / route x4. See
            also {cigla}, {kalci}, {pinca}, {xasne}.

lojbo: le mi'u jisra cu viknu
glico: The juice is thick.
English_definition:
x1 is thick / viscous under conditions x2. See also {denmi},
            {snipa}.

lojbo: no ladru cu ve vimcu
glico: No milk left.
English_definition:
x1 removes / subtracts / deducts / takes away x2 from x3 with /
            leaving result / remnant / remainder x4. Also appropriates,
            confiscates; alienation is inherent. See also {lebna}, {muvdu},
            {cpacu}, {canci}, {cliva}, {jdika}.

lojbo: mi pu vimcu le jbari le mi'u torta le matne
glico: I removed berries from the cake leaving the butter.
English_definition:
x1 removes / subtracts / deducts / takes away x2 from x3 with /
            leaving result / remnant / remainder x4. Also appropriates,
            confiscates; alienation is inherent. See also {lebna}, {muvdu},
            {cpacu}, {canci}, {cliva}, {jdika}.

lojbo: le cakla cu vindu le gerku
glico: Chocolate is a poison to dogs.
English_definition:
x1 is poisonous / venomous / toxic / a toxin to x2. See also
            {since}.

lojbo: mi pu ca'o vofli bu'u pa vinji be le prenu
glico: I was flying in a passenger's airplane.
English_definition:
x1 is an airplane / aircraft [flying vehicle] for carrying
            passengers / cargo x2, propelled by x3. See also {vofli}, {sabnu}.

lojbo: la kevin cu vipsi fi mi fe le ka platu
glico: Kevin is my vice in planning.
English_definition:
x1 is a deputy / vice / subordinate in aspect [or organization
            principle] x2 (ka) to principal x3. Also assistant, adjutant. See
            also {krati}, {sidju}.

lojbo: do pu virnu le ka klama le nenri be le jelca dinju
glico: It was brave of you to enter the burning house.
English_definition:
x1 is brave / valiant / courageous in activity x2 (event) by
            standard x3. See also {terpa}, {darsi}.

lojbo:
pa plise zo'u mi viska le se skari be ri i le mi'u plise
            cu skari le xunre
glico: There is an apple. I see a color of it. The apple is colored red.
English_definition:
x1 sees / views / perceives visually x2 under conditions x3. Also
            (adjective:) x1 is visual; x3 can include ambient lighting,
            background, etc. which may affect what is perceived; note that
            English 'see' often means 'look' or a more
            generic 'observe', or even 'understand, know'.
            See also {catlu}, {jvinu}, {kanla}, {minra}, {simlu}, {djuno},
            {jimpe}, {zgana}, {ganse}.

lojbo: mi viska le tarmi be pa najnimre i ri se tarmi le cukla
glico: I see the form of an orange. The orange is round.
English_definition:
x1 sees / views / perceives visually x2 under conditions x3. Also
            (adjective:) x1 is visual; x3 can include ambient lighting,
            background, etc. which may affect what is perceived; note that
            English 'see' often means 'look' or a more
            generic 'observe', or even 'understand, know'.
            See also {catlu}, {jvinu}, {kanla}, {minra}, {simlu}, {djuno},
            {jimpe}, {zgana}, {ganse}.

lojbo: mi pu viska le nu le mi'u fetsi cu limna
glico: I saw her swim.
English_definition:
x1 sees / views / perceives visually x2 under conditions x3. Also
            (adjective:) x1 is visual; x3 can include ambient lighting,
            background, etc. which may affect what is perceived; note that
            English 'see' often means 'look' or a more
            generic 'observe', or even 'understand, know'.
            See also {catlu}, {jvinu}, {kanla}, {minra}, {simlu}, {djuno},
            {jimpe}, {zgana}, {ganse}.

lojbo:
le mi'u bombila cu vitci le ka te gusni i ja'o le
            mi'u bombila cu spofu
glico: The light bulb gives an intermittent light. It must be broken.
English_definition:
x1 is irregular / occasional / intermittent in property / action /
            aspect x2. See also {ranji}, {rufsu}, {suksa}.

lojbo: mi vitke le mensi be mi bu'u la moskov
glico: I visited my sister in Moscow.
English_definition:
x1 is a guest / visitor of x2 at place / event x3; x1 visits x2 /
            x3. See also {friti}, {klama}, {zasni}, {xabju}, {zvati}.

lojbo: ko vitke mi le zdani be mi
glico: Be my guest at my home!
English_definition:
x1 is a guest / visitor of x2 at place / event x3; x1 visits x2 /
            x3. See also {friti}, {klama}, {zasni}, {xabju}, {zvati}.

lojbo: mi pu'o cpedu le ka vitke mi le zdani be mi vau so'o pendo
glico: I am about to invite a few friends to my home.
English_definition:
x1 is a guest / visitor of x2 at place / event x3; x1 visits x2 /
            x3. See also {friti}, {klama}, {zasni}, {xabju}, {zvati}.

lojbo: ti noi senta le dertu cu vitno le ka bisli
glico: This layer of soil is permanently frozen.
English_definition:
x1 is permanent / lasting / [eternal] in property x2 (ka) by
            standard x3 [time-span / expectant one]. Also everlasting. See also
            {stodi}, {cimni}, {zasni}, {manfo}, {stali}.

lojbo: le vlagi be ti noi bakni cu jai se bilma
glico: The vulva of this cow has symptoms of a disease.
English_definition:
x1 is a / the vulva [body-part] of x2. See also {cinse}, {gletu},
            {pinji}, {plibu}, {vibna}, {mabla}.

lojbo: le se cukta be ti cu vlaste le lojbo
glico: This book is a Lojban dictionary.

lojbo: le brife pu vlile
glico: It was a storm.
English_definition: x1 is an event / state / act of violence. See also {suksa}, {jursa}.

lojbo: le mamta be mi ku po'o cu vlipa le nu mi cliva
glico: Only my mother has power to make me leave.
English_definition:
x1 has the power to bring about x2 under conditions x3; x1 is
            powerful in aspect x2 under x3. Also potent, has control / mastery.
            See also {tsali}, {jitro}, {ruble}.

lojbo: ma vlipa le nu co'a carvi
glico: Who is powerful enough to cause rain?
English_definition:
x1 has the power to bring about x2 under conditions x3; x1 is
            powerful in aspect x2 under x3. Also potent, has control / mastery.
            See also {tsali}, {jitro}, {ruble}.

lojbo: vo manti ca plipe le mi'u tricu
glico: There are 4 ants climbing the tree.
English_definition: digit / number: 4 (digit) [four].

lojbo: la kevin cu zvati le zdani be vo'a
glico: Kevin is at home.
English_definition: pro-sumti: repeats 1st place of main bridi of this sentence.

lojbo: la alis cu se pluka le ka tavla vo'a
glico: Alice likes to talk about herself.
English_definition: pro-sumti: repeats 1st place of main bridi of this sentence.

lojbo: mi tavla do ba'e vo'e
glico: I'm talking to you about YOU!
English_definition: pro-sumti: repeats 2nd place of main bridi of this sentence.

lojbo: xu do pu cusku fi mi fe zo'e pe vo'i
glico: Did you say to me something about me?
English_definition: pro-sumti: repeats 3rd place of main bridi of this sentence.

lojbo: mi tavla fo la lojban fi vo'o
glico: I'm talking in Lojban about Lojban.
English_definition: pro-sumti: repeats 4th place of main bridi of this sentence.

lojbo:
mi pu klama fu le karce fe le patfu be mi be'o noi ta'o pu
            dunda vo'u mi
glico: I went by car to my father who, by the way, had granted me it.
English_definition: pro-sumti: repeats 5th place of main bridi of this sentence.

lojbo: le toldi cu vofli le nalci
glico: Butterflies fly using wings.
English_definition:
x1 flies [in air / atmosphere] using lifting / propulsion means x2.
            See also {cipni}, {klama}, {vinji}.

lojbo: le ca vanci cu pluka i le tai ditcu voi vanci na cafne
glico:
This evening is pleasant. Such time that is this evening
            doesn't happen often.
English_definition:
non-veridical restrictive clause used to form complicated le-like
            descriptions using ke'a.

lojbo: le voksa be le mi'u ninmu cu to'e cladu
glico: The woman's voice is quiet.
English_definition:
x1 is a voice / speech sound of individual x2. See also {sance},
            {tirna}, {bacru}.

lojbo: ti du le vorme poi ve klama le mi'u zarci
glico: This is the doorway to the store.
English_definition:
x1 is a doorway / gateway / access way between x2 and x3 of
            structure x4. Note: emphasis on route nature; solid door (= vrogai /
            vrobi'u / vrozu'itci). See also {canko}, {ganlo}, {kalri},
            {murta}, {pagre}, {bitmu}, {kuspe}.

lojbo: tu noi kevna cu vorme le re kumfa
glico: That hole is a doorway between the two rooms.
English_definition:
x1 is a doorway / gateway / access way between x2 and x3 of
            structure x4. Note: emphasis on route nature; solid door (= vrogai /
            vrobi'u / vrozu'itci). See also {canko}, {ganlo}, {kalri},
            {murta}, {pagre}, {bitmu}, {kuspe}.

lojbo:
ti noi jinci cu vraga le ka se pi'o ce'u katna le pelji
            vau le midju le re mei
glico:
These scissors is a lever for cutting paper with the fulcrum in the
            middle and two arms.
English_definition:
x1 is a lever [tool] [of apparatus] for doing x2 [function /
            action], with fulcrum x3 and arm x4. See also {tutci}, {pulni}.

lojbo: ti vreji le pu se cusku be mi le skami le pelji
glico: This is a paper record of what I said in past about computers.
English_definition:
x1 is a record of x2 (data / facts / du'u) about x3 (object /
            event) preserved in medium x4. See also {sorcu}, {datni}, {papri}.

lojbo: do pu vreta le ckana ji le sfofa
glico: Were you lying on the bed or on the sofa?
English_definition:
x1 lies / rests / reclines / reposes on x2; x1 is reclining /
            recumbent / lying on x2. See also {cpana}, {surla}, {zutse},
            {ckana}, {lazni}.

lojbo: le za'u vi mlatu cu vrici le ka skari ma kau
glico: These cats vary in color.
English_definition:
x1 (set / mass / ind.) is miscellaneous / various / assorted in
            property x2 (ka). See also {klesi}, {girzu}, {frica}, {simsa},
            {panra}.

lojbo: ra vrude le ka sidju le prenu
glico: He is virtuous in helping people.
English_definition:
x1 is virtuous / saintly / [fine / moral / nice / holy / morally
            good] by standard x2. Holy / saintly (= {cesyvu'e}). Virtue the
            attribute is 'ka vrude'. See also {palci}, {xamgu},
            {marde}, {zabna}.

lojbo: la kevin na ji'e vrude
glico: Kevin isn't moral to such degree.
English_definition:
x1 is virtuous / saintly / [fine / moral / nice / holy / morally
            good] by standard x2. Holy / saintly (= {cesyvu'e}). Virtue the
            attribute is 'ka vrude'. See also {palci}, {xamgu},
            {marde}, {zabna}.

lojbo: le vrusi be le mi'u finpe cu carmi
glico: The fish has a strong flavour.
English_definition:
x1 (ka) is a taste / flavor of / emitted by x2; x2 tastes of / like
            x1. Also: x2 tastes of seasoning x1, x1 is a seasoned flavor of x2
            (= {tsapyvu'i}); vrusi may overlap the senses of taste and
            smell, since the latter is a significant component of taste. See
            also {kukte}, {tsapi}, {cpina}, {panci}.

lojbo: le mi'u prenu ca zvati vu ci trene tcana ki mi
glico: The man is now far away, three train stations from me.
English_definition:
location tense distance: far from ... ; yonder at ... ; a long
            distance from ...

lojbo: ie vu'e sarcu fa le nu le mi'u tcadu cu se daspo
glico: It's my virtue, I agree that the city should be destroyed.
English_definition: attitudinal modifier: virtue - sin. See also {vrude}, {zungi}.

lojbo: mi djica vu'e nai le nu do na cliva
glico: My sin, I don't want you to leave.
English_definition: attitudinal modifier: virtue - sin. See also {vrude}, {zungi}.

lojbo: ui vu'e nai mi pu citka pa titla poi mi pu zekri lebna
glico: Yay, I ate a candy that I had stolen.
English_definition: attitudinal modifier: virtue - sin. See also {vrude}, {zungi}.

lojbo: zo oi e zo ua vu'o poi do pu cusku cu srana xu le jibri be do
glico:
Are "Ouch" and "Eureka" that you said related to
            your job?
English_definition:
joins relative clause / phrase to complete complex or logically
            connected sumti in afterthought.

lojbo: li pa pa vu'u bi du li ci
English_definition:
n-ary mathematical operator: minus; subtraction operator; [(((a - b)
            - c) - ...)].

lojbo: xa cipni ca vofli
glico: There are 6 birds flying.
English_definition: digit / number: 6 (digit) [six].

lojbo: mi pu xa'o citka pa torta
glico: I ate a cake too early.
English_definition:
opposite of za'o: event contour: refers to the portion of the
            event which occurs before the natural beginning; starting too early
            before ...; <----.

lojbo: ue do ti xa'o zvati
glico: Wow, you are already here.
English_definition:
opposite of za'o: event contour: refers to the portion of the
            event which occurs before the natural beginning; starting too early
            before ...; <----.

lojbo: do xabju ma noi gugde
glico: What country do you live in?
English_definition:
x1 dwells / lives / resides / abides at / inhabits / is a resident
            of location / habitat / nest / home / abode x2. See also {ginka},
            {zdani}, {zvati}, {stuzi}, {jmive}, {stali}, {vitke}.

lojbo: do xabju ma noi tcadu
glico: What city do you live in?
English_definition:
x1 dwells / lives / resides / abides at / inhabits / is a resident
            of location / habitat / nest / home / abode x2. See also {ginka},
            {zdani}, {zvati}, {stuzi}, {jmive}, {stali}, {vitke}.

lojbo: mi pu katna le mi'u plise le re xadba
glico: I cut the apple in half.
English_definition:
x1 is exactly / approximately half / semi- / demi- / hemi- of x2 by
            standard x3. See also {mulno}, {pagbu}.

lojbo: le pa xadba be le mi'u plise cu fusra
glico: Half of the apple is rotten.
English_definition:
x1 is exactly / approximately half / semi- / demi- / hemi- of x2 by
            standard x3. See also {mulno}, {pagbu}.

lojbo: le xadni be le mi'u ninmu cu clani
glico: The woman's body is long.
English_definition:
x1 is a / the body / corpus / corpse of x2; (adjective:) x1 is
            corporal / corporeal. See also {menli}, {pruxi}, {sluji}, {mulno},
            {cutne}.

lojbo: mi xagji le rectu
glico: I am hungry for meat.
English_definition:
x1 hungers for x2; x1 needs / wants food / fuel x2. See also
            {cidja}, {citka}, {djica}, {nitcu}, {taske}.

lojbo: le mi'u nixli pu zgipli le xagri
glico: The girl was playing the pipe.
English_definition:
x1 is a oboe / clarinet / saxophone [reed musical instrument] with
            reed x2. See also {zgike}.

lojbo: le mi'u verba gerku cu xajmi mi le ka plipe tai ma kau
glico: The puppet seems funny to me in how it jumps.
English_definition:
x1 is funny / comical to x2 in property / aspect x3 (nu / ka); x3 is
            what is funny about x1 to x2. Also: x1 is a comedian (= {xampre},
            {xamseljibri} for a professional comedian). (x1 can be a person /
            object or an abstraction; be careful about possible sumti-raising);
            See also {bebna}, {cisma}, {cmila}, {fenki}, {zdile}.

lojbo: le mi'u karce cu xaksu le so'i livla
glico: The car consumes a lot of fuel.
English_definition:
x1 (event) uses up / depletes / consumes / [wastes] x2 [resource].
            Waste (= {fesxaksu}, {dusxaksu}). See also {citka}, {festi},
            {daspo}, {livla}, {pinxe}.

lojbo: mi pu xalbo le ka stidi le nu ra gidva mi'o
glico: I wasn't serious in suggesting that he guides us.
English_definition:
x1 uses levity / is non-serious / frivolous about x2 (abstraction).
            See also {junri}, {linto}.

lojbo: ti xalka le se zbasu be fi le vanjba
glico: This is alcohol made of grapes.
English_definition:
x1 is a quantity of / contains / is made of alcohol of type x2 from
            source / process x3. See also {birje}, {jikru}, {vanju}.

lojbo:
le mi'u fetsi pu xalni le ka da'i nai pu se cinba pa fange
            nanmu
glico: She panicked when she was kissed by an unfamiliar man.
English_definition:
x1 (person) is panicked by crisis x2 (event / state). See also
            {ckape}, {snura}, {terpa}, {xanka}.

lojbo: ba zi ku mi se xamgu
glico: Soon I'll be okay.
English_definition:
x1 (object / event) is good / beneficial / nice / [acceptable] for
            x2 by standard x3. Acceptable (= {mlixau}, {norxau}, {xaurselcru}).
            See also {melbi}, {xlali}, {vrude}, {zabna}.

lojbo:
.i le'e plise cu xamgu le nu kanro .i ji'a le'e plise
            cu kukte
glico: Apples are good for your health. And, in addition, they taste great.
English_definition:
x1 (object / event) is good / beneficial / nice / [acceptable] for
            x2 by standard x3. Acceptable (= {mlixau}, {norxau}, {xaurselcru}).
            See also {melbi}, {xlali}, {vrude}, {zabna}.

lojbo: ti voi minji cu xampo li re
glico: This machine has a current of 2 amperes.
English_definition:
x1 is x2 ampere(s) [metric unit] in current (default is 1) by
            standard x3. See also {dikca}, {flecu}, {centi}, {decti}, {dekto},
            {femti}, {gigdo}, {gocti}, {gotro}, {kilto}, {megdo}, {mikri},
            {milti}, {nanvi}, {petso}, {picti}, {terto}, {xatsi}, {xecto},
            {xexso}, {zepti}, {zetro}.

lojbo: ti xamsi le berti
glico: This is a northern sea.
English_definition:
x1 is a sea / ocean / gulf / [atmosphere] of planet x2, of fluid x3;
            (adjective:) x1 is marine. Also atmosphere (= {varxamsi},
            {varsenta}). See also {daplu}, {djacu}, {lalxu}, {rirxe}, {tumla},
            {vacri}, {zbani}, {ctaru}.

lojbo: le xance be do cu jai pluka fai le nu ri se pencu
glico: Your hands are pleasant to the touch.
English_definition:
x1 is a / the hand [body-part] of x2; [metaphor: manipulating tool,
            waldo]. (adjective:) x1 is manual. See also {birka}, {degji},
            {jitro}, {xlura}, {jamfu}, {tamji}.

lojbo: mi xanka le nu do se la'u li xo kau kanro
glico: I am concerned for your health.
English_definition:
x1 is nervous / anxious about x2 (abstraction) under conditions x3.
            See also {xalni}, {terpa}, {raktu}.

lojbo: mi na kakne le ka se xanri le nu mi sazri le trene
glico: I can't imagine myself driving a train.
English_definition:
x1 [concept] exists in the imagination of / is imagined by / is
            imaginary to x2. Also (adjective:) x1 is mental (one sense), x1 is
            unreal (one sense); in spite of the synonym, note that x1 is
            imaginary does not imply that it doesn't exist in the real
            world; the definition is crafted so that one can talk about
            imaginary things without claiming that they thereby don't
            exist. See also {fatci}, {senva}, {sucta}, {zasti}, {cfika},
            {dacti}, {menli}, {sidbo}.

lojbo: le xanto cu se nazbi le clani
glico: Elephants have long noses.
English_definition: x1 is an elephant of species / breed x2. See also {mabru}, {barda}.

lojbo: le ka dunda le titla cu xarci le verba le makcu
glico: Giving sugar sweets is a weapon against children used by grown-ups.
English_definition:
x1 is a weapon / arms for use against x2 by x3. Gun / cannon (=
            {celxa'i}). See also {jenmi}, {sonci}, {catra}.

lojbo: xu le xarju cu simsa le remna
glico: Are pigs similar to humans?
English_definition:
x1 is a pig / hog / swine / [boar] [pork / ham / bacon-producer] of
            species / breed x2. Sow (= {fetxarju}), boar (= {nakyxarju}), pork
            (= {xajre'u}), piglet (= {citxarju}). See also {mabru},
            {cange}.

lojbo:
le mi'u nakni cu xarnu le mamta be vo'a le ka na volta le
            zdani
glico: He was obstinate in front of his mother in not returning home.
English_definition:
x1 is stubborn / willfully opposing / resisting x2 about x3 (event /
            state). x2 may be a person, a state or condition, or a force; the
            essence is willful resistance. See also {tinsa}, {pante}, {bapli},
            {fapro}.

lojbo: le mi'u fetsi ca xarnu fi le ka jinvi ma kau
glico: She is obstinate in her opinion.
English_definition:
x1 is stubborn / willfully opposing / resisting x2 about x3 (event /
            state). x2 may be a person, a state or condition, or a force; the
            essence is willful resistance. See also {tinsa}, {pante}, {bapli},
            {fapro}.

lojbo: le xasli ne se mau le xirma cu tsali
glico: Donkeys are stronger than horses.
English_definition:
x1 is a donkey / jackass of species / breed x2. See also {xirma},
            {kumte}.

lojbo: le xasne be ra cu se cigla ti
glico: His sweat is secreted by these glands.
English_definition:
x1 is a / the sweat / perspiration from body x2, excreted by
            gland(s) / organs x3. See also {pinca}, {vikmi}, {cigla}.

lojbo: ti xatra la alis mi le se du'u mi prami la alis
glico: This is a letter to Alice from me where I as saying I loved her.
English_definition:
x1 is a letter / missive / [note] to intended audience x2 from
            author / originator x3 with content x4. (cf. notci, which has places
            in a different order; the emphasis in xatra is on the communication
            between author and recipient, and not the content, which in a letter
            may not easily be categorized to a 'subject'; ciska,
            mrilu, papri)

lojbo: le vidru cu xatsi le ka grake vau le ka tilju
glico: The virus is one attogram in mass.
English_definition:
x1 is $10^{-18}$ of x2 in dimension / aspect x3 (default is units).
            See also {grake}, {mitre}, {snidu}, {stero}, {delno}, {molro},
            {kelvo}, {xampo}, {gradu}, {litce}, {merli}, {centi}, {decti},
            {dekto}, {femti}, {gigdo}, {gocti}, {gotro}, {kilto}, {megdo},
            {mikri}, {milti}, {nanvi}, {petso}, {picti}, {terto}, {xecto},
            {xexso}, {zepti}, {zetro}.

lojbo: le mi'u tcaci cu steci le xazdo gugde
glico: The custom is specific to Asian countries.
English_definition:
x1 reflects Asiatic culture / nationality / geography in aspect x2.
            See also {polno}, {friko}, {jungo}, {rusko}, {ropno}.

lojbo: mi xebni le kibro xe mrilu
glico: I hate internet mail system.
English_definition: 5th conversion; switch 1st / 5th places.

lojbo: mi xebni le ka zgana le nu do se tasmi le simsa
glico: I hate seeing you like this.
English_definition:
x1 hates / despises x2 (object / abstraction); x1 is full of hate
            for x2; x2 is odious to x1. x1 is hateful (one sense); x2 is hateful
            (different sense). See also {djica}, {nitcu}, {rigni}, {prami},
            {nelci}.

lojbo: le rirxe cu xecto le ka mitre li pa no no vau le ka sraji
glico: The river is 100 meters deep.
English_definition:
x1 is a hundred [100; $10^2$] of x2 in dimension / aspect x3
            (default is units). Cf. {grake}, {mitre}, {snidu}, {stero}, {delno},
            {molro}, {kelvo}, {xampo}, {gradu}, {litce}, {merli}, {centi},
            {decti}, {dekto}, {femti}, {gigdo}, {gocti}, {gotro}, {kilto},
            {megdo}, {mikri}, {milti}, {nanvi}, {petso}, {picti}, {terto},
            {xatsi}, {xexso}, {zepti}, {zetro}.

lojbo:
mi pu carmi cmila i ja'e bo mi na ru'e jai se torni le
            xedja
glico: I was laughing so hard that I nearly dislocated my jaw.
English_definition: x1 is a / the jaw [body-part] of x2. See also {stedu}.

lojbo: mi ba cliva de'i li cy xei
glico: I will leave at 2pm.
English_definition:
digit / number: hex digit E (decimal 14) [fourteen] Used as an
            alternative to {rei} to avoid confusion with {re}.

lojbo: nandu fa le nu zvafa'i le xekri mlatu bu'u le manku kumfa
glico: It's hard to find a black cat in a dark room.
English_definition:
x1 is black / extremely dark-colored [color adjective]. See also
            {blabi}, {grusi}, {manku}, {skari}, {xekri}, {kandi}, {carmi},
            {blanu}, {bunre}, {cicna}, {crino}, {narju}, {nukni}, {pelxu},
            {xunre}, {zirpu}.

lojbo: ra pu xendo mi le ka dunda pa sanmi mi
glico: He was kind to me in providing me with a meal.
English_definition:
x1 (person) is kind to x2 in actions / behavior x3. See also
            {cinmo}, {kecti}, {pendo}, {kusru}.

lojbo: do ba xenru le ka lazni
glico: You will regret your laziness.
English_definition:
x1 regrets / rues (abstraction) x2; x1 is regretful / rueful / sorry
            / [remorseful] about x2. Also: x1 feels remorse about x2 (=
            {zugyxe'u}). (cf. cmavo list .u'u, zungi)

lojbo:
le ka xexso le ka snidu vau le ka temci cu gigdo le ka nanca li
            ji'i ci re vau le ka temci
glico: 1 exasecond is approximately 32 billion years.
English_definition:
x1 is $10^{18}$ of x2 in dimension / aspect x3 (default is units).
            Cf. {grake}, {mitre}, {snidu}, {stero}, {delno}, {molro}, {kelvo},
            {xampo}, {gradu}. {litce}, {merli}, {centi}, {decti}, {dekto},
            {femti}, {gigdo}, {gocti}, {gotro}, {kilto}, {megdo}, {mikri},
            {milti}, {nanvi}, {petso}, {picti}, {terto}, {xatsi}, {xecto},
            {zepti}, {zetro}.

lojbo: mi se xi ba'e pa prami la kevin
glico: I love (love!) Kevin (not that he loves me).
English_definition:
subscript; attaches a numer of letteral string following as a
            subscript onto grammar structures.

lojbo: mi do se xi vei pa e re prami
glico: I love you, and you love me.
English_definition:
subscript; attaches a numer of letteral string following as a
            subscript onto grammar structures.

lojbo: fa xi xo'e mi fa xi xo'e do viska
glico: You, I see (maybe you see me, maybe I see you, context will tell).
English_definition:
subscript; attaches a numer of letteral string following as a
            subscript onto grammar structures.

lojbo:
la alis e la an pu zvati le pa nu penmi i ba zi bo ku'i a bu xi
            re cliva
glico: Alice and Ann were at a meeting. But Ann left soon.
English_definition:
subscript; attaches a numer of letteral string following as a
            subscript onto grammar structures.

lojbo: le mi'u uenzi cu xindo
glico: The text is in Hindi.
English_definition:
x1 reflects Hindi language / culture / religion in aspect x2.
            Defaults to not include Urdu; Indian (Bharat) nationality may be
            implied (when constrained by xingu'e). See also {srito},
            {xurdo}, {bengo}.

lojbo: le penbi pe mi co'u te xinmo fi da
glico: My pen has run out of ink.
English_definition:
x1 is a quantity of ink of color / pigment x2 used by writing device
            x3. See also {penbi}.

lojbo: ti xinmo le blanu
glico: This is blue ink.
English_definition:
x1 is a quantity of ink of color / pigment x2 used by writing device
            x3. See also {penbi}.

lojbo: le mi'u grusi xirma pu'i sutra
glico: The gray horse is fast.
English_definition:
x1 is a horse / equine / [colt / mare / stallion / pony] of species
            / breed x2. (adjective:) x1 is equine / equestrian. See also
            {sufti}, {xasli}, {kumte}.

lojbo: xu do mo'u cikre le mi'u xislu
glico: Have you fixed the wheel?
English_definition:
x1 is a wheel [tool] of device / vehicle x2, made of materials /
            having properties x3. See also {carce}, {karce}, {pulni}, {tutci}.

lojbo: le nu le speni be mi cu bilma cu xlali da'i mi
glico: An illness of my spouse would be bad for me.
English_definition:
x1 is bad for x2 by standard x3; x1 is poor / unacceptable to x2. Be
            careful to distinguish between a bad / unacceptable event, and a bad
            / unacceptable agent: x1 does poorly (= lenu ko'a gasnu cu
            xlali and not normally ko'a {xlali}). See also {palci},
            {mabla}, {xamgu}, {betri}.

lojbo:
do pu xlura sa'u mi le ka te vecnu ti voi dinju vau le ka jai
            gau cenba fai le jdima
glico: You just lured me into buying this house by changing the price.
English_definition:
x1 (agent) influences / lures / tempts x2 into action / state x3 by
            influence / threat / lure x4. Also impresses; x4 is alluring (=
            {trivelxlu} for place reordering); x3 may be an achieved action /
            state, or an attempt to perform an action / enter a state). (x3 and
            x4 are normally events or states); See also {djica}, {mukti},
            {trina}, {jitro}, {sazri}, {tcica}, {xance}, {stidi}, {kajde},
            {maksi}.

lojbo: xo prenu ba zvati le nu penmi
glico: How many people will be present at the meeting?
English_definition: digit / number: number / digit / lerfu question.

lojbo: lu do nanca li xo li'u lu pa ci li'u
glico: "How old are you?" "Thirteen."
English_definition: digit / number: number / digit / lerfu question.

lojbo: mi na djuno le du'u le xo kau mlatu cu zvati tu
glico: I don't know how many cats are there.
English_definition: digit / number: number / digit / lerfu question.

lojbo: re xo'e prenu pu zvati le mi'u kumfa
glico: 20 - 29 people were present in the room.
English_definition:
elliptical / unspecified number. See also {tu'o}, {xo},
            {zo'e}, {co'e}, and {do'e}.

lojbo: je'u xo'o do ne se mau djuno
glico: Yes, of course, you know better (sarcastically)!
English_definition:
attitudinal modifier: sarcastically - sincerely There is no good
            attitudinal for sarcasm. Chosen for its similarity to {zo'o}.

lojbo: xo'o nai sai do pu se la'u li rau gunka
glico: With full sincerity, I can tell you that you worked enough.
English_definition:
attitudinal modifier: sarcastically - sincerely There is no good
            attitudinal for sarcasm. Chosen for its similarity to {zo'o}.

lojbo: la uestern poi xotli cu zvati ma
glico: Where is "Western" hotel?
English_definition:
x1 is a hotel / inn / hostel at location x2 operated by x3. See also
            {barja}, {gusta}.

lojbo: le pendo be mi cu xrabo
glico: My friend is Arabic.
English_definition:
x1 reflects Arabic-speaking culture / nationality in aspect x2. See
            also {sadjo}, {semto}, {lubno}, {rakso}, {sirxo}.

lojbo:
le mi'u nanla pu xrani le cidni be vo'a ja'e le nu ri
            cortu
glico: The boy injured his knee so that it hurt.
English_definition:
x1 (event) injures / harms / damages victim x2 in property x3 (ka)
            resulting in injury x4 (state). Also hurts. See also {cortu},
            {daspo}, {spofu}, {katna}, {porpi}.

lojbo: le jalge be le nu xrani cu ckape
glico: The injury is dangerous.
English_definition:
x1 (event) injures / harms / damages victim x2 in property x3 (ka)
            resulting in injury x4 (state). Also hurts. See also {cortu},
            {daspo}, {spofu}, {katna}, {porpi}.

lojbo: le mi'u nanmu pu klama pa malsi be le xriso
glico: The woman went to a Christian temple.
English_definition:
x1 pertains to the Christian religion / culture / nationality in
            aspect x2. See also {jegvo}, {lijda}.

lojbo: bu'u la nipon le prenu cu citka le xruba nudle
glico: In Japan people like eating buckwheat noodles.
English_definition:
x1 is a quantity of buckwheat / rhubarb / sorrel grass of species /
            strain x2. See also {spati}.

lojbo: xu do pu su'o roi citka le xruki
glico: Have you ever eaten turkey?
English_definition:
x1 is a turkey [food / bird] of species / breed x2. See also
            {cipni}.

lojbo: le se xrula poi do viska cu rozgu
glico: This flower is a rose.
English_definition:
x1 is a / the flower / blossom / bloom [body-part] of plant /
            species x2; (adjective:) x1 is floral. See also {spati}.

lojbo: ti noi xrula cu rozgu
glico: This flower is a rose.
English_definition:
x1 is a / the flower / blossom / bloom [body-part] of plant /
            species x2; (adjective:) x1 is floral. See also {spati}.

lojbo: xu do pu djuno
glico: Did you know?
English_definition: discursive: true-false question.

lojbo: xu nai do pu djuno
glico: Didn't you know?
English_definition: discursive: true-false question.

lojbo: ti noi djine cu xukmi le solji li pi mu bi mu
glico: This ring is 58.5% pure gold (58.5 out of 100 parts is pure gold).
English_definition:
x1 is an instance of substance / chemical / drug x2 (individual or
            mass) with purity x3. See also {curve}, {cidro}, {marna}, {nimre}.

lojbo: ko dunda le mi'u xunre cukta mi
glico: Give me the red book.
English_definition:
x1 is red / crimson / ruddy [color adjective]. See also {skari},
            {blabi}, {xekri}, {kandi}, {carmi}, {nukni}, {narju}, {rozgu},
            {zirpu}.

lojbo: le djuno be le zmadu cu xusra le se zmadu
glico: Who knows more claims less.
English_definition:
x1 (agent) asserts / claims / declares x2 (du'u) is true [can
            be used for epistemology of authority]. Also: x1 states / says that
            / affirms / purports to know that x2. (cf. natfe which is
            propositional and non-agentive, nupre)

lojbo:
xu do xusra le du'u le mi'u terdi cu carna le mi'u
            solri
glico: Are you asserting that the Earth goes round the Sun?
English_definition:
x1 (agent) asserts / claims / declares x2 (du'u) is true [can
            be used for epistemology of authority]. Also: x1 states / says that
            / affirms / purports to know that x2. (cf. natfe which is
            propositional and non-agentive, nupre)

lojbo: le mi'u djacu cu simlu le ka xutla tai le ka blaci
glico: The water looks smooth as glass.
English_definition:
x1 is smooth / even / [soft / silky] in texture / regularity. See
            also {plita}, {rufsu}, {tengu}, {dikni}, {pinta}, {sakli}, {spali}.

lojbo: mi te vecnu le vi plise e y le vu perli
glico: I'm buying these apples and, umm, the pears over there.
English_definition:
hesitation noise; maintains the floor while speaker decides what to
            say next.

lojbo: mi ba volta za le djedi be li ci
glico: I will return in three days.
English_definition: time tense distance: medium distance in time.

lojbo: mi pu volta za le nanca be li mu
glico: I returned 5 years ago.
English_definition: time tense distance: medium distance in time.

lojbo: oi nai za'a melbi tcima
glico: Oh, what a nice weather.
English_definition: evidential: I observe. See also {zgana}, {lanli}.

lojbo: za'a le aftobuso za'o na ku klama
glico: Apparently, the bus is late.
English_definition: evidential: I observe. See also {zgana}, {lanli}.

lojbo: za'a cladu bu'u le bartu
glico: I can hear the loud sound outside.
English_definition: evidential: I observe. See also {zgana}, {lanli}.

lojbo: ja'o carmi carvi
glico: So it must be raining heavily.
English_definition: evidential: I observe. See also {zgana}, {lanli}.

lojbo: mi pu za'e derpi i va'i mi pu smusku le jai se bebna
glico: I "derped". In other words, I said something stupid.
English_definition:
forethought nonce-word indicator; indicates next word is
            nonce-creation and may be nonstandard.

lojbo:
mi pu za'o citka le titla ba le nu mi mo'u citka le sanmi
            pe mi
glico: I kept eating candies after my meal was over.
English_definition:
interval event contour: continuing too long after natural end of
            ...; superfective | ---->.

lojbo: le za'u sazri ca denpa
glico: The drivers wait.
English_definition: digit / number: greater than.

lojbo: le mi'u za'u verba ca'o citka le mi'u kumfa
glico: The children are eating in the room.
English_definition: digit / number: greater than.

lojbo: za'u prenu pu'o klama
glico: More people are about to come.
English_definition: digit / number: greater than.

lojbo: xu do djica za'u djacu
glico: Do you want more water?
English_definition: digit / number: greater than.

lojbo: e'o do za'u re'u cusku
glico: Could you repeat that?

lojbo:
.i xu zabna fa le nu da'i mi skicu le pu zi se zukte be mi la
            .alis.
glico: I wonder if I should tell Alice what I just did.
English_definition:
x1 is favorable / great / superb / fabulous / dandy / outstanding /
            swell / admirable / nice / commendable / delightful / desirable /
            enjoyable / laudable / likable / lovable / wonderful / praiseworthy
            / high-quality / cool in property x2 by standard x3; x1 rocks in
            aspect x2 according to x3 See also {mabla}, {xamgu}, {funca},
            {vrude}, {banli}.

lojbo: le mi'u jisra cu zabna le ka se tasta
glico: The juice is superb in taste.
English_definition:
x1 is favorable / great / superb / fabulous / dandy / outstanding /
            swell / admirable / nice / commendable / delightful / desirable /
            enjoyable / laudable / likable / lovable / wonderful / praiseworthy
            / high-quality / cool in property x2 by standard x3; x1 rocks in
            aspect x2 according to x3 See also {mabla}, {xamgu}, {funca},
            {vrude}, {banli}.

lojbo: ra zabna le ka se sance
glico: Her voice is cool.
English_definition:
x1 is favorable / great / superb / fabulous / dandy / outstanding /
            swell / admirable / nice / commendable / delightful / desirable /
            enjoyable / laudable / likable / lovable / wonderful / praiseworthy
            / high-quality / cool in property x2 by standard x3; x1 rocks in
            aspect x2 according to x3 See also {mabla}, {xamgu}, {funca},
            {vrude}, {banli}.

lojbo: ra zajba le ka se rilti muvdu
glico: He is a rhythmic gymnast.
English_definition:
x1 is a gymnast at / performs gymnastics feat x2. See also {sluji},
            {dansu}.

lojbo: mi'a zalvi le maxri le purmo
glico: We grind wheat into flour.
English_definition:
x1 [individual or mass of hard surfaces] grinds / pulverizes /
            crushes x2 into powder x3. May need mosra tanru. See also {daspo},
            {purmo}, {marxa}, {pulce}, {canre}, {molki}.

lojbo: mi pu zandapma ra le ka se funca le zabna
glico: I wished her good luck.

lojbo: mi zanru le mi'u se platu be do
glico: I approve of your plan.
English_definition:
x1 approves of / gives favor to plan / action x2 (object / event).
            See also cmavo list {zau}, {natfe}.

lojbo: le mi'u zarci be le rectu de'i li cy vo co'u akti
glico: The butchery closes at 4 o'clock.
English_definition:
x1 is a market / store / exchange / shop(s) selling / trading (for)
            x2, operated by / with participants x3. Also: mall, marketplace,
            shopping center, cooperative, bazaar, trading post, mart; the
            concept is the function of selling / exchanging coupled with a
            location, and is more oriented to the larger concept of marketplace
            than the stalls / shops that comprise it, though it does not exclude
            the latter individual shops (= {zaisle}); x3 may include both owners
            / proprietors and customers in some markets, but in most contexts
            refers only to the operators. See also {vecnu}, {canja}, {dinju},
            {banxa}.

lojbo:
le mi'u ninmu mo'u batci le zargu be le mi'u nanmu se
            pi'o le xance
glico: She pinched his buttocks with a hand.

lojbo: ti noi dinju ba zasni le ka mi xabju
glico: I will temporarily live in this building.
English_definition:
x1 is temporary / not permanent / expected to change in property x2
            (ka) by standard / expectant x3. Also transient. See also {vitno},
            {stodi}, {cenba}, {galfi}, {binxo}, {stika}, {stali}, {tcini},
            {vitke}.

lojbo: do zasti mi le se senva be mi
glico: You are real for me in my dreams.
English_definition:
x1 exists / is real / actual / reality for x2 under metaphysics x3.
            Words usable for epistemology typically have a du'u place. x1
            is physical (one sense). See also {fatci}, {xanri}.

lojbo:
ti noi zbabu cu se zbasu fi le jilka jo'u le grasu jo'u le
            djacu
glico: This soap is made of alkali, fat and water.
English_definition:
x1 is a quantity of / contains / is made of soap from source x2 of
            composition including x3. See also {lumci}, {fonmo}.

lojbo: ti zbani le tumla pe la nipon
glico: This is a coast of the Japanese land.
English_definition: x1 is a bay in / of coast / shoreline x2. See also {lalxu}, {xamsi}.

lojbo: zbasu le cirla le ladru
glico: Cheese is made from milk.
English_definition:
x1 makes / assembles / builds / manufactures / creates x2 out of
            materials / parts / components x3. Should not be used to express
            causation. Cf. {cupra}, {larcu}, {rutni}, {finti}, {gundi}.

lojbo: xu do mo'u zbasu le mi'u dinju
glico: Have you finished building the house?
English_definition:
x1 makes / assembles / builds / manufactures / creates x2 out of
            materials / parts / components x3. Should not be used to express
            causation. Cf. {cupra}, {larcu}, {rutni}, {finti}, {gundi}.

lojbo: ti zbepi le tansi
glico: This is a stand for the pan.
English_definition:
x1 is a pedestal / base / stand / pallet supporting x2 (object /
            event), of materials / properties x3. Pallet (= {lafyzbe}). See also
            {jamfu}, {jicmu}, {jubme}, {tuple}, {ckana}, {cpana}, {loldi},
            {sanli}.

lojbo: le zdani be mi cu zdani be do
glico: My home is your home.
English_definition:
x1 is a nest / house / lair / den / [home] of / for x2. Home (=
            {tercnizda}), house (constructed building) (= {zdadi'u}). See
            also {dinju}, {ginka}, {kumfa}, se {xabju}.

lojbo: le mi'u verba mlatu cu zdile mi le ka tai ma kau plipe
glico: The kitten is amusing in how it jumps.
English_definition:
x1 (abstract) is amusing / entertaining to x2 in property / aspect
            x3; x3 is what amuses x2 about x1. Also: x1 occupies x2 pleasantly;
            x1 is fun for x2; x2 is amused by x1; x2 has fun (at) doing x1; x1
            is an amusement / entertainment / game for x2. See also {cinri},
            {panka}, {xajmi} for funny, {kelci}.

lojbo: li cy ze tcika ti
glico: It's 7 o'clock.
English_definition: digit / number: 7 (digit) [seven].

lojbo: mi pu ze'a sipna
glico: I slept for a while.
English_definition: time tense interval: a medium length of time.

lojbo:
.i le prenu pu zukte ze'a le za'u pi mu si'e be le nu
            le nei cu jmive
glico: He did it for most of his life.
English_definition: time tense interval: a medium length of time.

lojbo: mi ba ze'e prami do
glico: I will always love you.
English_definition: time tense interval: the whole of time.

lojbo: mi ze'e prami do
glico: I loved, love and will love you.
English_definition: time tense interval: the whole of time.

lojbo: panpi ze'ei coi
glico: Peace to you! (as a greeting).
English_definition:
nonce word with existing grammar Binds two arbitrary words together
            to form a nonce word whose semantics are indicated by the left word
            and whose grammar is the same as that of the right word. Useful for
            creating function words without having to allocate experimental
            cmavo forms.

lojbo: ai mi ze'i sipna
glico: I'm going to take a nap (to sleep for a short time).
English_definition: time tense interval: an instantaneous / tiny / short amount of time.

lojbo: da tricu ze'o le mi'u rirxe
glico: There is a tree across the river.
English_definition:
location tense relation / direction; beyond / outward / receding
            from ...

lojbo: mi pu ba le ka citka ze'u sipna
glico: I took a long nap after eating.
English_definition: time tense interval: a long amount of time.

lojbo: lei certu pu pilno le xy zei kantu
glico: Experts used X-rays.
English_definition: joins preceding and following words into a lujvo.

lojbo: xu le ka catra le mabru cu zekri do
glico: Is killing mammals a crime to you?
English_definition:
x1 (event / state) is a punishable crime / [taboo / sin] to people /
            culture / judges / jury x2. Taboo (= {kluzei}, {cacyzei}); sin (=
            {madzei}, {jdamadzei}); heresy (= {jdazei}). See also {flalu},
            {sfasa}, {zungi}, {palci}, {lijda}, {pajni}, {javni}, {tcaci},
            {marde}, {pulji}, {tinbe}.

lojbo: mi zenba le ka se cfipu vau so'i da
glico: My confusion increased a lot.
English_definition:
x1 (experiencer) increases / is incremented / augmented in property
            / quantity x2 by amount x3. See also {jdika}, {zmadu}, {banro},
            {jmina}.

lojbo:
e'o do zenba le ka masno le ka tavla i e'o do zenba masno
            tavla
glico: Would you please speak more slowly?
English_definition:
x1 (experiencer) increases / is incremented / augmented in property
            / quantity x2 by amount x3. See also {jdika}, {zmadu}, {banro},
            {jmina}.

lojbo:
lo ka gunma lo'e xa no re selci be loi marji cu ka zepti le ka
            molro vau le ka se canlu
glico: 602 particles make up one zeptomole (zmol) of substance in volume.
English_definition:
x1 is $10^{-21}$ of x2 in dimension / aspect x3 (default is units).
            (cf. grake, mitre, snidu, stero, delno, molro, kelvo, xampo, gradu.
            litce, merli, centi, decti, dekto, femti, gigdo, gocti, gotro,
            kilto, megdo, mikri, milti, nanvi, petso, picti, terto, xatsi,
            xecto, xexso, zetro)

lojbo:
le djacu po le xamsi be le terdi cu zetro le ka litce be li
            ji'i pa pi vo vau le ka se canlu
glico:
The volume of seawater in the Earth's oceans is approximately
            1.4 zettalitres (ZL) in volume.
English_definition:
x1 is $10^{21}$ of x2 in dimension / aspect x3 (default is units).
            Cf. {grake}, {mitre}, {snidu}, {stero}, {delno}, {molro}, {kelvo},

            (= {zgica'apli}, {zgiterca'a}, {selzgigau},
            {selzgizu'e}); song (= {sagzgi}, {selsa'a}); voice, as

lojbo: mi ba volta ba zi le cacra be li pa

English_definition: time tense distance: instantaneous-to-short distance in time.

lojbo: gau mi do ba djuno ba zi le nu mi mo'u klama

English_definition: time tense distance: instantaneous-to-short distance in time.

lojbo:
le mi'u prenu poi pu tavla do zi'e noi blondine cu bruna
            mi vau ue pei
glico:
The man that talked to you and who is blond is my brother,
            surprised?
English_definition: joins relative clauses which apply to the same sumti.

lojbo: zo zigzagi zi'evla
glico: {zigzagi} is a zi'evla word.

lojbo: zi'o traduki zo coi zoi gy.hello!.gy.
glico: {coi} is translated as "Hello!"
English_definition:
pro-sumti: fills a sumti place, deleting it from selbri place
            structure;changes selbri semantics.

lojbo: le jmive cu se zbasu zi'o le selci
glico: Living beings are made from cells.
English_definition:
pro-sumti: fills a sumti place, deleting it from selbri place

lojbo: mi zifre le ka zukte le se nelci be mi

English_definition:
x1 is free / at liberty to do / be x2 (event / state) under
            conditions x3. Also unrestricted, unfettered, unconstrained;
            (adjective:) independent; (adverb:) willingly, voluntarily, freely,
            may, optionally; (potential:) x1 voluntarily does x2. See also
            {pinfu}, {rinju}, {bilga}, {curmi}, {kakne}, {frili}.

lojbo: le mi'u pluta be le mi'u cmana pu zigzagi
glico: The route to the mountain zigzagged.

lojbo: le mi'u cidja cu vasru le zinki

English_definition:
x1 is a quantity of / contains / is made of zinc (Zn); [metaphor:
            hard metal]. See also {jinme}.

lojbo: le mi'u taxfu cu zirpu

English_definition:
x1 is purple / violet [color adjective]. See also {skari}, {blabi},

lojbo: ra pu zivle le jdini le ka sidju pa cnino sanga

English_definition:
x1 (agent) invests resources x2 in investment x3 expecting return /
            profit x4 (object(s) / event). [also ties up / Risks / gambles. x1
            is an investor; x2 are invested assets of x1; bond (= {jertervle})];
            See also {prali}, {canja}, {jbera}, {dejni}, {ponse}.

lojbo: ai mi zivle le nejni le ka prami do vau le nu do prami mi

lojbo: le mi'u vorme cu zmiku le ka co'a kalri

lojbo: zo rozgu cmene mi

lojbo: mi ca'o tavla zo'e la .lojban.

lojbo: mi pu na djuno zo'ei le mi'u nabmi

English_definition:
Something associated with; equivalent to ''zo'e
            pe''. There are a lot of cases where people use tu'a
            where they actually mean zo'ei; once I noticed the usefulness
            of such a word to elide whole chunks of sentences, I started wanting
            it all the time. -camgusmis

lojbo: le mi'u gerku cu zunti le nu mi lumci le kumfa vau le ka plipe

English_definition:

            {dicra}, {fliba}, {fanza}, {raktu}, {klina}, {bandu}, {cfipu},
            {ganlo}.

lojbo: e'a do zutse le stizu

lojbo: la .alis. cu zvati ma

English_definition:

            especially stuzi for an inherent / inalienable location, jbini,
            nenri, se vasru, cpana, diklo, jibni, cabna, lamji, tcini, xabju,
